transliteration: cariṣṇudhūmamaghṛbhītaśociṣam
translation: WORSHIP thou Jatavedas, pray to him who willingly accepts, Whose smoke wanders at will, and none may grasp his flame.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 23
sanskrit: दामानं विश्वचर्षणे.अग्निं विश्वमनो गिरा | उत सतुषे विष्पर्धसो रथानाम
transliteration: dāmānaṃ viśvacarṣaṇe.aghniṃ viśvamano ghirā | uta stuṣe viṣpardhaso rathānām
translation: Thou, all men's friend, Visvamanas, exaltest Agni with thy song, The Giver, and his flames with which no cars contend.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 23
sanskrit: येषामाबाध रग्मिय इषः पर्क्षश्च निग्रभे | उपविदावह्निर्विन्दते वसु
transliteration: yeṣāmābādha ṛghmiya iṣaḥ pṛkṣaśca nighrabhe | upavidāvahnirigvedandate vasu
translation: Whose resolute assault, to win vigour and food, deserves our praise,- Through whose discovering power the priest obtaineth wealth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 23
sanskrit: उदस्य शोचिरस्थाद दीदियुषो वयजरम | तपुर्जम्भस्य सुद्युतो गणश्रियः
transliteration: udasya śocirasthād dīdiyuṣo vyajaram | tapurjambhasya sudyuto ghaṇaśriyaḥ
translation: Up springs the imperishable flame, the flame of the Refulgent One Most bright, with glowing jaws and glory in his train.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 23
sanskrit: उदु तिष्ठ सवध्वर सतवानो देव्या कर्पा | अभिख्या भासा बर्हता शुशुक्वनिः
transliteration: udu tiṣṭha svadhvara stavāno devyā kṛpā | abhikhyā bhāsā bṛhatā śuśukvaniḥ
translation: Skilled in fair sacrifice, extolled, arise in Godlike loveliness, Shining with lofty splendour, with effulgent light.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 23
sanskrit: अग्ने याहि सुशस्तिभिर्हव्या जुह्वान आनुषक | यथा दूतो बभूथ हव्यवाहनः
transliteration: aghne yāhi suśastibhirhavyā juhvāna ānuṣak | yathā dūto babhūtha havyavāhanaḥ
translation: Called straight to our oblations, come, O Agni, through our eulogies, As thou hast been our envoy bearing up our gifts.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 23
sanskrit: अग्निं वः पूर्व्यं हुवे होतारं चर्षणीनाम | तमया वाचा गर्णे तमु व सतुषे
transliteration: aghniṃ vaḥ pūrigvedayaṃ huve hotāraṃ carṣaṇīnām | tamayā vācā ghṛṇe tamu va stuṣe
translation: I call your Agni, from of old Invoking Priest of living men: Him with this song I laud and magnify for you.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 23
sanskrit: यज्ञेभिरद्भुतक्रतुं यं कर्पा सूदयन्त इत | मित्रं न जने सुधितं रतावनि
transliteration: yajñebhiradbhutakratuṃ yaṃ kṛpā sūdayanta it | mitraṃ na jane sudhitaṃ ṛtāvani
translation: Whom, wondrous wise, they animate with solemn rites and his fair form, Kind as a friend to men who keep the holy Law.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 24
sanskrit: सखाय आ शिषामहि बरह्मेन्द्राय वज्रिणे | सतुष ऊ षुवो नर्तमाय धर्ष्णवे
transliteration: sakhāya ā śiṣāmahi brahmendrāya vajriṇe | stuṣa ū ṣuvo nṛtamāya dhṛṣṇave
translation: COMPANIONS, let us learn a prayer to Indra, whom the thunder arms, To glorify your bold and most heroic Friend.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 25
sanskrit: ता वां विश्वस्य गोपा देवा देवेषु यज्ञिय | रतावाना यजसे पुतदक्षसा
transliteration: tā vāṃ viśvasya ghopā devā deveṣu yajñiya |
translation: I WORSHIP you who guard this All, Gods, holiest among the Gods, You, faithful to the Law, whose power is sanctified.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 26
sanskrit: युवोरु षू रथं हुवे सधस्तुत्याय सुरिषु | अतुर्तदक्षाव्र्षणा वर्षण्वसू
transliteration: yuvoru ṣū rathaṃ huve sadhastutyāya suriṣu | aturtadakṣāvṛṣaṇā vṛṣaṇvasū
translation: I CALL your chariot to receive united praise mid princely men, Strong Gods who pour down wealth, of never vanquished might!

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 26
sanskrit: युवं वरो सुषाम्णे महे तने नासत्या | अवोभिर्यथो वर्षण वर्षण्वसू
transliteration: yuvaṃ varo suṣāmṇe mahe tane nāsatyā | avobhiryatho vṛṣaṇa vṛṣaṇvasū
translation: Ye to Varosusaman come, Nasatyas, for this glorious rite. With your protecting aid. Strong Gods, who pour down wealth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 26
sanskrit: ता वामद्य हवामहे हव्येभिर्वजिनीवसू | पूर्वीरिष इषयन्तावति कषपः
transliteration: tā vāmadya havāmahe havyebhirigvedaajinīvasū | pūrigvedaīriṣa iṣayantāvati kṣapaḥ
translation: So with oblations we invoke you, rich in ample wealth, to-day, When night hath passed, O ye who send us plenteous food.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 27
sanskrit: अग्निरुक्थे पुरोहितो गरावाणो बर्हिरध्वरे | रचा यामि मरुतो बरह्मणस पतिं देवानवो वरेण्यम
transliteration: aghnirukthe purohito ghrāvāṇo barhiradhvare |
translation: CHEIF Priest is Agni at the laud, as stones and grass at sacrifice: With song I seek the Maruts, Brahmanaspati, Gods for help much to be desired.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 28
sanskrit: ये तरिंशति तरयस परो देवासो बर्हिरासदन | विदन्नहद्वितासनन
transliteration: ye triṃśati trayas paro devāso barhirāsadan | vidannahadvitāsanan
translation: THE Thirty Gods and Three besides, whose seat hath been the sacred grass, From time of old have found and gained.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 28
sanskrit: वरुणो मित्रो अर्यमा समद्रातिषाचो अग्नयः | पत्नीवन्तो वषट्क्र्ताः
transliteration: varuṇo mitro aryamā smadrātiṣāco aghnayaḥ | patnīvanto vaṣaṭkṛtāḥ
translation: Varuna, Mitra, Aryaman, Agnis, with Consorts, sending boons, To whom our Vasat! is addressed:

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 28
sanskrit: ते नो गोपा अपाच्यास्त उदक त इत्था नयक | पुरस्तात सर्वया विशा
transliteration: te no ghopā apācyāsta udak ta itthā nyak | purastāt sarigvedaayā viśā
translation: These are our guardians in the west, and northward here, and in the south, And on the cast, with all the tribe.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 28
sanskrit: यथा वशन्ति देवास्तथेदसत तदेषां नकिरा मिनत | अरावा चन मर्त्यः
transliteration: yathā vaśanti devāstathedasat tadeṣāṃ nakirā minat | arāvā cana martyaḥ
translation: Even as the Gods desire so verily shall it be. None diminisheth this power of theirs, No demon, and no mortal

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 28
sanskrit: सप्तानां सप्त रष्टयः सप्त दयुम्नान्येषाम | सप्तो अधि शरियो धिरे
transliteration: saptānāṃ sapta ṛṣṭayaḥ sapta dyumnānyeṣām | sapto adhi śriyo dhire
translation: The Seven carry seven spears; seven are the splendours they possess, And seven the glories they assume.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 29
sanskrit: बभ्रुरेको विषुणः सूनरो युवाञ्ज्यङकते हिरण्ययम
transliteration: babhrureko viṣuṇaḥ sūnaro yuvāñjyaṅkte hiraṇyayam
translation: ONE is a youth brown, active, manifold he decks the golden one with ornament.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 29
sanskrit: योनिमेक आ ससाद दयोतनो.अन्तर्देवेषु मेधिरः
transliteration: yonimeka ā sasāda dyotano.antardeveṣu medhiraḥ
translation: Another, luminous, occupies the place of sacrifice, Sage, among the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 29
sanskrit: वाशीमेको बिभर्ति हस्त आयसीमन्तर्देवेषु निध्रुविः
transliteration: vāśīmeko bibharti hasta āyasīmantardeveṣu nidhruviḥ
translation: One brandishes in his hand an iron knife, firm, in his seat amid the Deities.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 29
sanskrit: वज्रमेको बिभर्ति हस्त आहितं तेन वर्त्राणि जिघ्नते
transliteration: vajrameko bibharti hasta āhitaṃ tena vṛtrāṇi jighnate
translation: Another holds the thunderbolt, wherewith he slays the Vrtras, resting in his hand.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 29
sanskrit: तिग्ममेको बिभर्ति हस्त आयुधं शुचिरुग्रो जलाषभेषजः
transliteration: tighmameko bibharti hasta āyudhaṃ śucirughro jalāṣabheṣajaḥ
translation: Another bears a pointed weapon: bright is he, and strong, with healing medicines.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 29
sanskrit: पथ एकः पीपाय तस्करो यथा एष वेद निधीनाम
transliteration: patha ekaḥ pīpāya taskaro yathā eṣa veda nidhīnām
translation: Another, thief-like, watches well the ways, and knows the places where the treasures lie.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 29
sanskrit: तरीण्येक उरुगायो वि चक्रमे यत्र देवासो मदन्ति
transliteration: trīṇyeka urughāyo vi cakrame yatra devāso madanti
translation: Another with his mighty stride hath made his three steps thither where the Gods rejoice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 29
sanskrit: विभिर्द्वा चरत एकया सह पर परवासेव वसतः
transliteration: vibhirdvā carata ekayā saha pra pravāseva vasataḥ
translation: Two with one Dame ride on with winged steeds, and journey forth like travellers on their way.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 29
sanskrit: सदो दवा चक्राते उपमा दिवि सम्राजा सर्पिरासुती
transliteration: sado dvā cakrāte upamā divi samrājā sarpirāsutī
translation: Two, highest, in the heavens have set their seat, worshipped with holy oil, imperial Kings.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 29
sanskrit: अर्चन्त एके महि साम मन्वत तेन सूर्यमरोचयन
transliteration: arcanta eke mahi sāma manvata tena sūryamarocayan
translation: Some, singing lauds, conceived the Sama-hymn, great hymn whereby they caused the Sun to shine.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 30
sanskrit: नहि वो अस्त्यर्भको देवासो न कुमारकः | विश्वे सतोमहान्त इत
transliteration: nahi vo astyarbhako devāso na kumārakaḥ | viśve satomahānta it
translation: NOT one of you, ye Gods, is small, none of you is a feeble child: All of you, verily, are great.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 30
sanskrit: इति सतुतासो असथा रिशादसो ये सथ तरयश्च तरिंशच्च | मनोर्देवा यज्ञियासः
transliteration: iti stutāso asathā riśādaso ye stha trayaśca triṃśacca | manordevā yajñiyāsaḥ
translation: Thus be ye lauded, ye destroyers of the foe, ye Three-and-Thirty Deities, The Gods of man, the Holy Ones.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 30
sanskrit: ते नस्त्राध्वं ते.अवत त उ नो अधि वोचत | मा नः पथः पित्र्यान मानवादधि दूरं नैष्ट परावतः
transliteration: te nastrādhvaṃ te.avata ta u no adhi vocata | mā naḥ pathaḥ pitryān mānavādadhi dūraṃ naiṣṭa parāvataḥ
translation: As such defend and succour us, with benedictions speak to us: Lead us not from our fathers' and from Manu's path into the distance far away.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 30
sanskrit: ये देवास इह सथन विश्वे वैश्वानरा उत | अस्मभ्यं शर्म सप्रथो गवे.अश्वाय यछत
transliteration: ye devāsa iha sthana viśve vaiśvānarā uta | asmabhyaṃ śarma sapratho ghave.aśvāya yachata
translation: Ye Deities who stay with us, and all ye Gods of all mankind, Give us your wide protection, give shelter for cattle and for steed.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 31
sanskrit: यो यजाति यजात इत सुनवच्च पचाति च | बरह्मेदिन्द्रस्यचाकनत
transliteration: yo yajāti yajāta it sunavacca pacāti ca | brahmedindrasyacākanat
translation: THAT Brahman pleases Indra well, who worships, sacrifices, pours Libation, and prepares the meal.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 31
sanskrit: पुरोळाशं यो अस्मै सोमं ररत आशिरम | पादित तं शक्रो अंहसः
transliteration: puroḷāśaṃ yo asmai somaṃ rarata āśiram | pādit taṃ śakro aṃhasaḥ
translation: Sakra protects from woe the man who gives him sacrificial cake. And offers Soma blent with milk.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 31
sanskrit: तस्य दयुमानसद रथो देवजूतः स शूशुवत | विश्वा वन्वन्नमित्रिया
transliteration: tasya dyumānasad ratho devajūtaḥ sa śūśuvat | viśvā vanvannamitriyā
translation: His chariot shall be glorious, sped by Gods, and mighty shall he be, Subduing all hostilities.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 31
sanskrit: अस्य परजावती गर्हे.असश्चन्ती दिवे-दिवे | इळा धेनुमती दुहे
transliteration: asya prajāvatī ghṛhe.asaścantī dive-dive | iḷā dhenumatī duhe
translation: Each day that passes, in his house flows his libation, rich in milk, Exhaustless, bringing progeny.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 31
sanskrit: या दम्पती समनसा सुनुत आ च धावतः | देवासो नित्ययाशिरा
transliteration: yā dampatī samanasā sunuta ā ca dhāvataḥ | devāso nityayāśirā
translation: O Gods, with constant draught of milk, husband and wife with one accord Press out and wash the Soma juice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 31
sanskrit: परति पराशव्यानितः सम्यञ्चा बर्हिराशाते | न ता वाजेषु वायतः
transliteration: prati prāśavyānitaḥ samyañcā barhirāśāte | na tā vājeṣu vāyataḥ
translation: They gain sufficient food: they come united to the sacred grass, And never do they fail in strength.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 31
sanskrit: न देवानामपि हनुतः सुमतिं न जुगुक्षतः | शरवो बर्हद विवासतः
transliteration: na devānāmapi hnutaḥ sumatiṃ na jughukṣataḥ |
translation: Never do they deny or seek to hide the favour of the Gods: They win high glory for themselves.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 32
sanskrit: पर कर्तान्य रजीषिणः कण्वा इन्द्रस्य गाथया | मदे सोमस्य वोचत
transliteration: pra kṛtāny ṛjīṣiṇaḥ kaṇvā indrasya ghāthayā | made somasya vocata
translation: KANVAS, tell forth with song the deeds of Indra, the Impetuous, Wrought in the Soma's wild delight.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 32
sanskrit: यः सर्बिन्दमनर्शनिं पिप्रुं दासमहीशुवम | वधीदुग्रो रिणन्नपः
transliteration: yaḥ sṛbindamanarśaniṃ pipruṃ dāsamahīśuvam | vadhīdughro riṇannapaḥ
translation: Strong God, he slew Anarsani, Srbinda, Pipru, and the fiend, Ahisuva, and loosed the floods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 32
sanskrit: नयर्बुदस्य विष्टपं वर्ष्माणं बर्हतस्तिर | कर्षे तदिन्द्र पौंस्यम
transliteration: nyarbudasya viṣṭapaṃ varṣmāṇaṃ bṛhatastira | kṛṣe tadindra pauṃsyam
translation: Thou broughtest down the dwelling-place, the height of lofty Arbuda. That exploit, Indra, must be famed.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 32
sanskrit: परति शरुताय वो धर्षत तूर्णाशं न गिरेरधि | हुवेसुशिप्रमूतये
transliteration: prati śrutāya vo dhṛṣat tūrṇāśaṃ na ghireradhi | huvesuśipramūtaye
translation: Bold, to your famous Soma I call the fair-visored God for aid, Down like a torrent from the hill.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 32
sanskrit: स गोरश्वस्य वि वरजं मन्दानः सोम्येभ्यः | पुरं नशूर दर्षसि
transliteration: sa ghoraśvasya vi vrajaṃ mandānaḥ somyebhyaḥ | puraṃ naśūra darṣasi
translation: Rejoicing in the Soma-draughts, Hero, burst open, like a fort, The stall of horses and of kine.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 32
sanskrit: यदि मे रारणः सुत उक्थे वा दधसे चनः | आरादुपस्वधा गहि
transliteration: yadi me rāraṇaḥ suta ukthe vā dadhase canaḥ |
translation: If my libation gladdens, if thou takest pleasure in my laud, Come with thy Godhead from afar.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: वयं घ तवा सुतावन्त आपो न वर्क्तबर्हिषः | पवित्रस्यप्रस्रवणेषु वर्त्रहन परि सतोतार आसते
transliteration: vayaṃ gha tvā sutāvanta āpo na vṛktabarhiṣaḥ | pavitrasyaprasravaṇeṣu vṛtrahan pari stotāra āsate
translation: WE compass thee like waters, we whose grass is trimmed and Soma pressed. Here where the filter pours its stream, thy worshippers round thee, O Vrtra-slayer, sit.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: सवरन्ति तवा सुते नरो वसो निरेक उक्थिनः | कदा सुतं तर्षाण ओक आ गम इन्द्र सवब्दीव वंसगः
transliteration: svaranti tvā sute naro vaso nireka ukthinaḥ | kadā sutaṃ tṛṣāṇa oka ā ghama indra svabdīva vaṃsaghaḥ
translation: Men, Vasu! by the Soma, with lauds call thee to the foremost place: When comest thou athirst unto the juice as home, O Indra, like a bellowing bull?

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: कण्वेभिर्ध्र्ष्णवा धर्षद वाजं दर्षि सहस्रिणम | पिशङगरूपं मघवन विचर्षणे मक्षू गोमन्तमीमहे
transliteration: kaṇvebhirdhṛṣṇavā dhṛṣad vājaṃ darṣi sahasriṇam | piśaṅgharūpaṃ maghavan vicarṣaṇe makṣū ghomantamīmahe
translation: Boldly, Bold Hero, bring us spoil in thousands for the Kanvas' sake. O active Maghavan, with eager prayer we crave the yellow-hued with store ol kine.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: पाहि गायान्धसो मद इन्द्राय मेध्यातिथे | यः सम्मिश्लोहर्योर्यः सुते सचा वज्री रथो हिरण्ययः
transliteration: pāhi ghāyāndhaso mada indrāya medhyātithe | yaḥ sammiśloharyoryaḥ sute sacā vajrī ratho hiraṇyayaḥ
translation: Medhyatithi, to Indra sing, drink of the juice to make thee glad. Close-knit to his Bay Steeds, bolt-armed, beside the juice is he: his chariot is of gold.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: यः सुषव्यः सुदक्षिण इनो यः सुक्रतुर्ग्र्णे | य आकरः सहस्रा यः शतामघ इन्द्रो यः पूर्भिदारितः
transliteration: yaḥ suṣavyaḥ sudakṣiṇa ino yaḥ sukraturghṛṇe | ya ākaraḥ sahasrā yaḥ śatāmagha indro yaḥ pūrbhidāritaḥ
translation: He Who is praised as strong of hand both right and left, most wise and hold: Indra who, rich in hundreds, gathers thousands up, honoured as breaker-down of forts.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: यो धर्षितो यो.अव्र्तो यो अस्ति शमश्रुषु शरितः | विभूतद्युम्नश्च्यवनः पुरुष्टुतः करत्वा गौरिव शाकिनः
transliteration: yo dhṛṣito yo.avṛto yo asti śmaśruṣu śritaḥ | vibhūtadyumnaścyavanaḥ puruṣṭutaḥ kratvā ghauriva śākinaḥ
translation: The bold of heart whom none provokes, who stands in bearded confidence; Much-lauded, very glorious, overthrowing foes, strong Helper, like a bull with might.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: क ईं वेद सुते सचा पिबन्तं कद वयो दधे | अयं यःपुरो विभिनत्त्योजसा मन्दानः शिप्र्यन्धसः
transliteration: ka īṃ veda sute sacā pibantaṃ kad vayo dadhe | ayaṃ yaḥpuro vibhinattyojasā mandānaḥ śipryandhasaḥ
translation: Who knows what vital power he wins, drinking beside the flowing juice? This is the fair-checked God who, joying in the draught, breaks down the castles in his strength.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: दाना मर्गो न वारणः पुरुत्रा चरथं दधे | नकिष टवा नि यमदा सुते गमो महांश्चरस्योजसा
transliteration: dānā mṛgho na vāraṇaḥ purutrā carathaṃ dadhe | nakiṣ ṭvā ni yamadā sute ghamo mahāṃścarasyojasā
translation: As a wild elephant rushes on this way and that way, mad with heat,' None may compel thee, yet come hither to the draught: thou movest mighty in thy power.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: य उग्रः सन्ननिष्ट्र्त सथिरो रणाय संस्क्र्तः | यदि सतोतुर्मघवा शर्णवद धवं नेन्द्रो योषत्या गमत
transliteration: ya ughraḥ sannaniṣṭṛta sthiro raṇāya saṃskṛtaḥ | yadi stoturmaghavā śṛṇavad dhavaṃ nendro yoṣatyā ghamat
translation: When he, the Mighty, ne'er o'erthrown, steadfast, made ready for the fight, When Indra Maghavan lists to his praiser's call, he will not stand aloof, but come.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: सत्यमित्था वर्षेदसि वर्षजूतिर्नो.अव्र्तः | वर्षा हयुग्र शर्ण्विषे परावति वर्षो अर्वावति शरुतः
transliteration: satyamitthā vṛṣedasi vṛṣajūtirno.avṛtaḥ | vṛṣā hyughra śṛṇviṣe parāvati vṛṣo arigvedaāvati śrutaḥ
translation: Yea, verily, thou art a Bull, with a bull's rush. whom none may stay: Thou Mighty One, art celebrated as a Bull, famed as a Bull both near and far.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: वर्षणस्ते अभीशवो वर्षा कशा हिरण्ययी | वर्षा रथो मघवन वर्षणा हरी वर्षा तवं सतक्रतो
transliteration: vṛṣaṇaste abhīśavo vṛṣā kaśā hiraṇyayī | vṛṣā ratho maghavan vṛṣaṇā harī vṛṣā tvaṃ satakrato
translation: Thy reins are very bulls in strength, bulls' strength is in thy golden whip. Thy car, O Maghavan, thy Bays are strong as bulls: thou, Satakratu, art a Bull.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: वर्षा सोता सुनोतु ते वर्षन्न्र्जीपिन्ना भर | वर्षा दधन्वे वर्षणं नदीष्वा तुभ्यं सथातर्हरीणाम
transliteration: vṛṣā sotā sunotu te vṛṣannṛjīpinnā bhara | vṛṣā dadhanve vṛṣaṇaṃ nadīṣvā tubhyaṃ sthātarharīṇām
translation: Let the strong presser press for thee. Bring hither, thou straight-rushing Bull. The mighty makes the mighty run in flowing streams for thee whom thy Bay Horses bear.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: एन्द्र याहि पीतये मधु शविष्ठ सोम्यम | नायमछा मघवा शर्णवद गिरो बरह्मोक्था च सुक्रतुः
transliteration: endra yāhi pītaye madhu śaviṣṭha somyam | nāyamachā maghavā śṛṇavad ghiro brahmokthā ca sukratuḥ
translation: Come, thou most potent Indra, come to drink the savoury Soma juice. Maghavan, very wise, will quickly come to hear the songs, the prayer, the hymns of praise.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: वहन्तु तवा रथेष्ठामा हरयो रथयुजः | तिरश्चिदर्यं सवनानि वर्त्रहन्नन्येषां या शतक्रतो
transliteration: vahantu tvā ratheṣṭhāmā harayo rathayujaḥ | tiraścidaryaṃ savanāni vṛtrahannanyeṣāṃ yā śatakrato
translation: When thou hast mounted on thy car let thy yoked Bay Steeds carry thee, Past other men's libations, Lord of Hundred Powers, thee, Vrtra-slayer, thee our Friend.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: अस्माकमद्यान्तमं सतोमं धिष्व महामह | अस्माकं ते सवना सन्तु शन्तमा मदाय दयुक्ष सोमपाः
transliteration: asmākamadyāntamaṃ stomaṃ dhiṣva mahāmaha | asmākaṃ te savanā santu śantamā madāya dyukṣa somapāḥ
translation: O thou Most Lofty One, accept our laud as nearest to thine heart. May our libations be most sweet to make thee glad, O Soma-drinker, Heavenly Lord.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: नहि षस्तव नो मम शास्त्रे अन्यस्य रण्यति | यो अस्मान्वीर आनयत
transliteration: nahi ṣastava no mama śāstre anyasya raṇyati | yo asmānvīra ānayat
translation: Neither in thy decree nor mine, but in another's he delights,- The man who brought us unto this.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: इन्द्रश्चिद घा तदब्रवीत सत्रिया अशास्यं मनः | उतो अह करतुं रघुम
transliteration: indraścid ghā tadabravīt striyā aśāsyaṃ manaḥ | uto aha kratuṃ raghum
translation: Indra himself hath said, The mind of woman brooks not discipline, Her intellect hath little weight.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: सप्ती चिद घा मदच्युता मिथुना वहतो रथम | एवेद धूर्व्र्ष्ण उत्तरा
transliteration: saptī cid ghā madacyutā mithunā vahato ratham | eved dhūrigvedaṛṣṇa uttarā
translation: His pair of horses, rushing on in their wild transport, draw his car: High-lifted is the stallion's yoke.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 33
sanskrit: अधः पश्यस्व मोपरि सन्तरां पादकौ हर | मा ते कषप्लकौ दर्शन सत्री हि बरह्मा बभूविथ
transliteration: adhaḥ paśyasva mopari santarāṃ pādakau hara | mā te kaṣaplakau dṛśan strī hi brahmā babhūvitha
translation: Cast down thine eyes and look not up. More closely set thy feet. Let none See what thy garment veils, for thou, a Brahman, hast become a dame.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 34
sanskrit: एन्द्र याहि हरिभिरुप कण्वस्य सुष्टुतिम | दिवो अमुष्य शासतो दिवं यय दिवावसो
transliteration: endra yāhi haribhirupa kaṇvasya suṣṭutim | divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso
translation: Come hither, Indra, with thy Bays, come thou to Kanva's eulogy. Ye by command of yonder Dyaus, God bright by day! have gone to heaven.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 35
sanskrit: अग्निनेन्द्रेण वरुणेन विष्णुनादित्यै रुद्रैर्वसुभिः सचाभुवा | सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण च सोमं पिबतमश्विना
transliteration: aghninendreṇa varuṇena viṣṇunādityai rudrairigvedaasubhiḥ sacābhuvā | sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somaṃ pibatamaśvinā
translation: WITH Agni and with Indra, Visnu, Varuna, with the Adityas, Rudras, Vasus, closely leagued; Accordant, of one mind with Surya and with Dawn, O Asvins, drink the Soma juice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 35
sanskrit: विश्वाभिर्धीभिर्भुवनेन वाजिना दिवा पर्थिव्याद्रिभिः सचाभुवा | सजोषसा उषसा ...
transliteration: viśvābhirdhībhirbhuvanena vājinā divā pṛthivyādribhiḥ sacābhuvā | sajoṣasā uṣasā ...
translation: With all the Holy Thoughts, all being Mighty Ones! in close alliance wil the Mountains, Heaven, and Earth; Accordant. of one mind with Surya and with Dawn, O Asvins, drink the Soma juice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 35
sanskrit: विश्वैर्देवैस्त्रिभिरेकादशैरिहाद्भिर्मरुद्भिर्भ्र्गुभिः सचाभुवा | सजोषसा उषसा ...
transliteration: viśvairdevaistribhirekādaśairihādbhirmarudbhirbhṛghubhiḥ sacābhuvā | sajoṣasā uṣasā ...
translation: With all the Deities, three times eleven, here, in close alliance with the Maruts, Bhrgus, Floods; Accordant, of one mind with Surya and with Dawn, O Asvins, drink the Soma juice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 35
sanskrit: जुषेथां यज्ञं बोधतं हवस्य मे विश्वेह देवौ सवनाव गछतम | सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण चेषं नो वोळ्हमश्विना
transliteration: juṣethāṃ yajñaṃ bodhataṃ havasya me viśveha devau savanāva ghachatam | sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ceṣaṃ no voḷhamaśvinā
translation: Accept the sacrifice, attend to this my call: come nigh, O ye Twain Gods, to all libations here. Accordant, of one mind with Surya and with Dawn, O Asvins, bring us strengthening food.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 35
sanskrit: सतोमं जुषेथां युवशेव कन्यनां विश्वेह देवौ सवनाव गछतम | सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येन चेषं ...
transliteration: stomaṃ juṣethāṃ yuvaśeva kanyanāṃ viśveha devau savanāva ghachatam | sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryena ceṣaṃ ...
translation: Accept our praise-song as a youth accepts a maid. Come nigh, O ye Twain Gods, to all libations here. Accordant, of one mind with Sarya and with Dawn O Asvins, bring us strengthening food.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 35
sanskrit: गिरो जुषेथामध्वरं जुषेथां विश्वेह देवौ सवनाव गछतम | सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण चेषं ...
transliteration: ghiro juṣethāmadhvaraṃ juṣethāṃ viśveha devau savanāva ghachatam | sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ceṣaṃ ...
translation: Accept the songs we sing, accept the solemn rite. Conie nigh, O ye Twain Gods, to all libations here. Accordant, of one mind with Surya and with Dawn, O Asvins, bring us strengthening food.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 35
sanskrit: हारिद्रवेव पतथो वनेदुप सोमं सुतं महिषेवाव गछथः | सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण च तरिर्वर्तिर्यातमश्विना
transliteration: hāridraveva patatho vanedupa somaṃ sutaṃ mahiṣevāva ghachathaḥ | sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca tririgvedaartiryātamaśvinā
translation: Ye fly as starlings fly unto the forest trees; like buffaloes ye seek the Soma we have shed. Accordant, of one mind with Surya and with Dawn, come thrice, O Asvins, to our home.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 35
sanskrit: हंसाविव पतथो अध्वगाविव सोमं सुतं महिषेवाव गछथः | सजोषसा उषसा सूर्येण च तरिर...
transliteration: haṃsāviva patatho adhvaghāviva somaṃ sutaṃ mahiṣevāva ghachathaḥ | sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca trir...
translation: Ye fly like swans, like those who travel on their way; like buffaloes ye seek the Soma we have shed. Accordant, of one mind with Surya and with Dawn, come thrice, O Asvins, to our home.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 36
sanskrit: अवितासि सुन्वतो वर्क्तबर्हिषः पिबा सोमं मदाय कं शतक्रतो | यं ते भागमधारयन विश्वाः सेहानः पर्तना उरु जरयः समप्सुजिन मरुत्वानिन्द्र सत्पते
transliteration: avitāsi sunvato vṛktabarhiṣaḥ pibā somaṃ madāya kaṃ śatakrato | yaṃ te bhāghamadhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ samapsujin marutvānindra satpate
translation: THOU helpest him whose grass is trimmed, who sheds the juice, O Satakratu, drink Soma to make thee glad. The share which they have fixed for thee, thou, Indra, Victor o'er all hosts and space, begirt with Maruts, Lord of Heroes, winner of the floods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 36
sanskrit: पराव सतोतारं मघवन्नव तवां पिबा सोमं मदाय कंशतक्रतो | यं ते भागं ...
transliteration: prāva stotāraṃ maghavannava tvāṃ pibā somaṃ madāya kaṃśatakrato | yaṃ te bhāghaṃ ...
translation: Maghavan, help thy worshipper: let him help thee. O Satakratu, drink Soma to make thee glad. The share which they have fixed for thee, etc.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 37
sanskrit: परेदं बरह्म वर्त्रतूर्येष्वाविथ पर सुन्वतः शचीपत इन्द्र विश्वाभिरूतिभिः | माध्यन्दिनस्य सवनस्य वर्त्रहन्ननेद्य पिबा सोमस्य वज्रिवः
transliteration: predaṃ brahma vṛtratūryeṣvāvitha pra sunvataḥ śacīpata indra viśvābhirūtibhiḥ | mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahannanedya pibā somasya vajrivaḥ
translation: THIS prayer, and those who shed the juice, in wars with Vrtra thou holpest, Indra, Lord of Strength, with all thy succours. O Vrtra-slayer, from libation poured at noon, drink of the Soma juice, thou blameless Thunderer.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 37
sanskrit: सेहान उग्र पर्तना अभि दरुहः शचीपत इन्द्र विश्वाभिरूतिभिः | माध्यन्दिनस्य ...
transliteration: sehāna ughra pṛtanā abhi druhaḥ śacīpata indra viśvābhirūtibhiḥ | mādhyandinasya ...
translation: Thou mighty Conqueror of hostile armaments, O Indra, Lord of Strength, with all thy saving help.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 37
sanskrit: एकराळ अस्य भुवनस्य राजसि शचीपत इन्द्र विश्वाभिरूतिभिः | माध्यन्दिनस्य ...
transliteration: ekarāḷ asya bhuvanasya rājasi śacīpata indra viśvābhirūtibhiḥ | mādhyandinasya ...
translation: Sole Ruler, thou art Sovran of this world of life, O Indra, Lord of Strength, with all thy saving help.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 37
sanskrit: सस्थावाना यवयसि तवमेक इच्छचीपत इन्द्र विश्वाभिरूतिभिः | माध्यन्दिनस्य ...
transliteration: sasthāvānā yavayasi tvameka icchacīpata indra viśvābhirūtibhiḥ | mādhyandinasya ...
translation: Thou only sunderest these two consistent worlds, O Indra, Lord of Strength, with all thy saving help.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 37
sanskrit: कषेमस्य च परयुजश्च तवमीशिषे शचीपत इन्द्र विश्वाभिरूतिभिः | माध्यन्दिनस्य ...
transliteration: kṣemasya ca prayujaśca tvamīśiṣe śacīpata indra viśvābhirūtibhiḥ | mādhyandinasya ...
translation: Thou art the Lord supreme o'er rest and energy, O Indra, Lord of Strength, with all thy saving help.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 37
sanskrit: कषत्राय तवमवसि न तवमाविथ शचीपत इन्द्र विश्वाभिरूतिभिः | माध्यन्दिनस्य ...
transliteration: kṣatrāya tvamavasi na tvamāvitha śacīpata indra viśvābhirūtibhiḥ | mādhyandinasya ...
translation: Thou helpest one to power, and one thou hast not helped, O Indra, Lord of Strength, with all thy saving aid.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 38
sanskrit: यज्ञस्य हि सथ रत्विजा सस्नी वाजेषु कर्मसु | इन्द्राग्नीतस्य बोधतम
transliteration: yajñasya hi stha ṛtvijā sasnī vājeṣu karmasu | indrāghnītasya bodhatam
translation: YE Twain are Priests of sacrifice, winners in war and holy works: Indra and Agni, mark this well.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 38
sanskrit: तोशासा रथयावाना वर्त्रहणापराजिता | इन्द्राग्नी तस्य बोधतम
transliteration: tośāsā rathayāvānā vṛtrahaṇāparājitā | indrāghnī tasya bodhatam
translation: Ye bounteous riders on the car, ye Vrtra-slayers unsubdued: Indra and Agni, mark this well.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 38
sanskrit: इदं वां मदिरं मध्वधुक्षन्नद्रिभिर्नरः | इन्द्राग्नी तस्य बोधतम
transliteration: idaṃ vāṃ madiraṃ madhvadhukṣannadribhirnaraḥ | indrāghnī tasya bodhatam
translation: The men with pressing-stones have pressed this meath of yours which gives delight: Indra, and Agni, mark this well.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 38
sanskrit: जुषेथां यज्ञमिष्टये सुतं सोमं सधस्तुती | इन्द्राग्नी आ गतं नरा
transliteration: juṣethāṃ yajñamiṣṭaye sutaṃ somaṃ sadhastutī | indrāghnī ā ghataṃ narā
translation: Accept our sacrifice for weal, sharers of praise! the Soma shed: Indra and Agni, Heroes, come.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 38
sanskrit: इमा जुषेथां सवना येभिर्हव्यान्यूहथुः | इन्द्राग्नीा गतं नरा
transliteration: imā juṣethāṃ savanā yebhirhavyānyūhathuḥ | indrāghnīā ghataṃ narā
translation: Be pleased with these libations which attract you to our sacred gifts Indra and Agni, Heroes, come.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 38
sanskrit: इमां गायत्रवर्तनिं जुषेथां सुष्टुतिं मम | इन्द्राग्नी आ गतं नरा
transliteration: imāṃ ghāyatravartaniṃ juṣethāṃ suṣṭutiṃ mama | indrāghnī ā ghataṃ narā
translation: Accept this eulogy of mine whose model is the Gayatri: Indra and Agni, Heroes, Come.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 38
sanskrit: परातर्यावभिरा गतं देवेभिर्जेन्यावसू | इन्द्राग्नी सोमपीतये
transliteration: prātaryāvabhirā ghataṃ devebhirjenyāvasū | indrāghnī somapītaye
translation: Come with the early-faring Gods, ye who are Lords of genuine wealth: Indra-Agni, to the Soma-draught

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 39
sanskrit: अग्निमस्तोष्य रग्मियमग्निमीळा यजध्यै | अग्निर्देवाननक्तु न उभे हि विदथे कविरन्तश्चरति दूत्यं नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: aghnimastoṣy ṛghmiyamaghnimīḷā yajadhyai | aghnirdevānanaktu na ubhe hi vidathe kavirantaścarati dūtyaṃ nabhantāmanyake same
translation: THE glorious Agni have I praised, and worshipped with. the sacred food. May Agni deck the Gods for us. Between both gathering-places he goes on his embassy, the Sage. May all the others die away.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 39
sanskrit: नयग्ने नव्यसा वचस्तनूषु शंसमेषाम | नयराती रराव्णां विश्वा अर्यो अरातीरितो युछन्त्वामुरो नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: nyaghne navyasā vacastanūṣu śaṃsameṣām | nyarātī rarāvṇāṃ viśvā aryo arātīrito yuchantvāmuro nabhantāmanyake same
translation: Agni, burn down the word within their bodies through our newest speech, All hatreds of the godless, all the wicked man's malignities. Away let the destroyers go. May all the others die away.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 39
sanskrit: अग्ने मन्मानि तुभ्यं कं घर्तं न जुह्व आसनि | स देवेषु पर चिकिद्धि तवं हयसि पूर्व्यः शिवो दूतो विवस्वतो नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: aghne manmāni tubhyaṃ kaṃ ghṛtaṃ na juhva āsani | sa deveṣu pra cikiddhi tvaṃ hyasi pūrigvedayaḥ śivo dūto vivasvato nabhantāmanyake same
translation: Agni, I offer hymns to thee, like holy oil within thy mouth. Acknowledge them. among the Gods, for thou art the most excellent, the worshipper's blissful messenger. Let all the others die away.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 39
sanskrit: तत-तदग्निर्वयो दधे यथा-यथा कर्पण्यति | ऊर्जाहुतिर्वसूनां शं च योश्च मयो दधे विश्वस्यै देवहूत्यै नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: tat-tadaghnirigvedaayo dadhe yathā-yathā kṛpaṇyati |
translation: Agni bestows all vital power even as each man supplicates. He brings the Vasus strengthening gifts, and grants delight, in rest and stir, for every calling on the Gods. Let all the others die away.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 40
sanskrit: इन्द्राग्नी युवं सु नः सहन्ता दासथो रयिम | येन दर्ळ्हा समत्स्वा वीळु चित साहिषीमह्यग्निर्वनेव वात इन नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: indrāghnī yuvaṃ su naḥ sahantā dāsatho rayim | yena dṛḷhā samatsvā vīḷu cit sāhiṣīmahyaghnirigvedaaneva vāta in nabhantāmanyake same
translation: INDRA and Agni, surely ye as Conquerors will give us wealth, Whereby in fight we may o'ercome that which is strong and firmly fixed, as Agni burns the woods with wind. Let all the others die away.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 40
sanskrit: नहि वां वव्रयामहे.अथेन्द्रमिद यजामहे शविष्ठं नर्णां नरम | स नः कदा चिदर्वता गमदा वाजसातयेगमदा मेधसातये नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: nahi vāṃ vavrayāmahe.athendramid yajāmahe śaviṣṭhaṃ nṛṇāṃ naram | sa naḥ kadā cidarigvedaatā ghamadā vājasātayeghamadā medhasātaye nabhantāmanyake same
translation: We set no snares to tangle you; Indra we worship and adore, Hero of heroes mightiest. Once may he come unto us with his Steed, come unto us to win us strength, and to complete the sacrifice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 40
sanskrit: ता हि मध्यं भराणामिन्द्राग्नी अधिक्षितः | ता उ कवित्वना कवी पर्छ्यमाना सखीयते सं धीतमश्नुतं नरा नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: tā hi madhyaṃ bharāṇāmindrāghnī adhikṣitaḥ | tā u kavitvanā kavī pṛchyamānā sakhīyate saṃ dhītamaśnutaṃ narā nabhantāmanyake same
translation: For, famous Indra-Agni, ye are dwellers in the midst of frays. Sages in wisdom, ye are knit to him who seeketh you as friends. Heroes, bestow on him his wish.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 40
sanskrit: अभ्यर्च नभाकवदिन्द्राग्नी यजसा गिरा | ययोर्विश्वमिदं जगदियं दयौः पर्थिवी मह्युपस्थे बिभ्र्तो वसु नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: abhyarca nabhākavadindrāghnī yajasā ghirā | yayorigvedaśvamidaṃ jaghadiyaṃ dyauḥ pṛthivī mahyupasthe bibhṛto vasu nabhantāmanyake same
translation: Nabhaka-like, with sacred song Indra's and Agni's praise I sing, Theirs to whom all this world belongs, this heaven and this mighty earth which bear rich treasure in their lap.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 40
sanskrit: पर बरह्माणि नभाकवदिन्द्राग्निभ्यामिरज्यत | या सप्तबुध्नमर्णवं जिह्मबारमपोर्णुत इन्द्र ईशान ओजसा नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: pra brahmāṇi nabhākavadindrāghnibhyāmirajyata | yā saptabudhnamarṇavaṃ jihmabāramaporṇuta indra īśāna ojasā nabhantāmanyake same
translation: To Indra and to Agni send your prayers, as was Nabhaka's wont,- Who open with sideway opening the sea with its foundations seven-Indra all powerful in his might.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 40
sanskrit: अपि वर्श्च पुराणवद वरततेरिव गुष्पितमोजो दासस्य दम्भय | वयं तदस्य सम्भ्र्तं वस्विन्द्रेण वि भजेमहि नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: api vṛśca purāṇavad vratateriva ghuṣpitamojo dāsasya dambhaya | vayaṃ tadasya sambhṛtaṃ vasvindreṇa vi bhajemahi nabhantāmanyake same
translation: Tear thou asunder, as of old, like tangles of a creeping plant, Demolish thou the Dasa's might. May we with Indra's help divide the treasure he hath gathered up.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 40
sanskrit: यदिन्द्राग्नी जना इमे विह्वयन्ते तना गिरा | अस्माकेभिर्न्र्भिर्वयं सासह्याम पर्तन्यतो वनुयाम वनुष्यतो नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: yadindrāghnī janā ime vihvayante tanā ghirā | asmākebhirnṛbhirigvedaayaṃ sāsahyāma pṛtanyato vanuyāma vanuṣyato nabhantāmanyake same
translation: What time with this same song these men call Indra-Agni sundry ways, May we with our own heroes quell those who provoke us to the fight, and conquer those who strive with us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 40
sanskrit: या नु शवेताववो दिव उच्चरात उप दयुभिः | इन्द्राग्न्योरनु वरतमुहाना यन्ति सिन्धवो यान सीं बन्धादमुञ्चतां नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: yā nu śvetāvavo diva uccarāta upa dyubhiḥ | indrāghnyoranu vratamuhānā yanti sindhavo yān sīṃ bandhādamuñcatāṃ nabhantāmanyake same
translation: The Two refulgent with their beams rise and come downward from the sky. By Indra's and by Agni's behest, flowing away, the rivers, run which they released from their restraint.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 40
sanskrit: पूर्वीष ट इन्द्रोपमातयः पूर्वीरुत परशस्तयः सूनोहिन्वस्य हरिवः | वस्वो वीरस्याप्र्चो या नु साधन्त नो धियो नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: pūrigvedaīṣ ṭa indropamātayaḥ pūrigvedaīruta praśastayaḥ sūnohinvasya harivaḥ | vasvo vīrasyāpṛco yā nu sādhanta no dhiyo nabhantāmanyake same
translation: O Indra, many are thine aids, many thy ways of guiding us, Lord of the Bay Steeds, Hinva's Son. To a Good Hero come our prayers, which soon shall have accomplishment.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 40
sanskrit: तं शिशीता सुव्र्क्तिभिस्त्वेषं सत्वानं रग्मियम | उतो नुचिद य ओजसा शुष्णस्याण्डानि भेदति जेषत सवर्वतीरपो नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: taṃ śiśītā suvṛktibhistveṣaṃ satvānaṃ ṛghmiyam | uto nucid ya ojasā śuṣṇasyāṇḍāni bhedati jeṣat svarigvedaatīrapo nabhantāmanyake same
translation: Inspire him with your holy hymns, the Hero bright and glorious, Him who with might demolisheth even the brood of Susna, and winneth for us the heavenly streams.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 40
sanskrit: तं शिशीता सवध्वरं सत्यं सत्वानं रत्वियम | उतो नुचिद य ओहत आण्डा शुष्णस्य भेदत्यजैः सवर्वतीरपो नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: taṃ śiśītā svadhvaraṃ satyaṃ satvānaṃ ṛtviyam | uto nucid ya ohata āṇḍā śuṣṇasya bhedatyajaiḥ svarigvedaatīrapo nabhantāmanyake same
translation: Inspire him worshipped with fair rites, the glorious Hero truly brave. He brake in pieces Susna's brood who still expected not the stroke, and won for us the heavenly streams. Let all the others die away.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 40
sanskrit: एवेन्द्राग्निभ्यां पित्र्वन नवीयो मन्धात्र्वदङगिरस्वदवाचि | तरिधातुना शर्मणा पातमस्मान वयं सयाम पतयो रयीणाम
transliteration: evendrāghnibhyāṃ pitṛvan navīyo mandhātṛvadaṅghirasvadavāci | tridhātunā śarmaṇā pātamasmān vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām
translation: Thus have we sung anew to Indra-Agni, as sang our sires, Angirases, and Mandhatar. Guard us with triple shelter and preserve us: may we be masters of a store of riches.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 41
sanskrit: अस्मा ऊ षु परभूतये वरुणाय मरुद्भ्यो.अर्चा विदुष्टरेभ्यः | यो धीता मानुषाणां पश्वो गा इव रक्षति नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: asmā ū ṣu prabhūtaye varuṇāya marudbhyo.arcā viduṣṭarebhyaḥ | yo dhītā mānuṣāṇāṃ paśvo ghā iva rakṣati nabhantāmanyake same
translation: To make this Varuna come forth sing thou a song unto the band of Maruts wiser than thyself,- This Varuna who guardeth well the thoughts of men like herds of kine. Let all the others die away.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 41
sanskrit: तमू षु समना गिरा पितॄणां च मन्मभिः नाभाकस्यप्रशस्तिभिर्यः सिन्धूनामुपोदये सप्तस्वसा स मध्यमो नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: tamū ṣu samanā ghirā pitṝṇāṃ ca manmabhiḥ nābhākasyapraśastibhiryaḥ sindhūnāmupodaye saptasvasā sa madhyamo nabhantāmanyake same
translation: Him altogether praise I with the song and hymns our fathers sang, and with Nabhaka's eulogies,- Him dwelling at the rivers' source, surrounded by his Sisters Seven.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 41
sanskrit: स कषपः परि षस्वजे नयुस्रो मायया दधे स विश्वं परि दर्शतः | तस्य वेनीरनु वरतमुषस्तिस्रो अवर्धयन्नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: sa kṣapaḥ pari ṣasvaje nyusro māyayā dadhe sa viśvaṃ pari darśataḥ | tasya venīranu vratamuṣastisro avardhayannabhantāmanyake same
translation: The nights he hath encompassed, and stablished the morns with magic art visible over all is he. His dear Ones, following his Law, have prospered the Three Dawns for him.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 41
sanskrit: यः ककुभो निधारयः पर्थिव्यामधि दर्शतः | स माता पूर्व्यं पदं तद वरुणस्य सप्त्यं स हि गोपा इवेर्योनभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: yaḥ kakubho nidhārayaḥ pṛthivyāmadhi darśataḥ | sa mātā pūrigvedayaṃ padaṃ tad varuṇasya saptyaṃ sa hi ghopā iveryonabhantāmanyake same
translation: He, visible o'er all the earth, stablished the quarters of the sky: He measured out the eastern place, that is the fold of Varuna: like a strong herdsman is the God.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 41
sanskrit: यो धर्ता भुवनानां य उस्राणामपीच्या वेद नामानिगुह्या | स कविः काव्या पुरु रूपं दयौरिव पुष्यति नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: yo dhartā bhuvanānāṃ ya usrāṇāmapīcyā veda nāmānighuhyā | sa kaviḥ kāvyā puru rūpaṃ dyauriva puṣyati nabhantāmanyake same
translation: He who supports the worlds of life, he who well knows the hidden names mysterious of the morning beams, He cherishes much wisdom, Sage, as heaven brings forth each varied form.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 41
sanskrit: यस्मिन विश्वानि काव्या चक्रे नाभिरिव शरिता | तरितं जूती सपर्यत वरजे गावो न संयुजे युजे अश्वानयुक्षत नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: yasmin viśvāni kāvyā cakre nābhiriva śritā | tritaṃ jūtī saparyata vraje ghāvo na saṃyuje yuje aśvānayukṣata nabhantāmanyake same
translation: In whom all wisdom centres, as the nave is set within the wheel. Haste ye to honour Trita, as kine haste to gather in the fold, even as they muster steeds to yoke.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 41
sanskrit: य आस्वत्क आशये विश्वा जातान्येषाम | परि धामानि मर्म्र्शद वरुणस्य पुरो गये विश्वे देवा अनु वरतं नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: ya āsvatka āśaye viśvā jātānyeṣām | pari dhāmāni marmṛśad varuṇasya puro ghaye viśve devā anu vrataṃ nabhantāmanyake same
translation: He wraps these regions as a robe; he contemplates the tribes of Gods and all the works of mortal men. Before the home of Varuna all the Gods follow his decree.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 41
sanskrit: स समुद्रो अपीच्यस्तुरो दयामिव रोहति नि यदासु यजुर्दधे | स माया अर्चिना पदास्त्र्णान नाकमारुहन नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: sa samudro apīcyasturo dyāmiva rohati ni yadāsu yajurdadhe | sa māyā arcinā padāstṛṇān nākamāruhan nabhantāmanyake same
translation: He is an Ocean far-removed, yet through the heaven to him ascends the worship which these realms possess. With his bright foot he overthrew their magic, and went up to heaven.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 41
sanskrit: यस्य शवेता विचक्षणा तिस्रो भूमीरधिक्षितः | तरिरुत्तराणि पप्रतुर्वरुणस्य धरुवं सदः स सप्तानामिरज्यति नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: yasya śvetā vicakṣaṇā tisro bhūmīradhikṣitaḥ | triruttarāṇi papraturigvedaaruṇasya dhruvaṃ sadaḥ sa saptānāmirajyati nabhantāmanyake same
translation: Ruler, whose bright far-seeing rays, pervading all three earths, have filled the three superior realms of heaven. Firm is the seat of Varuna: over the Seven he rules as King.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 41
sanskrit: यः शवेतानधिनिर्णिजश्चक्रे कर्ष्णाननु वरता | स धाम पूर्व्यं ममे य सकम्भेन वि रोदसी अजो न दयामधारयन नभन्तामन्यके समे
transliteration: yaḥ śvetānadhinirṇijaścakre kṛṣṇānanu vratā | sa dhāma pūrigvedayaṃ mame ya skambhena vi rodasī ajo na dyāmadhārayan nabhantāmanyake same
translation: Who, after his decree, o'erspread the Dark Ones with a robe of light; Who measured out the ancient seat, who pillared both the worlds apart as the Unborn supported heaven. Let all the others die away.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 42
sanskrit: अस्तभ्नाद दयामसुरो विश्ववेदा अमिमीत वरिमाणं पर्थिव्याः | आसीदद विश्वा भुवनानि सम्राड विश्वेत तानि वरुणस्य वरतानि
transliteration: astabhnād dyāmasuro viśvavedā amimīta varimāṇaṃ pṛthivyāḥ |
translation: LORD of all wealth, the Asura propped the heavens, and measured out the broad earth's wide expanses. He, King supreme, approached all living creatures. All these are Varuna's holy operations.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 43
sanskrit: इमे विप्रस्य वेधसो.अग्नेरस्त्र्तयज्वनः | गिरः सतोमास ईरते
transliteration: ime viprasya vedhaso.aghnerastṛtayajvanaḥ | ghiraḥ stomāsa īrate
translation: THESE songs of mine go forth as lauds of Agni, the disposing Sage, Whose worshipper is ne'er o'erthrawn.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 43
sanskrit: अस्मै ते परतिहर्यते जातवेदो विचर्षणे | अग्ने जनामि सुष्टुतिम
transliteration: asmai te pratiharyate jātavedo vicarṣaṇe | aghne janāmi suṣṭutim
translation: Wise Agni Jatavedas, I beget a song of praise for thee. Who willingly receivest it.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 44
sanskrit: समिधाग्निं दुवस्यत घर्तैर्बोधयतातिथिम | आस्मिन हव्याजुहोतन
transliteration: samidhāghniṃ duvasyata ghṛtairbodhayatātithim |
translation: PAY service unto Agni with your fuel, rouse your Guest with oil: In him present your offerings.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 45
sanskrit: आ घा ये अग्निमिन्धते सत्र्णन्ति बर्हिरानुषक | येषामिन्द्रो युवा सखा
transliteration: yeṣāmindro yuvā sakhā
translation: HITHERWARD! they who light flame and straightway trim the sacred grass. Whose Friend is Indra ever young.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 45
sanskrit: बर्हन्निदिध्म एषां भूरि शस्तं पर्थुः सवरुः | येषामिन्द्रो युवा सखा
transliteration: bṛhannididhma eṣāṃ bhūri śastaṃ pṛthuḥ svaruḥ | yeṣāmindro yuvā sakhā
translation: High is their fuel, great their laud, wide is their splinter from the stake, Whose Friend is Indra ever young.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 45
sanskrit: अयुद्ध इद युधा वर्तं शूर आजति सत्वभिः | येषामिन्द्रो युवा सखा
transliteration: ayuddha id yudhā vṛtaṃ śūra ājati satvabhiḥ | yeṣāmindro yuvā sakhā
translation: Unequalled in fight the hero leads his army with the warrior chiefs. Whose Friend is Indra ever young.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 46
sanskrit: तवावतः पुरूवसो वयमिन्द्र परणेतः समसि सथातर्हरीणाम
transliteration: tvāvataḥ purūvaso vayamindra praṇetaḥ smasi sthātarharīṇām
translation: WE, Indra, Lord of ample wealth, our Guide, depend on one like thee, Thou driver of the Tawny Steeds.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 46
sanskrit: तवां हि सत्यमद्रिवो विद्म दातारमिषाम | विद्म दातारं रयीणाम
transliteration: tvāṃ hi satyamadrivo vidma dātāramiṣām | vidma dātāraṃ rayīṇām
translation: For, Hurler of the Bolt, we know thee true, the giver of our food, We know the giver of our wealth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 47
sanskrit: महि वो महतामवो वरुण मित्र दाशुषे | यमादित्या अभि दरुहो रक्षथा नेमघं नशदनेहसो व ऊतयः सुूतयो व ऊतयः
transliteration: mahi vo mahatāmavo varuṇa mitra dāśuṣe | yamādityā abhi druho rakṣathā nemaghaṃ naśadanehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
translation: GREAT help ye give the worshipper, Varuna, Mitra, Mighty Ones! No sorrow ever reaches him whom ye, Adityas, keep from harm. Yours are incomparable aids, and good the succour they afford.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 47
sanskrit: विदा देवा अघानामादित्यासो अपाक्र्तिम | पक्षा वयो यथोपरि वयस्मे शर्म यछतानेहसो व ऊतयः सुूतयो व ऊतयः
transliteration: vidā devā aghānāmādityāso apākṛtim | pakṣā vayo yathopari vyasme śarma yachatānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
translation: O Gods, Adityas, well ye know the way to keep all woes afar. As the birds spread their sheltering wings, spread your protection over us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 47
sanskrit: वयस्मे अधि शर्म तत पक्षा वयो न यन्तन | विश्वानि विश्ववेदसो वरूथ्या मनामहे.अनेहसो व ऊतयः सुूतयो व ऊतयः
transliteration: vyasme adhi śarma tat pakṣā vayo na yantana | viśvāni viśvavedaso varūthyā manāmahe.anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
translation: As the birds spread their sheltering wings let your protection cover us. We mean all shelter and defense, ye who have all things for your own.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 47
sanskrit: यस्मा अरासत कषयं जीवातुं च परचेतसः | मनोर्विश्वस्य घेदिम आदित्या राय ईशते.अनेहसो व ऊतयः सुूतयो व ऊतयः
transliteration: yasmā arāsata kṣayaṃ jīvātuṃ ca pracetasaḥ | manorigvedaśvasya ghedima ādityā rāya īśate.anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
translation: To whomsoever they, Most Wise, have given a home and means of life, O'er the whole riches of this man they, the Adityas, have control.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 47
sanskrit: परि णो वर्णजन्नघा दुर्गाणि रथ्यो यथा | सयामेदिन्द्रस्य शर्मण्यादित्यानामुतावस्यनेहसो व ऊतयः सुूतयो व ऊतयः
transliteration: pari ṇo vṛṇajannaghā durghāṇi rathyo yathā | syāmedindrasya śarmaṇyādityānāmutāvasyanehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
translation: As drivers of the car avoid ill roads, let sorrows pass us by. May we be under Indra's guard, in the Adityas' favouring grace.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 47
sanskrit: परिह्व्र्तेदना जनो युष्मादत्तस्य वायति | देवा अदभ्रमाश वो यमादित्या अहेतनानेहसो व ऊतयः सुूतयो व ऊतयः
transliteration: parihvṛtedanā jano yuṣmādattasya vāyati | devā adabhramāśa vo yamādityā ahetanānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
translation: For verily men sink and faint through loss of wealth which ye have given. Much hath he gained from you, O Gods, whom ye, Adityas, have approached.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 47
sanskrit: न तं तिग्मं चन तयजो न दरासदभि तं गुरु | यस्मा उ शर्म सप्रथ आदित्यासो अराध्वमनेहसो व ऊतयः सुूतयो व ऊतयः
transliteration: na taṃ tighmaṃ cana tyajo na drāsadabhi taṃ ghuru | yasmā u śarma sapratha ādityāso arādhvamanehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
translation: On him shall no fierce anger fall, no sore distress shall visit him, To whom, Adityas, ye have lent your shelter that extendeth far.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 47
sanskrit: युष्मे देवा अपि षमसि युध्यन्त इव वर्मसु | यूयं महो न एनसो यूयमर्भादुरुष्यतानेहसो व ऊतयः सुूतयो व ऊतयः
transliteration: yuṣme devā api ṣmasi yudhyanta iva varmasu | yūyaṃ maho na enaso yūyamarbhāduruṣyatānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
translation: Resting in you, O Gods, we are like men who fight in coats of mail. Ye guard us from each great offence, ye guard us from each lighter fault.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 47
sanskrit: अदितिर्न उरुष्यत्वदितिः शर्म यछतु | माता मित्रस्य रेवतो.अर्यम्णो वरुणस्य चानेहसो व ऊतयः सुूतयो व ऊतयः
transliteration: aditirna uruṣyatvaditiḥ śarma yachatu | mātā mitrasya revato.aryamṇo varuṇasya cānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
translation: May Aditi defend us, may Aditi guard and shelter us, Mother of wealthy Mitra and of Aryaman and Varuna.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 47
sanskrit: यद देवाः शर्म शरणं यद भद्रं यदनातुरम | तरिधातु यद वरूथ्यं तदस्मासु वि यन्तनानेहसो व उतयःसुूतयो व ऊतयः
transliteration: yad devāḥ śarma śaraṇaṃ yad bhadraṃ yadanāturam | tridhātu yad varūthyaṃ tadasmāsu vi yantanānehaso va utayaḥsuūtayo va ūtayaḥ
translation: The shelter, Gods, that is secure, auspicious, free from malady, A sure protection, triply strong, even that do ye extend to us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 48
sanskrit: सवादोरभक्षि वयसः सुमेधाः सवाध्यो वरिवोवित्तरस्य | विश्वे यं देवा उत मर्त्यासो मधु बरुवन्तो अभि संचरन्ति
transliteration: svādorabhakṣi vayasaḥ sumedhāḥ svādhyo varivovittarasya | viśve yaṃ devā uta martyāso madhu bruvanto abhi saṃcaranti
translation: WISELY have I enjoyed the savoury viand, religious-thoughted, best to find out treasure, The food to which all Deities and mortals, calling it meath, gather themselves together.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 48
sanskrit: अन्तश्च परागा अदितिर्भवास्यवयाता हरसो दैव्यस्य | इन्दविन्द्रस्य सख्यं जुषाणः शरौष्टीव धुरमनु राय रध्याः
transliteration: antaśca prāghā aditirbhavāsyavayātā haraso daivyasya | indavindrasya sakhyaṃ juṣāṇaḥ śrauṣṭīva dhuramanu rāya ṛdhyāḥ
translation: Thou shalt be Aditi as thou hast entered within, appeaser of celestial anger. Indu, enjoying Indra's friendship, bring us - as a swift steed the car - forward to riches.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 48
sanskrit: अपाम सोममम्र्ता अभूमागन्म जयोतिरविदाम देवान | किं नूनमस्मान कर्णवदरातिः किमु धूर्तिरम्र्त मर्त्यस्य
transliteration: apāma somamamṛtā abhūmāghanma jyotiravidāma devān | kiṃ nūnamasmān kṛṇavadarātiḥ kimu dhūrtiramṛta martyasya
translation: We have drunk Soma and become immortal; we have attained the light, the Gods discovered. Now what may foeman's malice do to harm us? What, O Immortal, mortal man's deception?

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 49
sanskrit: अभि पर वः सुराधसमिन्द्रमर्च यथा विदे | यो जरित्रिभ्यो मघवा पुरूवसुः सहस्रेणेव शिक्षति
transliteration: abhi pra vaḥ surādhasamindramarca yathā vide | yo jaritribhyo maghavā purūvasuḥ sahasreṇeva śikṣati
translation: AGNI, come hither with thy fires; we choose thee as Invoking Priest. Let the extended ladle full of oil balm thee, best Priest, to sit on sacred grass.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 50
sanskrit: पर सु शरुतं सुराधसमर्चा शक्रमभिष्टये | यः सुन्वते सतुवते काम्यं वसु सहस्रेणेव मंहते
transliteration: pra su śrutaṃ surādhasamarcā śakramabhiṣṭaye | yaḥ sunvate stuvate kāmyaṃ vasu sahasreṇeva maṃhate
translation: BOTH boons,-may Indra, hitherward turned, listen to this prayer of ours, And mightiest Maghavan with thought inclined to us come near to drink the Soma juice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 51
sanskrit: यथा मनौ सांवरणौ सोममिन्द्रापिबः सुतम | नीपातिथौ मघवन मेध्यातिथौ पुष्टिगौ शरुष्टिगौ सचा
transliteration: yathā manau sāṃvaraṇau somamindrāpibaḥ sutam | nīpātithau maghavan medhyātithau puṣṭighau śruṣṭighau sacā
translation: OFFER ye up as praise to him that wherein Indra takes delight. The Soma-bringers magnify Indra's great energy with hymns. Good are the gifts that Indra gives.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 51
sanskrit: पार्षद्वाणः परस्कण्वं समसादयच्छयानं जिव्रिमुद्धितम | सहस्राण्यसिषासद गवां रषिस्त्वोतो दस्यवे वर्कः
transliteration: pārṣadvāṇaḥ praskaṇvaṃ samasādayacchayānaṃ jivrimuddhitam | sahasrāṇyasiṣāsad ghavāṃ ṛṣistvoto dasyave vṛkaḥ
translation: Sole among chiefs, companionless, impetuous, and peerless, he Hath waxen great o'er many folk, yea., over all things born, in might.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 51
sanskrit: य उक्थेभिर्न विन्धते चिकिद य रषिचोदनः | इन्द्रं तमछा वद नव्यस्या मत्यरिष्यन्तं न भोजसे
transliteration: ya ukthebhirna vindhate cikid ya ṛṣicodanaḥ | indraṃ tamachā vada navyasyā matyariṣyantaṃ na bhojase
translation: Lord of swift bounty, he will win e'en with a steed of worthless sort. This, Indra, must be told of thee who wilt perform heroic deeds.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 51
sanskrit: यस्मा अर्कं सप्तशीर्षाणमान्र्चुस्त्रिधातुमुत्तमे पदे | स तविमा विश्वा भुवनानि चिक्रददादिज्जनिष्ट पौंस्यम
transliteration: yasmā arkaṃ saptaśīrṣāṇamānṛcustridhātumuttame pade | sa tvimā viśvā bhuvanāni cikradadādijjaniṣṭa pauṃsyam
translation: Come to us hither: let us pay devotions that enhance thy might, For which, Most Potent! thou wouldst fain bless the man here who strives for fame.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 51
sanskrit: यो नो दाता वसूनामिन्द्रं तं हूमहे वयम | विद्मा हयस्य सुमतिं नवीयसीं गमेम गोमति वरजे
transliteration: yo no dātā vasūnāmindraṃ taṃ hūmahe vayam | vidmā hyasya sumatiṃ navīyasīṃ ghamema ghomati vraje
translation: For thou, O Indra, makest yet more bold the spirit of the bold Who with strong Soma serveth thee, still ready with his reverent prayers.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 51
sanskrit: यस्मै तवं वसो दानाय शिक्षसि स रायस पोषमश्नुते | तं तवा वयं मघवन्निन्द्र गिर्वणः सुतावन्तो हवामहे
transliteration: yasmai tvaṃ vaso dānāya śikṣasi sa rāyas poṣamaśnute | taṃ tvā vayaṃ maghavannindra ghirigvedaaṇaḥ sutāvanto havāmahe
translation: Worthy of song, he looketh down as a man looketh into wells. Pleased with the Soma-bringer's skill he maketh him his mate and friend.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 51
sanskrit: कदा चन सतरीरसि नेन्द्र सश्चसि दाशुषे | उपोपेन नु मघवन भूय इन नु ते दानं देवस्य पर्च्यते
transliteration: kadā cana starīrasi nendra saścasi dāśuṣe | upopen nu maghavan bhūya in nu te dānaṃ devasya pṛcyate
translation: In strength and wisdom all the Gods, Indra, have yielded unto thee. Be thou the Guard of all, O thou whom many praise.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 51
sanskrit: पर यो ननक्षे अभ्योजसा करिविं वधैः शुष्णं निघोषयन | यदेदस्तम्भीत परथयन्नमूं दिवमादिज्जनिष्ट पार्थिवः
transliteration: pra yo nanakṣe abhyojasā kriviṃ vadhaiḥ śuṣṇaṃ nighoṣayan | yadedastambhīt prathayannamūṃ divamādijjaniṣṭa pārthivaḥ
translation: Praised, Indra, is this might of thine, best for the service of the Gods, That thou with power dost slay Vrtra, O Lord of Strength.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 51
sanskrit: यस्यायं विश्व आर्यो दासः शेवधिपा अरिः | तिरश्चिदर्ये रुशमे परीरवि तुभ्येत सो अज्यते रयिः
transliteration: yasyāyaṃ viśva āryo dāsaḥ śevadhipā ariḥ | tiraścidarye ruśame parīravi tubhyet so ajyate rayiḥ
translation: He makes the races of mankind like synods of the Beauteous One. Indra knows this his manifest deed, and is renowned.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 51
sanskrit: तुरण्यवो मधुमन्तं घर्तश्चुतं विप्रासो अर्कमान्र्चुः | अस्मे रयिः पप्रथे वर्ष्ण्यं शवो.अस्मे सुवानास इन्दवः
transliteration: turaṇyavo madhumantaṃ ghṛtaścutaṃ viprāso arkamānṛcuḥ | asme rayiḥ paprathe vṛṣṇyaṃ śavo.asme suvānāsa indavaḥ
translation: Thy might, O Indra, at its birth, thee also, and thy mental power, In thy care, Maghavan rich in kine! they have increased exceedingly.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 52
sanskrit: यथा मनौ विवस्वति सोमं शक्रापिबः सुतम | यथा तरिते छन्द इन्द्र जुजोषस्यायौ मादयसे सचा
transliteration: yathā manau vivasvati somaṃ śakrāpibaḥ sutam | yathā trite chanda indra jujoṣasyāyau mādayase sacā
translation: WITH powers of Mighty Ones hath he, Ancient, Beloved, been equipped, Through whom the Father Manu made prayers efficacious with the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 52
sanskrit: पर्षध्रे मेध्ये मातरिश्वनीन्द्र सुवाने अमन्दथाः | यथा सोमं दशशिप्रे दशोण्ये सयूमरश्माव रजूनसि
transliteration: pṛṣadhre medhye mātariśvanīndra suvāne amandathāḥ | yathā somaṃ daśaśipre daśoṇye syūmaraśmāv ṛjūnasi
translation: Him, Maker of the sky, let stones wet with the Soma ne'er forsake, Nor hymns and prayer that must be said.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 52
sanskrit: य उक्था केवला दधे यः सोमं धर्षितापिबत | यस्मै विष्णुस्त्रीणि पदा विचक्रम उप मित्रस्य धर्मभिः
transliteration: ya ukthā kevalā dadhe yaḥ somaṃ dhṛṣitāpibat | yasmai viṣṇustrīṇi padā vicakrama upa mitrasya dharmabhiḥ
translation: Indra who knew full well disclosed the kine to the Angirases. This his great deed must be extolled.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 52
sanskrit: यस्य तवमिन्द्र सतोमेषु चाकनो वाजे वाजिञ्छतक्रतो | तं तवा वयं सुदुघामिव गोदुहो जुहूमसि शरवस्यवः
transliteration: yasya tvamindra stomeṣu cākano vāje vājiñchatakrato | taṃ tvā vayaṃ sudughāmiva ghoduho juhūmasi śravasyavaḥ
translation: Indra, promoter of the song, the sage's Strengthener as of old, Shall come to bless and succour us at presentation of this laud.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 52
sanskrit: यो नो दाता स नः पिता महानुग्र ईशानक्र्त | अयामन्नुग्रो मघवा पुरूवसुर्गोरश्वस्य पर दातु नः
transliteration: yo no dātā sa naḥ pitā mahānughra īśānakṛt | ayāmannughro maghavā purūvasurghoraśvasya pra dātu naḥ
translation: Now after their desire's intent the pious singers with the cry Of Hail! have sung loud hymns to thee, Indra, to gain a stall of kine.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 52
sanskrit: यस्मै तवं वसो दानाय मंहसे स रायस पोषमिन्वति | वसूयवो वसुपतिं शतक्रतुं सतोमैरिन्द्रं हवामहे
transliteration: yasmai tvaṃ vaso dānāya maṃhase sa rāyas poṣaminvati | vasūyavo vasupatiṃ śatakratuṃ stomairindraṃ havāmahe
translation: With Indra rest all deeds of might, deeds done and yet to be performed, Whom singers know devoid of guile.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 52
sanskrit: कदा चन पर युछस्युभे नि पासि जन्मनी | तुरीयादित्य हवनं त इन्द्रियमा तस्थावम्र्तं दिवि
transliteration: kadā cana pra yuchasyubhe ni pāsi janmanī | turīyāditya havanaṃ ta indriyamā tasthāvamṛtaṃ divi
translation: When the Five Tribes with all their men to Indra have sent out their voice, And when the priest hath strewn much grass, this is the Friend's own dwelling place.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 52
sanskrit: यस्मै तवं मघवन्निन्द्र गिर्वणः शिक्षो शिक्षसि दाशुषे | अस्माकं गिर उत सुष्टुतिं वसो कण्ववच्छ्र्णुधी हवम
transliteration: yasmai tvaṃ maghavannindra ghirigvedaaṇaḥ śikṣo śikṣasi dāśuṣe | asmākaṃ ghira uta suṣṭutiṃ vaso kaṇvavacchṛṇudhī havam
translation: This praise is verily thine own: thou hast performed these manly deeds, And sped the wheel upon its way.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 52
sanskrit: अस्तावि मन्म पूर्व्यं बरह्मेन्द्राय वोचत | पूर्वीरतस्य बर्हतीरनूषत सतोतुर्मेधा अस्र्क्षत
transliteration: astāvi manma pūrigvedayaṃ brahmendrāya vocata | pūrigvedaīrtasya bṛhatīranūṣata stoturmedhā asṛkṣata
translation: At the o'er flowing of this Steer, boldly he strode for life, and took Soma as cattle take their corn.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 52
sanskrit: समिन्द्रो रायो बर्हतीरधूनुत सं कषोणी समु सूर्यम | सं शुक्रासः शुचयः सं गवाशिरः सोमा इन्द्रममन्दिषुः
transliteration: samindro rāyo bṛhatīradhūnuta saṃ kṣoṇī samu sūryam | saṃ śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ saṃ ghavāśiraḥ somā indramamandiṣuḥ
translation: Receiving this and craving help, we, who with you are Daksa's sons, Would fain exalt the Maruts' Lord.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 53
sanskrit: उपमं तवा मघोनां जयेष्ठं च वर्षभाणाम | पूर्भित्तमं मघवन्निन्द्र गोविदमीशानं राय ईमहे
transliteration: upamaṃ tvā maghonāṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ ca vṛṣabhāṇām | pūrbhittamaṃ maghavannindra ghovidamīśānaṃ rāya īmahe
translation: MAY our hymns give thee great delight. Display thy bounty, Thunderer. Drive off the enemies of prayer.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 53
sanskrit: य आयुं कुत्समतिथिग्वमर्दयो वाव्र्धानो दिवे-दिवे | तं तवा वयं हर्यश्वं शतक्रतुं वाजयन्तो हवामहे
transliteration: ya āyuṃ kutsamatithighvamardayo vāvṛdhāno dive-dive | taṃ tvā vayaṃ haryaśvaṃ śatakratuṃ vājayanto havāmahe
translation: Crush with thy foot the niggard churls who bring no gifts. Mighty art thou There is not one to equal thee.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 54
sanskrit: एतत त इन्द्र वीर्यं गीर्भिर्ग्र्णन्ति कारवः | ते सतोभन्त ऊर्जमावन घर्तश्चुतं पौरासो नक्षन धीतिभिः
transliteration: etat ta indra vīryaṃ ghīrbhirghṛṇanti kāravaḥ | te stobhanta ūrjamāvan ghṛtaścutaṃ paurāso nakṣan dhītibhiḥ
translation: THOUGH, Indra, thou art called by men from east and west, from north and south, Come hither quickly with fleet steeds

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 54
sanskrit: नक्षन्त इन्द्रमवसे सुक्र्त्यया येषां सुतेषु मन्दसे | यथा संवर्ते अमदो यथा कर्श एवास्मे इन्द्र मत्स्व
transliteration: nakṣanta indramavase sukṛtyayā yeṣāṃ suteṣu mandase | yathā saṃvarte amado yathā kṛśa evāsme indra matsva
translation: If in the effluence of heaven, rich in its light, thou takest joy, Or in the sea in Soma juice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 55
sanskrit: भूरीदिन्द्रस्य वीर्यं वयख्यमभ्यायति | राधस्ते दस्यवे वर्क
transliteration: bhūrīdindrasya vīryaṃ vyakhyamabhyāyati | rādhaste dasyave vṛka
translation: LOUD singing at the sacred rite where Soma flows we priests invoke With haste, that he may help, as the bard's Cherisher, Indra who findeth wealth for you.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 56
sanskrit: परति ते दस्यवे वर्क राधो अदर्श्यह्रयम | दयौर्न परथिना शवः
transliteration: prati te dasyave vṛka rādho adarśyahrayam | dyaurna prathinā śavaḥ
translation: Now pray we to these Ksatriyas, to the Adityas for their aid, These who are gracious to assist.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 56
sanskrit: दश मह्यं पौतक्रतः सहस्रा दस्यवे वर्कः | नित्याद रायो अमंहत
transliteration: daśa mahyaṃ pautakrataḥ sahasrā dasyave vṛkaḥ | nityād rāyo amaṃhata
translation: May Mitra bear us oer distress, and Varuna and Aryaman, Yea, the Adityas, as they know.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 57
sanskrit: युवं देवा करतुना पूर्व्येण युक्ता रथेन तविषं यजत्रा | आगछतं नासत्या शचीभिरिदं तर्तीयं सवनं पिबाथः
transliteration: yuvaṃ devā kratunā pūrigvedayeṇa yuktā rathena taviṣaṃ yajatrā |
translation: EVEN as a car to give us aid, we draw thee hither for our bliss, Strong in thy deeds, checking assault, Lord, Mightiest Indra, of the brave!

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 58
sanskrit: यं रत्विजो बहुधा कल्पयन्तः सचेतसो यज्ञमिमं वहन्ति | यो अनूचानो बराह्मणो युक्त आसीत का सवित तत्र यजमानस्य संवित
transliteration: yaṃ ṛtvijo bahudhā kalpayantaḥ sacetaso yajñamimaṃ vahanti | yo anūcāno brāhmaṇo yukta āsīt kā svit tatra yajamānasya saṃvit
translation: I SEND you forth the song of praise for Indu, hero-gladdener. With hymn and plenty he invites you to complete the sacrifice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 58
sanskrit: एक एवाग्निर्बहुधा समिद्ध एकः सूर्यो विश्वमनु परभूतः | एकैवोषाः सर्वमिदं वि भात्येकं वा इदंवि बभूव सर्वम
transliteration: eka evāghnirbahudhā samiddha ekaḥ sūryo viśvamanu prabhūtaḥ | ekaivoṣāḥ sarigvedaamidaṃ vi bhātyekaṃ vā idaṃvi babhūva sarigvedaam
translation: Thou wishest for thy kine a bull, for those who long for his approach, For those who turn away from him, lord of thy cows whom none may kill.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 58
sanskrit: जयोतिष्मन्तं केतुमन्तं तरिचक्रं सुखं रथं सुषदं भूरिवारम | चित्रामघा यस्य योगे.अधिजज्ञे तं वां हुवेति रिक्तं पिबध्यै
transliteration: jyotiṣmantaṃ ketumantaṃ tricakraṃ sukhaṃ rathaṃ suṣadaṃ bhūrivāram | citrāmaghā yasya yoghe.adhijajñe taṃ vāṃ huveati riktaṃ pibadhyai
translation: The dappled kine who stream with milk prepare his draught of Soma juice: Clans in the birth-place of the Gods, in the three luminous realms of heaven.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 59
sanskrit: इमानि वां भागधेयानि सिस्रत इन्द्रावरुणा पर महे सुतेषु वाम | यज्ञे-यज्ञे ह सवना भुरण्यथो यत सुन्वते यजमानाय शिक्षथः
transliteration: imāni vāṃ bhāghadheyāni sisrata indrāvaruṇā pra mahe suteṣu vām | yajñe-yajñe ha savanā bhuraṇyatho yat sunvate yajamānāya śikṣathaḥ
translation: HE who, as Sovran Lord of men, moves with his chariots unrestrained, The Vrtra-slayer vanquisher, of fighting hosts, preeminent, is praised with song.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 59
sanskrit: निष्षिध्वरीरोषधीराप आस्तामिन्द्रावरुणा महिमानमाशत | या सिस्रतू रजसः पारे अध्वनो ययोः शत्रुर्नकिरादेव ओहते
transliteration: niṣṣidhvarīroṣadhīrāpa āstāmindrāvaruṇā mahimānamāśata | yā sisratū rajasaḥ pāre adhvano yayoḥ śatrurnakirādeva ohate
translation: Honour that Indra, Puruhanman! for his aid, in whose sustaining hand of old, The splendid bolt of thunder was deposited, as the great Sun was set in heaven.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 59
sanskrit: सत्यं तदिन्द्रावरुणा कर्शस्य वां मध्व ऊर्मिं दुहते सप्त वाणीः | ताभिर्दाश्वांसमवतं शुभस पती यो वामदब्धो अभि पाति चित्तिभिः
transliteration: satyaṃ tadindrāvaruṇā kṛśasya vāṃ madhva ūrmiṃ duhate sapta vāṇīḥ | tābhirdāśvāṃsamavataṃ śubhas patī yo vāmadabdho abhi pāti cittibhiḥ
translation: No one by deed attains to him who works and strengthens evermore: No, not by sacrifice, to Indra. praised o all, resistless, daring, bold in might.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 59
sanskrit: घर्तप्रुषः सौम्या जीरदानवः सप्त सवसारः सदन रतस्य | या ह वामिन्द्रावरुणा घर्तश्चुतस्ताभिर्धत्तं यजमानाय शिक्षतम
transliteration: ghṛtapruṣaḥ saumyā jīradānavaḥ sapta svasāraḥ sadana ṛtasya | yā ha vāmindrāvaruṇā ghṛtaścutastābhirdhattaṃ yajamānāya śikṣatam
translation: The potent Conqueror, invincible in war, him at whose birth the Mighty Ones, The Kine who spread afar, sent their loud voices out, heavens, earths seat their loud voices out,

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 59
sanskrit: अवोचाम महते सौभगाय सत्यं तवेषाभ्यां महिमानमिन्द्रियम | अस्मान सविन्द्रावरुणा घर्तश्चुतस्त्रिभिः साप्तेभिरवतं शुभस पती
transliteration: avocāma mahate saubhaghāya satyaṃ tveṣābhyāṃ mahimānamindriyam | asmān svindrāvaruṇā ghṛtaścutastribhiḥ sāptebhiravataṃ śubhas patī
translation: O Indra, if a hundred heavens and if a hundred earths were thine- No, not a thousand Suns could match thee at thy birth, not both the worlds, O Thunderer.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 59
sanskrit: इन्द्रावरुणा यद रषिभ्यो मनीषां वाचो मतिं शरुतमदत्तमग्रे | यानि सथानान्यस्र्जन्त धीरा यज्ञं तन्वानास्तपसाभ्यपश्यम
transliteration: indrāvaruṇā yad ṛṣibhyo manīṣāṃ vāco matiṃ śrutamadattamaghre | yāni sthānānyasṛjanta dhīrā yajñaṃ tanvānāstapasābhyapaśyam
translation: Thou, Hero, hast performed thy hero deeds with might, yea, all with strength, O Strongest One. Maghavan, help us to a stable full of kine, O Thunderer, with wondrous aids.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 59
sanskrit: इन्द्रावरुणा सौमनसमद्र्प्तं रायस पोषं यजमानेषु धत्तम | परजां पुष्टिं भूतिमस्मासु धत्तं दीर्घायुत्वाय पर तिरतं न आयुः
transliteration: indrāvaruṇā saumanasamadṛptaṃ rāyas poṣaṃ yajamāneṣu dhattam | prajāṃ puṣṭiṃ bhūtimasmāsu dhattaṃ dīrghāyutvāya pra tirataṃ na āyuḥ
translation: Let not a godless mortal gain this food, O thou whose life is long! But one who yokes the bright-hued steeds, the Etasas, even Indra yoker of the Bays.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 60
sanskrit: अग्न आ याह्यग्निभिर्होतारं तवा वर्णीमहे | आ तवामनक्तु परयता हविष्मती यजिष्ठं बर्हिरासदे
transliteration: aghna ā yāhyaghnibhirhotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe |
translation: O AGNI, with thy mighty wealth guard us from all malignity, Yea, from all hate of mortal man.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 61
sanskrit: उभयं शर्णवच्च न इन्द्रो अर्वागिदं वचः | सत्राच्यामघवा सोमपीतये धिया शविष्ठ आ गमत
transliteration: ubhayaṃ śṛṇavacca na indro arigvedaāghidaṃ vacaḥ | satrācyāmaghavā somapītaye dhiyā śaviṣṭha ā ghamat
translation: PREPARE oblation: let him come; and let the minister serve again Who knows the ordering thereof,

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 61
sanskrit: तं हि सवराजं वर्षभं तमोजसे धिषणे निष्टतक्षतुः | उतोपमानां परथमो नि षीदसि सोमकामं हि ते मनः
transliteration: taṃ hi svarājaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tamojase dhiṣaṇe niṣṭatakṣatuḥ | utopamānāṃ prathamo ni ṣīdasi somakāmaṃ hi te manaḥ
translation: Rejoicing in his friendship, let the priest be seated over man, Beside the shoot of active power.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 62
sanskrit: परो अस्मा उपस्तुतिं भरता यज्जुजोषति | उक्थैरिन्द्रस्य माहिनं वयो वर्धन्ति सोमिनो भद्रा इन्द्रस्य रातयः
transliteration: pro asmā upastutiṃ bharatā yajjujoṣati | ukthairindrasya māhinaṃ vayo vardhanti somino bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
translation: ROUSE ye for him who keeps the Law, yoke your steeds, Asvins, to your car Let your protecting help be near.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 62
sanskrit: अयुजो असमो नर्भिरेकः कर्ष्टीरयास्यः | पूर्वीरति पर वाव्र्धे विश्वा जातान्योजसा भद्रा इन्द्रस्य रातयः
transliteration: ayujo asamo nṛbhirekaḥ kṛṣṭīrayāsyaḥ | pūrigvedaīrati pra vāvṛdhe viśvā jātānyojasā bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
translation: Come, Asvins, with your car more swift than is the twinkling of an eye Let your protecting help be near.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 62
sanskrit: अहितेन चिदर्वता जीरदानुः सिषासति | परवाच्यमिन्द्र तत तव वीर्याणि करिष्यतो भद्रा इन्द्रस्य रातयः
transliteration: ahitena cidarigvedaatā jīradānuḥ siṣāsati | pravācyamindra tat tava vīryāṇi kariṣyato bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
translation: Asvins, ye overlaid with cold the fiery pit for Atri's sake: Let your protecting help be near.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 63
sanskrit: स पूर्व्यो महानां वेनः करतुभिरानजे | यस्य दवारा मनुष पिता देवेषु धिय आनजे
transliteration: sa pūrigvedayo mahānāṃ venaḥ kratubhirānaje | yasya dvārā manuṣ pitā deveṣu dhiya ānaje
translation: EXERTING all our strength with thoughts of power we glorify in speech Agni your dear familiar Friend, the darling Guest in every home.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 63
sanskrit: दिवो मानं नोत सदन सोमप्र्ष्ठासो अद्रयः | उक्था बरह्मच शंस्या
transliteration: divo mānaṃ not sadan somapṛṣṭhāso adrayaḥ | ukthā brahmaca śaṃsyā
translation: Whom, served with sacrificial oil like Mitra, men presenting gifts Eulogize with their songs of praise

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 63
sanskrit: स विद्वानङगिरोभ्य इन्द्रो गा अव्र्णोदप | सतुषे तदस्यपौंस्यम
transliteration: sa vidvānaṅghirobhya indro ghā avṛṇodapa | stuṣe tadasyapauṃsyam
translation: Much-lauded Jatavedas, him who bears oblations up to heaven Prepared in service of the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 63
sanskrit: स परत्नथा कविव्र्ध इन्द्रो वाकस्य वक्षणिः | शिवो अर्कस्य होमन्यस्मत्रा गन्त्ववसे
transliteration: sa pratnathā kavivṛdha indro vākasya vakṣaṇiḥ |
translation: To noblest Agni, Friend of man, best Vrtra-slayer, are we come, Him in whose presence Rksa's son, mighty Srutarvan, waxes great;

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 64
sanskrit: उत तवा मन्दन्तु सतोमः कर्णुष्व राधो अद्रिवः | अव बरह्मद्विषो जहि
transliteration: ut tvā mandantu stomaḥ kṛṇuṣva rādho adrivaḥ | ava brahmadviṣo jahi
translation: YOKE, Agni, as a charioteer, thy steeds who best invite the Gods: As ancient Herald seat thyself.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 64
sanskrit: पदा पणीन्रराधसो नि बाधस्व महानसि | नहि तवा कश्चन परति
transliteration: padā paṇīnrarādhaso ni bādhasva mahānasi | nahi tvā kaścana prati
translation: And, God, as skilfullest of all, call for us hitherward the Gods: Give all our wishes sure effect.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 64
sanskrit: तवमीशिषे सुतानामिन्द्र तवमसुतानाम | तवं राजा जनानाम
transliteration: tvamīśiṣe sutānāmindra tvamasutānām | tvaṃ rājā janānām
translation: For thou, Most Youthful, Son of Strength, thou to whom sacrifice is paid, Art holy, faithful to the Law.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 64
sanskrit: एहि परेहि कषयो दिव्याघोषञ्चर्षणीनाम | ओभे पर्णासिरोदसी
transliteration: ehi prehi kṣayo divyāghoṣañcarṣaṇīnām | obhe pṛṇāsirodasī
translation: This Agni, Lord of wealth and spoil hundredfold, thousand fold, is head And chief of riches and a Sage.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 64
sanskrit: तयं चित पर्वतं गिरिं शतवन्तं सहस्रिणम | वि सतोत्र्भ्यो रुरोजिथ
transliteration: tyaṃ cit parigvedaataṃ ghiriṃ śatavantaṃ sahasriṇam | vi stotṛbhyo rurojitha
translation: As craftsmen bend the felly, so bend at our general call: come nigh, Angiras, to the sacrifice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 64
sanskrit: वयमु तवा दिवा सुते वयं नक्तं हवामहे | अस्माकं काममा पर्ण
transliteration: vayamu tvā divā sute vayaṃ naktaṃ havāmahe | asmākaṃ kāmamā pṛṇa
translation: Now, O Virupa, rouse for him, Strong God who shines at early morn, Fair praise with voice that ceases not.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 64
sanskrit: कव सय वर्षभो युवा तुविग्रीवो अनानतः | बरह्मा कस्तं सपर्यति
transliteration: kva sya vṛṣabho yuvā tuvighrīvo anānataḥ | brahmā kastaṃ saparyati
translation: With missile of this Agni, his who looks afar, will we lay low The thief in combat for the kine.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 64
sanskrit: कस्य सवित सवनं वर्षा जुजुष्वानव गछति | इन्द्रं कौ सविदा चके
transliteration: kasya svit savanaṃ vṛṣā jujuṣvānava ghachati | indraṃ kau svidā cake
translation: Let not the Companies of Gods fail us, like Dawns that float away, Like cows who leave the niggardly.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 64
sanskrit: कं ते दाना असक्षत वर्त्रहन कं सुवीर्या | उक्थे क उ सविदन्तमः
transliteration: kaṃ te dānā asakṣata vṛtrahan kaṃ suvīryā | ukthe ka u svidantamaḥ
translation: Let not the sinful tyranny of any fiercely hating foe Smite us, as billows smite a ship.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 64
sanskrit: अयं ते मानुषे जने सोमः पूरुषु सूयते | तस्येहि पर दरवा पिब
transliteration: ayaṃ te mānuṣe jane somaḥ pūruṣu sūyate | tasyehi pra dravā piba
translation: O Agni, God, the people sing reverent praise to thee for strength: With terrors trouble thou the foe.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 64
sanskrit: अयं ते शर्यणावति सुषोमायामधि परियः | आर्जीकीयेमदिन्तमः
transliteration: ayaṃ te śaryaṇāvati suṣomāyāmadhi priyaḥ |
translation: Wilt thou not, Agni, lend us aid in winning cattle, winning wealth? Maker of room, make room for us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 65
sanskrit: यदिन्द्र परागपागुदं नयग वा हूयसे नर्भिः | आ याहि तूयमाशुभिः
transliteration: yadindra prāghapāghudaṃ nyagh vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ |
translation: NOT to forsake me, I invoke this Indra girt by Maruts, Lord Of magic power who rules with might.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 66
sanskrit: तरोभिर्वो विदद्वसुमिन्द्रं सबाध ऊतये | बर्हद गायन्तः सुतसोमे अध्वरे हुवे भरं न कारिणम
transliteration: tarobhirigvedao vidadvasumindraṃ sabādha ūtaye | bṛhad ghāyantaḥ sutasome adhvare huve bharaṃ na kāriṇam
translation: SCARCELY was Satakratu, born when of his Mother he inquired, Who are the mighty? Who are famed?

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 66
sanskrit: न यं दुध्रा वरन्ते न सथिरा मुरो मदे सुषिप्रमन्धसः | य आद्र्त्या शशमानाय सुन्वते दाता जरित्र उक्थ्यम
transliteration: na yaṃ dudhrā varante na sthirā muro made suṣipramandhasaḥ | ya ādṛtyā śaśamānāya sunvate dātā jaritra ukthyam
translation: Then Savassi declared to him Aurnavabha, Ahisuva: Son, these be they thou must o'erthrow

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 66
sanskrit: यः शक्रो मर्क्षो अश्व्यो यो वा कीजो हिरण्ययः | स ऊर्वस्य रेजयत्यपाव्र्तिमिन्द्रो गव्यस्य वर्त्रहा
transliteration: yaḥ śakro mṛkṣo aśvyo yo vā kījo hiraṇyayaḥ | sa ūrigvedaasya rejayatyapāvṛtimindro ghavyasya vṛtrahā
translation: The Vrtra-slayer smote them all as spokes are hammered into naves: The Dasyu-killer waxed in might.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 66
sanskrit: निखातं चिद यः पुरुसम्भ्र्तं वसूदिद वपति दाशुषे | वज्री सुशिप्रो हर्यश्व इत करदिन्द्रः करत्वा यथा वशत
transliteration: nikhātaṃ cid yaḥ purusambhṛtaṃ vasūdid vapati dāśuṣe | vajrī suśipro haryaśva it karadindraḥ kratvā yathā vaśat
translation: Then Indra at a single draught drank the contents of thirty pails, Pails that were filled with Soma juice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 66
sanskrit: यद वावन्थ पुरुष्टुत पुरा चिच्छूर नर्णाम | वयं तत्त इन्द्र सं भरामसि यज्ञमुक्थं तुरं वचः
transliteration: yad vāvantha puruṣṭuta purā cicchūra nṛṇām | vayaṃ tatta indra saṃ bharāmasi yajñamukthaṃ turaṃ vacaḥ
translation: Indra in groundless realms of space pierced the Gandharva through, that he Might make Brahmans' strength increase.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 66
sanskrit: सचा सोमेषु पुरुहूत वज्रिवो मदाय दयुक्ष सोमपाः | तवमिद धि बरह्मक्र्ते काम्यं वसु देष्ठः सुन्वते भुवः
transliteration: sacā someṣu puruhūta vajrivo madāya dyukṣa somapāḥ | tvamid dhi brahmakṛte kāmyaṃ vasu deṣṭhaḥ sunvate bhuvaḥ
translation: Down from the mountains Indra shot hither his well-directed shaft: He gained the ready brew of rice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 66
sanskrit: वयमेनमिदा हयो.अपीपेमेह वज्रिणम | तस्मा उ अद्य समना सुतं भरा नूनं भूषत शरुते
transliteration: vayamenamidā hyo.apīpemeha vajriṇam | tasmā u adya samanā sutaṃ bharā nūnaṃ bhūṣata śrute
translation: One only is that shaft of thine, with thousand feathers, hundred barbs, Which, Indra, thou hast made thy friend.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 66
sanskrit: वर्कश्चिदस्य वारण उरामथिरा वयुनेषु भूषति | सेमं नः सतोमं जुजुषाण आ गहीन्द्र पर चित्रया धिया
transliteration: vṛkaścidasya vāraṇa urāmathirā vayuneṣu bhūṣati | semaṃ naḥ stomaṃ jujuṣāṇa ā ghahīndra pra citrayā dhiyā
translation: Strong as the Gbhus at thy birth, therewith to those who praise thee, men, And women, bring thou food to eat.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 66
sanskrit: कदू नवस्याक्र्तमिन्द्रस्यास्ति पौंस्यम | केनो नु कं शरोमतेन न शुश्रुवे जनुषः परि वर्त्रहा
transliteration: kadū nvasyākṛtamindrasyāsti pauṃsyam | keno nu kaṃ śromatena na śuśruve januṣaḥ pari vṛtrahā
translation: By thee these exploits were achieved, the mightiest deeds, abundantly: Firm in thy heart thou settest them.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 66
sanskrit: कदू महीरध्र्ष्टा अस्य तविषीः कदु वर्त्रघ्नो अस्त्र्तम | इन्द्रो विश्वान बेकनाटानहर्द्र्श उत करत्वा पणीन्रभि
transliteration: kadū mahīradhṛṣṭā asya taviṣīḥ kadu vṛtraghno astṛtam | indro viśvān bekanāṭānahardṛśa uta kratvā paṇīnrabhi
translation: All these things Visnu brought, the Lord of ample stride whom thou hadst sent- A hundred buffaloes, a brew of rice and milk: and Indra, slew the ravening boar

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 66
sanskrit: वयं घा ते अपूर्व्येन्द्र बरह्माणि वर्त्रहन | पुरूतमासःपुरुहूत वज्रिवो भर्तिं न पर भरामसि
transliteration: vayaṃ ghā te apūrigvedayendra brahmāṇi vṛtrahan | purūtamāsaḥpuruhūta vajrivo bhṛtiṃ na pra bharāmasi
translation: Most deadly is thy bow, successful, fashioned well: good is thine arrow, decked with gold. Warlike and well equipped thine arms are, which increase sweetness for him who drinks the sweet.
