title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 67
sanskrit: तयान नु कषत्रियानव आदित्यान याचिषामहे | सुम्र्ळीकानभिष्टये
transliteration: tyān nu kṣatriyānava ādityān yāciṣāmahe | sumṛḷīkānabhiṣṭaye
translation: BRING us a thousand, Indra, as our guerdon for the Soma juice: Hundreds of kine, O Hero, bring.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 67
sanskrit: मित्रो नो अत्यंहतिं वरुणः पर्षदर्यमा | आदित्यासो यथा विदुः
transliteration: mitro no atyaṃhatiṃ varuṇaḥ parṣadaryamā |
translation: Bring cattle, bring us ornament, bring us embellishment and steeds, Give us, besides, two rings of gold.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 68
sanskrit: आ तवा रथं यथोतये सुम्नाय वर्तयामसि | तुविकूर्मिम रतीषहम इन्द्र शविष्ठ सत्पते
transliteration: tuvikūrmim ṛtīṣaham indra śaviṣṭha satpate
translation: THIS here is Soma, ne'er restrained, active, all-conquering bursting forth, Rsi and Sage by sapience,

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 68
sanskrit: तुविशुष्म तुविक्रतो शचीवो विश्वया मते | आ पप्राथ महित्वना
transliteration: tuviśuṣma tuvikrato śacīvo viśvayā mate |
translation: All that is bare he covers o'er, all that is sick he medicines; The blind man sees, the cripple walks.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 69
sanskrit: पर-पर वस तरिष्टुभम इषम मन्दद्वीरायेन्दवे | धिया वो मेधसातये पुरंध्या विवासति
transliteration: pra-pra vas triṣṭubham iṣam mandadvīrāyendave | dhiyā vo medhasātaye puraṃdhyā vivāsati
translation: O Sarakratu! truely I have made none else my Comforter. Indra; be gracious unto us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 69
sanskrit: नदं व ओदतीनां नदं योयुवतीनाम | पतिं वो अघ्न्यानां धेनूनाम इषुध्यसि
transliteration: nadaṃ va odatīnāṃ nadaṃ yoyuvatīnām | patiṃ vo aghnyānāṃ dhenūnām iṣudhyasi
translation: Thou who hast ever aided us kindly of old to win the spoil, As such, O Indra, favour us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 69
sanskrit: ता अस्य सूददोहसः सोमं शरीणन्ति पर्श्नयः | जन्मन देवानां विशस तरिष्व आ रोचने दिवः
transliteration: tā asya sūdadohasaḥ somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ | janman devānāṃ viśas triṣv ā rocane divaḥ
translation: What now? As prompter of the poor thou helpest him who sheds the juice. Wilt thou not, Indra, strengthen us?

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 69
sanskrit: अभि पर गोपतिं गिरेन्द्रम अर्च यथा विदे | सूनुं सत्यस्य सत्पतिम
transliteration: abhi pra ghopatiṃ ghirendram arca yathā vide | sūnuṃ satyasya satpatim
translation: O Indra, help our chariot on, yea, Thunderer, though it lag behind: Give this my car the foremost place.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 70
sanskrit: यो राजा चर्षणीनां याता रथेभिर अध्रिगुः | विश्वासां तरुता पर्तनानां जयेष्ठो यो वर्त्रहा गर्णे
transliteration: yo rājā carṣaṇīnāṃ yātā rathebhir adhrighuḥ | viśvāsāṃ tarutā pṛtanānāṃ jyeṣṭho yo vṛtrahā ghṛṇe
translation: INDRA, God of the mighty arm, gather for us with thy right hand Manifold and nutritious spoil.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 70
sanskrit: इन्द्रं तं शुम्भ पुरुहन्मन्न अवसे यस्य दविता विधर्तरि | हस्ताय वज्रः परति धायि दर्शतो महो दिवे न सूर्यः
transliteration: indraṃ taṃ śumbha puruhanmann avase yasya dvitā vidhartari | hastāya vajraḥ prati dhāyi darśato maho dive na sūryaḥ
translation: We know thee mighty in thy deeds, of mighty bounty, mighty wealth, Mighty in measure, prompt to aid.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 70
sanskrit: नकिष टं कर्मणा नशद यश चकार सदाव्र्धम | इन्द्रं न यज्ञैर विश्वगूर्तम रभ्वसम अध्र्ष्टं धर्ष्ण्व्जसम
transliteration: nakiṣ ṭaṃ karmaṇā naśad yaś cakāra sadāvṛdham | indraṃ na yajñair viśvaghūrtam ṛbhvasam adhṛṣṭaṃ dhṛṣṇvjasam
translation: Hero, when thou art fain to give, neither may Gods nor mortal men Restrain thee like a fearful Bull.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 70
sanskrit: अषाळ्हम उग्रम पर्तनासु सासहिं यस्मिन महीर उरुज्रयः | सं धेनवो जायमाने अनोनवुर दयावः कषामो अनोनवुः
transliteration: aṣāḷham ughram pṛtanāsu sāsahiṃ yasmin mahīr urujrayaḥ | saṃ dhenavo jāyamāne anonavur dyāvaḥ kṣāmo anonavuḥ
translation: Come, let us glorify Indra, Lord supreme of wealth, Self-ruling King: In bounty may he harm us not.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 70
sanskrit: यद दयाव इन्द्र ते शतं शतम भूमीर उत सयुः | न तवा वज्रिन सहस्रं सूर्या अनु न जातम अष्ट रोदसी
transliteration: yad dyāva indra te śataṃ śatam bhūmīr uta syuḥ | na tvā vajrin sahasraṃ sūryā anu na jātam aṣṭa rodasī
translation: Let prelude sound and following chant so let him hear the Saman sung, And with his bounty answer us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 71
sanskrit: तवं नो अग्ने महोभिः पाहि विश्वस्या अरातेः | उत दविषो मर्त्यस्य
transliteration: tvaṃ no aghne mahobhiḥ pāhi viśvasyā arāteḥ | uta dviṣo martyasya
translation: HASTE forward to us from afar, or, Vrtra-slayer, from anear, To meet the offering to the meath.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 71
sanskrit: नहि मन्युः पौरुषेय ईशे हि वः परियजात | तवम इद असि कषपावान
transliteration: nahi manyuḥ pauruṣeya īśe hi vaḥ priyajāta | tvam id asi kṣapāvān
translation: Strong are the Soma-draughts; come nigh: the juices fill thee with delight: Drink boldly even as thou art wont'.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 71
sanskrit: स नो विश्वेभिर देवेभिर ऊर्जो नपाद भद्रशोचे | रयिं देहि विश्ववारम
transliteration: sa no viśvebhir devebhir ūrjo napād bhadraśoce | rayiṃ dehi viśvavāram
translation: Joy, Indra, in the strengthening food et it content thy wish and thought, And be delightful to thine heart.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 71
sanskrit: न तम अग्ने अरातयो मर्तं युवन्त रायः | यं तरायसे दाश्वांसम
transliteration: na tam aghne arātayo martaṃ yuvanta rāyaḥ | yaṃ trāyase dāśvāṃsam
translation: Come to us thou who hast no foe: we call thee down to hymns of praise, In heaven's sublimest realm of light.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 71
sanskrit: यं तवं विप्र मेधसाताव अग्ने हिनोषि धनाय | स तवोती गोषु गन्ता
transliteration: yaṃ tvaṃ vipra medhasātāv aghne hinoṣi dhanāya | sa tavotī ghoṣu ghantā
translation: This Soma here expressed with stones and dressed with milk for thy carouse, Indra, is offered up to thee.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 71
sanskrit: तवं रयिम पुरुवीरम अग्ने दाशुषे मर्ताय | पर णो नय वस्यो अछ
transliteration: tvaṃ rayim puruvīram aghne dāśuṣe martāya | pra ṇo naya vasyo acha
translation: Graciously, Indra, hear my call. Come and obtain the draught, and sate Thyself with juices blent with milk.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 71
sanskrit: उरुष्या णो मा परा दा अघायते जातवेदः | दुराध्ये मर्ताय
transliteration: uruṣyā ṇo mā parā dā aghāyate jātavedaḥ | durādhye martāya
translation: The Soma, Indra, which is shed in chalices and vats for thee, Drink thou, for thou art Lord thereof.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 71
sanskrit: अग्ने माकिष टे देवस्य रातिम अदेवो युयोत | तवम ईशिषे वसूनाम
transliteration: aghne mākiṣ ṭe devasya rātim adevo yuyota | tvam īśiṣe vasūnām
translation: The Soma seen within the mats, as in the flood the Moon is seen, Drink thou, for thou art Lord thereof.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 71
sanskrit: स नो वस्व उप मास्य ऊर्जो नपान माहिनस्य | सखे वसो जरित्र्भ्यः
transliteration: sa no vasva upa māsy ūrjo napān māhinasya | sakhe vaso jaritṛbhyaḥ
translation: That which the Hawk brought in his claw, inviolate, through the air to thee, Drink thou, for thou art Lord thereof.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 72
sanskrit: हविष कर्णुध्वमा गमदध्वर्युर्वनते पुनः | विद्वानस्यप्रशासनम
transliteration: haviṣ kṛṇudhvamā ghamadadhvaryurigvedaanate punaḥ | vidvānasyapraśāsanam
translation: WE choose unto ourselves that high protection of the Mighty Gods That it may help and succour us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 72
sanskrit: नि तिग्ममभ्यंशुं सीदद धोता मनावधि | जुषाणोस्य सख्यम
transliteration: ni tighmamabhyaṃśuṃ sīdad dhotā manāvadhi | juṣāṇoasya sakhyam
translation: May they be ever our allies, Varuna, Mitra, Aryaman, Far-seeing Gods who prosper us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 72
sanskrit: अन्तरिछन्ति तं जने रुद्रं परो मनीषया | गर्भ्णन्ति जिह्वया ससम
transliteration: antarichanti taṃ jane rudraṃ paro manīṣayā | ghṛbhṇanti jihvayā sasam
translation: Ye furtherers of holy Law, transport us safe o'er many woes, As over water-floods in ships.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 72
sanskrit: जाम्यतीतपे धनुर्वयोधा अरुहद वनम | दर्षदं जिह्वयावधीत
transliteration: jāmyatītape dhanurigvedaayodhā aruhad vanam | dṛṣadaṃ jihvayāvadhīt
translation: Dear wealth be Aryaman to us, Varuna dear wealth meet for praise: Dear wealth we choose unto ourselves.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 72
sanskrit: चरन वत्सो रुशन्निह निदातारं न विन्दते | वेति सतोतवाम्ब्यम
transliteration: caran vatso ruśanniha nidātāraṃ na vindate | veti stotavāmbyam
translation: For Sovrans of dear wealth are ye, Adityas, not of sinner's wealth, Ye sapient Gods who slay the foe.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 72
sanskrit: उतो नवस्य यन महदश्वावद योजनं बर्हद | दामा रथस्य दद्र्शे
transliteration: uto nvasya yan mahadaśvāvad yojanaṃ bṛhad | dāmā rathasya dadṛśe
translation: We in our homes, ye Baunteous Ones, and while we journey on the road, Invoke you, Gods, to prosper us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 72
sanskrit: दुहन्ति सप्तैकामुप दवा पञ्च सर्जतः | तीर्थे सिन्धोरधि सवरे
transliteration: duhanti saptaikāmupa dvā pañca sṛjataḥ | tīrthe sindhoradhi svare
translation: Regard us, Indra, Visnu, here, ye Asvins and the Marut host, Us who are kith and kin to you.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 73
sanskrit: उदीराथां रतायते युञ्जाथामश्विना रथम | अन्ति षद्भूतु वामवः
transliteration: udīrāthāṃ ṛtāyate yuñjāthāmaśvinā ratham | anti ṣadbhūtu vāmavaḥ
translation: AGNI, your dearest Guest, I laud, him who is loving as a friend, Who brings us riches like a car.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 73
sanskrit: निमिषश्चिज्जवीयसा रथेना यातमश्विना | अन्ति षद .. .
transliteration: nimiṣaścijjavīyasā rathenā yātamaśvinā | anti ṣad .. .
translation: Whom as a far-foreseeing Sage the Gods have, from the olden time, Established among mortal men.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 73
sanskrit: उप सत्र्णीतमत्रये हिमेन घर्ममश्विना | अन्ति षद ...
transliteration: upa stṛṇītamatraye himena gharmamaśvinā | anti ṣad ...
translation: Do thou, Most Youthful God, protect the men who offer, hear their songs, And of thyself preserve their seed.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 73
sanskrit: कुह सथः कुह जग्मथुः कुह शयेनेव पेतथुः | अन्ति षद...
transliteration: kuha sthaḥ kuha jaghmathuḥ kuha śyeneva petathuḥ | anti ṣad...
translation: What is the praise wherewith, O God, Aigiras, Agni, Son of Strength, We, after thine own wish and thought,

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 73
sanskrit: यदद्य कर्हि कर्हि चिच्छुश्रूयातमिमं हवम | अन्ति षद ...
transliteration: yadadya karhi karhi cicchuśrūyātamimaṃ havam | anti ṣad ...
translation: May serve thee, O thou Child of Power, and with what sacrifice's plan? What prayer shall I now speak to thee?

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 73
sanskrit: अश्विना यामहूतमा नेदिष्ठं याम्याप्यम | अन्ति षद ...
transliteration: aśvinā yāmahūtamā nediṣṭhaṃ yāmyāpyam | anti ṣad ...
translation: Our God, make all of us to dwell in happy habitations, and Reward our songs with spoil and wealth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 73
sanskrit: अवन्तमत्रये गर्हं कर्णुतं युवमश्विना | अन्ति षद ...
transliteration: avantamatraye ghṛhaṃ kṛṇutaṃ yuvamaśvinā | anti ṣad ...
translation: Lord of the house, what plenty fills the songs which thou inspirest now, Thou whose hymn helps to win the kine?

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 73
sanskrit: वरेथे अग्निमातपो वदते वल्ग्वत्रये | अनति षद ...
transliteration: varethe aghnimātapo vadate valghvatraye | anti ṣad ...
translation: Him Wise and Strong they glorify, the foremost Champion in the fray, And mighty in his dwelling-place.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 73
sanskrit: पर सप्तवध्रिराशसा धारामग्नेरशायत | अन्ति षद...
transliteration: pra saptavadhrirāśasā dhārāmaghneraśāyata | anti ṣad...
translation: Agni, he dwells in rest and peace who smites and no one smites again: With hero sons he prospers well

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 74
sanskrit: विशो-विशो वो अतिथिं वाजयन्तः पुरुप्रियम | अग्निं वो दुर्यं वच सतुषे शूषस्य मन्मभिः
transliteration: viśo-viśo vo atithiṃ vājayantaḥ purupriyam | aghniṃ vo duryaṃ vaca stuṣe śūṣasya manmabhiḥ
translation: To this mine invocation, O ye Asvins, ye Nasatyas, come, To drink the savoury Soma juice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 74
sanskrit: यं जनासो हविष्मन्तो मित्रं न सर्पिरासुतिम | परशंसन्ति परशस्तिभिः
transliteration: yaṃ janāso haviṣmanto mitraṃ na sarpirāsutim | praśaṃsanti praśastibhiḥ
translation: This laud of mine, ye Asvins Twain, and this mine invitation hear, To drink the savoury Soma juice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 74
sanskrit: पन्यांसं जातवेदसं यो देवतात्युद्यता | हव्यान्यैरयत दिवि
transliteration: panyāṃsaṃ jātavedasaṃ yo devatātyudyatā | havyānyairayat divi
translation: Here Krsna is invoking you, O Asvins, Lords of ample wealth. To drink the savoury Soma juice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 75
sanskrit: युक्ष्वा हि देवहूतमानश्वानग्ने रथीरिव | नि होता पूर्व्यः सदः
transliteration: yukṣvā hi devahūtamānaśvānaghne rathīriva | ni hotā pūrigvedayaḥ sadaḥ
translation: YE Twain are wondrous strong, well-skilled in arts that heal, both bringers of delight, ye both won Daksa's praise. Visvaka calls on you as such to save his life. Break ye not off our friendship, come and set me free.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 75
sanskrit: उत नो देव देवानछा वोचो विदुष्टरः | शरद विश्वा वार्या कर्धि
transliteration: uta no deva devānachā voco viduṣṭaraḥ |
translation: How shall he praise you now who is distraught in mind? Ye Twain give wisdom for the gainof what is good. Visvaka calls on you as such to save his life. Break ye not off our friendship, come and set me free.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 76
sanskrit: इमं नु मायिनं हुव इन्द्रमीशानमोजसा | मरुत्वन्तंन वर्ञ्जसे
transliteration: imaṃ nu māyinaṃ huva indramīśānamojasā | marutvantaṃna vṛñjase
translation: SPLENDID, O Asvins, is your praise. Come fountain-like, to pour the stream. Of the sweet juice effused-dear is it, Chiefs, in heaven-drink like two wild bulls at a pool.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 76
sanskrit: अयमिन्द्रो मरुत्सखा वि वर्त्रस्याभिनच्छिरः | वज्रेण शतपर्वणा
transliteration: ayamindro marutsakhā vi vṛtrasyābhinacchiraḥ | vajreṇa śataparigvedaaṇā
translation: Drink the libation rich in sweets, O Asvins Twain: sit. Heroes, on the sacred grass. Do ye with joyful heart in the abode of man preserve his life by means of wealth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 76
sanskrit: वाव्र्धानो मरुत्सखेन्द्रो वि वर्त्रमैरयत | सर्जन समुद्रियापः
transliteration: vāvṛdhāno marutsakhendro vi vṛtramairayat | sṛjan samudriyāapaḥ
translation: The Priyamedhas bid you come with all the succours that are yours. Come to his house whose holy grass is trimmed, to dear sacrifice at the morning rites.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 76
sanskrit: अयं ह येन वा इदं सवर्मरुत्वता जितम | इन्द्रेण सोमपीतये
transliteration: ayaṃ ha yena vā idaṃ svarmarutvatā jitam | indreṇa somapītaye
translation: Drink ye the Soma rich in meath, ye Asvins Twain: sit gladly on the sacred grass. So, waxen mighty, to our eulogy from heaven come ye as wild-bulls to the pool.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 76
sanskrit: मरुत्वन्तं रजीषिणमोजस्वन्तं विरप्शिनम | इन्द्रं गीर्भिर्हवामहे
transliteration: marutvantaṃ ṛjīṣiṇamojasvantaṃ virapśinam | indraṃ ghīrbhirhavāmahe
translation: Come to us, O ye Asvins, now with steeds of many a varied hue, Ye Lords of splendour, wondrous, borne on paths of gold, drink Soma, ye who strengthen Law.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 76
sanskrit: इन्द्रं परत्नेन मन्मना मरुत्वन्तं हवामहे | अस्य सोमस्य पीतये
transliteration: indraṃ pratnena manmanā marutvantaṃ havāmahe | asya somasya pītaye
translation: For we the priestly singers, fain to hymn your praise, invoke you for the gain of strength. So, wondrous, fair, and famed for great deeds come to us, through our hymn, Asvins, when ye hear.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 77
sanskrit: जज्ञानो नु शतक्रतुर्वि पर्छदिति मातरम | क उग्राः के ह शर्ण्विरे
transliteration: jajñāno nu śatakraturigveda pṛchaditi mātaram | ka ughrāḥ ke ha śṛṇvire
translation: As cows low to their calves in stalls, so with our songs we glorify This Indra, even your Wondrous God who checks attack, who joys in the delicious juice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 78
sanskrit: पुरोळाशं नो अन्धस इन्द्र सहस्रमा भर | शता च शूर गोनाम
transliteration: puroḷāśaṃ no andhasa indra sahasramā bhara |
translation: To Indra sing the lofty hymn, Maruts that slays the Vrtras best. Whereby the Holy Ones created for the God the light divine that ever wakes.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 79
sanskrit: अयं कर्त्नुरग्र्भीतो विश्वजिदुद्भिदित सोमः | रषिर्विप्रः काव्येन
transliteration: ayaṃ kṛtnuraghṛbhīto viśvajidudbhidit somaḥ |
translation: MAY Indra, who in every fight must be invoked, be near to us. May the most mighty Vrtra-slayer, meet for praise, come to libations and to hymns.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 80
sanskrit: नह्यन्यं बळाकरं मर्डितारं शतक्रतो | तवं न इन्द्र मर्ळय
transliteration: nahyanyaṃ baḷākaraṃ marḍitāraṃ śatakrato | tvaṃ na indra mṛḷaya
translation: DOWN to the stream a maiden came, and found the Soma by the way. Bearing it to her home she said, For Indra will I press thee out, for Sakra will I press thee out.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 80
sanskrit: यो नः शश्वत पुराविथाम्र्ध्रो वाजसातये | स तवं न इन्द्र मर्ळय
transliteration: yo naḥ śaśvat purāvithāmṛdhro vājasātaye | sa tvaṃ na indra mṛḷaya
translation: Thou roaming yonder, little man, beholding every house in turn, Drink thou this Soma pressed with teeth, accompanied with grain and curds, with cake of meal and song of praise.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 80
sanskrit: किमङग रध्रचोदनः सुन्वानस्यावितेदसि | कुवित सविन्द्रणः शकः
transliteration: kimaṅgha radhracodanaḥ sunvānasyāvitedasi | kuvit svindraṇaḥ śakaḥ
translation: Fain would we learn to know thee well, nor yet can we attain to thee. Still slowly and in gradual drops, O Indu, unto Indra flow.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 80
sanskrit: इन्द्र पर णो रथमव पश्चाच्चित सन्तमद्रिवः | पुरस्तादेनं मे कर्धि
transliteration: indra pra ṇo rathamava paścāccit santamadrivaḥ | purastādenaṃ me kṛdhi
translation: Will he not help and work for us? Will he not make us wealthier? Shall we not, hostile to our lord, unite ourselves to Indra now?

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 80
sanskrit: हन्तो नु किमाससे परथमं नो रथं कर्धि | उपमं वाजयु शरवः
transliteration: hanto nu kimāsase prathamaṃ no rathaṃ kṛdhi | upamaṃ vājayu śravaḥ
translation: O Indra, cause to sprout again three places, these which I declare,- My father's head, his cultured field, and this the part below my waist.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 80
sanskrit: अवा नो वाजयुं रथं सुकरं ते किमित परि | अस्मान सुजिग्युषस कर्धि
transliteration: avā no vājayuṃ rathaṃ sukaraṃ te kimit pari | asmān sujighyuṣas kṛdhi
translation: Make all of these grow crops of hair, you cultivated field of ours, My body, and my father's head.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 80
sanskrit: इन्द्र दर्ह्यस्व पूरसि भद्रा त एति निष्क्र्तम | इयं धीरतवियावती
transliteration: indra dṛhyasva pūrasi bhadrā ta eti niṣkṛtam | iyaṃ dhīrtviyāvatī
translation: Cleansing Apala, Indra! thrice, thou gavest sunlike skin to her, Drawn, Satakratu! through the hole of car, of wagon, and of yoke.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 81
sanskrit: आ तू न इन्द्र कषुमन्तं चित्रं गराभं सं गर्भाय | महाहस्ती दक्षिणेन
transliteration: mahāhastī dakṣiṇena
translation: INVITE ye Indra with a song to drink your draught of Soma juice, All-conquering Satakratu, most munificent of all who live.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 81
sanskrit: विद्मा हि तवा तुविकूर्मिं तुविदेष्णं तुवीमघम | तुविमात्रमवोभिः
transliteration: vidmā hi tvā tuvikūrmiṃ tuvideṣṇaṃ tuvīmagham | tuvimātramavobhiḥ
translation: Lauded by many, much-invoked, leader of song, renowned of old: His name is Indra, tell it forth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 81
sanskrit: नहि तवा शूर देवा न मर्तासो दित्सन्तम | भीमं न गां वारयन्ते
transliteration: nahi tvā śūra devā na martāso ditsantam | bhīmaṃ na ghāṃ vārayante
translation: Indra the Dancer be to us the giver of abundant strength: May he, the mighty, bring it near.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 81
sanskrit: एतो नविन्द्रं सतवामेशानं वस्वः सवराजम | न राधसा मर्धिषन नः
transliteration: eto nvindraṃ stavāmeśānaṃ vasvaḥ svarājam | na rādhasā mardhiṣan naḥ
translation: Indra whose jaws are strong hath drunk of worshipping Sudaksa's draught, The Soma juice with barley mixt.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 81
sanskrit: पर सतोषदुप गासिषच्छ्रवत साम गीयमानम | अभि राधसा जुगुरत
transliteration: pra stoṣadupa ghāsiṣacchravat sāma ghīyamānam | abhi rādhasā jughurat
translation: Call Indra loudly with your songs of praise to drink the Soma juice. For this is what augments his strength.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 82
sanskrit: आ पर दरव परावतो.अर्वावतश्च वर्त्रहन | मध्वः परतिप्रभर्मणि
transliteration: madhvaḥ pratiprabharmaṇi
translation: SURYA, thou mountest up to meet the Hero famous for his wealth, Who hurls the bolt and works for man

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 82
sanskrit: तीव्राः सोमास आ गहि सुतासो मादयिष्णवः | पिबा दध्र्ग यथोचिषे
transliteration: tīvrāḥ somāsa ā ghahi sutāso mādayiṣṇavaḥ | pibā dadhṛgh yathociṣe
translation: Him who with might of both his arms brake nine-and-ninety castles down, Slew Vrtra and smote Ahi dead.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 82
sanskrit: इषा मन्दस्वादु ते.अरं वराय मन्यवे | भुवत त इन्द्र शं हर्दे
transliteration: iṣā mandasvādu te.araṃ varāya manyave | bhuvat ta indra śaṃ hṛde
translation: This Indra is our gracious Friend. He sends us in a full broad stream Riches in horses, kine, and corn.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 83
sanskrit: देवानामिदवो महत तदा वर्णीमहे वयम | वर्ष्णामस्मभ्यमूतये
transliteration: devānāmidavo mahat tadā vṛṇīmahe vayam | vṛṣṇāmasmabhyamūtaye
translation: THE Cow, the famous Mother of the wealthy Maruts, pours her milk: Both horses of the cars are yoked,-

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 83
sanskrit: ते नः सन्तु युजः सदा वरुणो मित्रो अर्यमा | वर्धासश्च परचेतसः
transliteration: te naḥ santu yujaḥ sadā varuṇo mitro aryamā | vṛdhāsaśca pracetasaḥ
translation: She in whose bosom all the Gods, and Sun and Moon for men to see, Maintain their everlasting Laws.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 83
sanskrit: अति नो विष्पिता पुरु नौभिरपो न पर्षथ | यूयं रतस्यरथ्यः
transliteration: ati no viṣpitā puru naubhirapo na parṣatha | yūyaṃ ṛtasyarathyaḥ
translation: This all the pious sing to us, and sacred poets evermore: The Maruts to the Soma-draught

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 83
sanskrit: वामं नो अस्त्वर्यमन वामं वरुण शंस्यम | वामं हयाव्र्णीमहे
transliteration: vāmaṃ no astvaryaman vāmaṃ varuṇa śaṃsyam | vāmaṃ hyāvṛṇīmahe
translation: Here is the Soma ready pressed of this the Maruts drink, of this Self-luminous the Asvins drink.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 83
sanskrit: वामस्य हि परचेतस ईशानाशो रिशादसः | नेमादित्या अघस्य यत
transliteration: vāmasya hi pracetasa īśānāśo riśādasaḥ | nemādityā aghasya yat
translation: Of this, moreover, purified, set in three places, procreant, Drink Varuna, Mitra, Aryaman.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 83
sanskrit: वयमिद वः सुदानवः कषियन्तो यान्तो अध्वन्ना | देवा वर्धाय हूमहे
transliteration: vayamid vaḥ sudānavaḥ kṣiyanto yānto adhvannā | devā vṛdhāya hūmahe
translation: And Indra, like the Herald Priest, desirous of the milky juice, At early morn will quaff thereof.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 83
sanskrit: अधि न इन्द्रैषां विष्णो सजात्यानाम | इता मरुतो अश्विना
transliteration: adhi na indraiṣāṃ viṣṇo sajātyānām | itā maruto aśvinā
translation: When have the Princes gleamed and shone through waters as through troops of foes'? When hasten they whose might is pure?

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 83
sanskrit: पर भरात्र्त्वं सुदानवो.अध दविता समान्या | मातुर्गर्भे भरामहे
transliteration: pra bhrātṛtvaṃ sudānavo.adha dvitā samānyā | māturgharbhe bharāmahe
translation: What favour do I claim this day of you great Deities, you who are Wondrously splendid in yourselves?

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 83
sanskrit: यूयं हि षठा सुदानव इन्द्रज्येष्ठा अभिद्यवः | अधाचिद व उत बरुवे
transliteration: yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā sudānava indrajyeṣṭhā abhidyavaḥ | adhācid va uta bruve
translation: 1 call, to drink the Soma, those Maruts who spread all realms of earth And luminous regions of the sky.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 84
sanskrit: परेष्ठं वो अतिथिं सतुषे मित्रमिव परियम | अग्निं रथं न वेद्यम
transliteration: preṣṭhaṃ vo atithiṃ stuṣe mitramiva priyam | aghniṃ rathaṃ na vedyam
translation: SONG-LOVER! like a charioteer come songs to thee when Soma flows. O Indra, they have called to thee as mother-kine unto their calves.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 84
sanskrit: कविमिव परचेतसं यं देवासो अध दविता | नि मर्त्येष्वादधुः
transliteration: kavimiva pracetasaṃ yaṃ devāso adha dvitā | ni martyeṣvādadhuḥ
translation: Bright juices hitherward have sped thee, Indra, Lover of the Song. Drink, Indra, of this flowing sap: in every house 'tis set for thee.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 84
sanskrit: तवं यविष्ठ दाशुषो नॄन पाहि शर्णुधी गिरः | रक्षा तोकमुत तमना
transliteration: tvaṃ yaviṣṭha dāśuṣo nṝn pāhi śṛṇudhī ghiraḥ | rakṣā tokamuta tmanā
translation: Drink Soma to inspirit thee, juice, Indra, which the Falcon brought: For thou art King and Sovran Lord of all the families of men.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 84
sanskrit: कया ते अग्ने अङगिर ऊर्जो नपादुपस्तुतिम | वराय देव मन्यवे
transliteration: kayā te aghne aṅghira ūrjo napādupastutim | varāya deva manyave
translation: O Indra, hear Tirasci's call, the call of him who serveth thee. Satisfy him with wealth of kine and valiant offspring: Great art thou.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 84
sanskrit: दाशेम कस्य मनसा यज्ञस्य सहसो यहो | कदु वोच इदंनमः
transliteration: dāśema kasya manasā yajñasya sahaso yaho | kadu voca idaṃnamaḥ
translation: For he, O Indra, hath produced for thee the newest gladdening song, A hymn that springs from careful thought, ancient, and full of sacred truth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 84
sanskrit: अधा तवं हि नस करो विश्वा अस्मभ्यं सुक्षितीः | वाजद्रविणसो गिरः
transliteration: adhā tvaṃ hi nas karo viśvā asmabhyaṃ sukṣitīḥ | vājadraviṇaso ghiraḥ
translation: That Indra will we laud whom songs and hymns of praise have magnified. Striving to win, we celebrate his many deeds of hero might.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 84
sanskrit: कस्य नूनं परीणसो धियो जिन्वसि दम्पते | गोषाता यस्यते गिरः
transliteration: kasya nūnaṃ parīṇaso dhiyo jinvasi dampate | ghoṣātā yasyate ghiraḥ
translation: Come now and let us glorify pure Indra with pure Sama hymns. Let the pure milky draught delight him strengthened by pure songs of praise.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 84
sanskrit: तं मर्जयन्त सुक्रतुं पुरोयावानमाजिषु | सवेषु कषयेषुवाजिनम
transliteration: taṃ marjayanta sukratuṃ puroyāvānamājiṣu | sveṣu kṣayeṣuvājinam
translation: O Indra, come thou pure to us, with pure assistance, pure thyself. Pure, send thou riches down to us, and, meet for Soma, pure, be glad.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 84
sanskrit: कषेति कषेमेभिः साधुभिर्नकिर्यं घनन्ति हन्ति यः | अग्ने सुवीर एधते
transliteration: kṣeti kṣemebhiḥ sādhubhirnakiryaṃ ghnanti hanti yaḥ | aghne suvīra edhate
translation: O Indra, pure, vouchsafe us wealth, and, pure, enrich the worshipper. Pure, thou dost strike the Vrtras dead, and strivest, pure, to win the spoil.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 85
sanskrit: आ मे हवं नासत्याश्विना गछतं युवम | मध्वः सोमस्य पीतये
transliteration: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye
translation: FOR him the Mornings made their courses longer, and Nights with pleasant voices spake to Indra. For him the Floods stood still, the Seven Mothers, Streams easy for the heroes to pass over.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 85
sanskrit: इमं मे सतोममश्विनेमं मे शर्णुतं हवम | मध्वः सोमस्यपीतये
transliteration: imaṃ me stomamaśvinemaṃ me śṛṇutaṃ havam | madhvaḥ somasyapītaye
translation: The Darter penetrated, though in trouble, thrice-seven close-pressed ridges of the mountains. Neither might God nor mortal man accomplish what the Strong Hero wrought in full-grown vigour.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 85
sanskrit: अयं वां कर्ष्णो अश्विना हवते वाजिनीवसू | मध्वः सोमस्य पीतये
transliteration: ayaṃ vāṃ kṛṣṇo aśvinā havate vājinīvasū | madhvaḥ somasya pītaye
translation: The mightiest force is Indra's bolt of iron when firmly grasped in both the arms of Indra. His head and mouth have powers that pass all others, and all his people hasten near to listen.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 86
sanskrit: उभा हि दस्रा भिषजा मयोभुवोभा दक्षस्य वचसो बभूवथुः | ता वां विश्वको हवते तनूक्र्थे मा नो वि यौष्टं सख्या मुमोचतम
transliteration: ubhā hi dasrā bhiṣajā mayobhuvobhā dakṣasya vacaso babhūvathuḥ | tā vāṃ viśvako havate tanūkṛthe mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam
translation: O INDRA, Lord of Light, what joys thou broughtest from the Asuras, Prosper therewith, O Maghavan, him who lauds that deed, and those whose grass is trimmed for thee.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 86
sanskrit: कथा नूनं वां विमना उप सतवद युवं धियं ददथुर्वस्यैष्तये | ता वां विश्वको ...
transliteration: kathā nūnaṃ vāṃ vimanā upa stavad yuvaṃ dhiyaṃ dadathurigvedaasyaiṣtaye | tā vāṃ viśvako ...
translation: The unwasting share of steeds and kine which, Indra, thou hast fast secured, Grant to the worshipper who presses Soma and gives guerdon, not unto the churl.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 86
sanskrit: युवं हि षमा पुरुभुजेममेधतुं विष्णाप्वे ददथुर्वस्यैष्टये | ता वां विश्वको ...
transliteration: yuvaṃ hi ṣmā purubhujemamedhatuṃ viṣṇāpve dadathurigvedaasyaiṣṭaye | tā vāṃ viśvako ...
translation: The riteless, godless man who sleeps, O Indra, his unbroken steep,- May he by following his own devices die. Hide from him wealth that nourishes.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 86
sanskrit: उत तयं वीरं धनसां रजीषिणं दूरे चित सन्तमवसे हवामहे | यस्य सवादिष्ठा सुमतिः पितुर्यथा मा नो वि यौष्टं सख्या मुमोचतम
transliteration: uta tyaṃ vīraṃ dhanasāṃ ṛjīṣiṇaṃ dūre cit santamavase havāmahe | yasya svādiṣṭhā sumatiḥ pituryathā mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam
translation: Whether, O Sakra, thou be far, or, Vrtra-slayer, near at hand, Thence by heaven-reaching songs he who hath pressed the juice invites thee with thy long-maned Steeds.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 87
sanskrit: दयुम्नी वां सतोमो अश्विना करिविर्न सेक आ गतम | मध्वःसुतस्य स दिवि परियो नरा पातं गौराविवेरिणे
transliteration: dyumnī vāṃ stomo aśvinā krivirna seka ā ghatam | madhvaḥsutasya sa divi priyo narā pātaṃ ghaurāviveriṇe
translation: To Indra sing a Sama hymn, a lofty song to Lofty Sage, To him who guards the Law, inspired, and fain for praise.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 87
sanskrit: पिबतं घर्मं मधुमन्तमश्विना बर्हिः सीदतं नरा | ता मन्दसाना मनुषो दुरोण आ नि पातं वेदसा वयः
transliteration: pibataṃ gharmaṃ madhumantamaśvinā barhiḥ sīdataṃ narā | tā mandasānā manuṣo duroṇa ā ni pātaṃ vedasā vayaḥ
translation: Thou, Indra, art the Conqueror: thou gavest splendour to the Sun. Maker of all things, thou art Mighty and All-God.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 88
sanskrit: तं वो दस्मं रतीषहं वसोर्मन्दानमन्धसः | अभि वत्सं न सवसरेषु धेनव इन्द्रं गीर्भिर्नवामहे
transliteration: taṃ vo dasmaṃ ṛtīṣahaṃ vasormandānamandhasaḥ | abhi vatsaṃ na svasareṣu dhenava indraṃ ghīrbhirnavāmahe
translation: O THUNDERER, zealous worshippers gave thee drink this time yesterday. So, Indra, listen here to those who bring the laud: come near unto our dwelling place.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 88
sanskrit: दयुक्षं सुदानुं तविषीभिराव्र्तं गिरिं न पुरुभोजसम | कषुमन्तं वाजं शतिनं सहस्रिणं मक्षू गोमन्तमीमहे
transliteration: dyukṣaṃ sudānuṃ taviṣībhirāvṛtaṃ ghiriṃ na purubhojasam | kṣumantaṃ vājaṃ śatinaṃ sahasriṇaṃ makṣū ghomantamīmahe
translation: Lord of Bay Steeds, fair-helmed, rejoice thee: this we crave. Here the disposers wait on thee. Thy loftiest glories claim our lauds beside the juice, O Indra, Lover of the Song.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 88
sanskrit: न तवा बर्हन्तो अद्रयो वरन्त इन्द्र वीळवः | यद दित्ससि सतुवते मावते वसु नकिष टदा मिनाति ते
transliteration: na tvā bṛhanto adrayo varanta indra vīḷavaḥ | yad ditsasi stuvate māvate vasu nakiṣ ṭadā mināti te
translation: Turning, as 'twere, to meet the Sun, enjoy from Indra all good things. When he who will be born is born with power we look to treasures as our heritage.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 88
sanskrit: योद्धासि करत्वा शवसोत दंसना विश्वा जाताभि मज्मना | आ तवायमर्क ऊतये ववर्तति यं गोतमा अजीजनन
transliteration: yoddhāsi kratvā śavasota daṃsanā viśvā jātābhi majmanā |
translation: Praise him who sends us wealth, whose bounties injure none: good are the gifts which Indra. grants. He is not worth with one who satisfies his wish: he turns his mind to giving boons.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 89
sanskrit: बर्हदिन्द्राय गायत मरुतो वर्त्रहन्तमम | येन जयोतिरजनयन्न्र्ताव्र्धो देवं देवाय जाग्र्वि
transliteration: bṛhadindrāya ghāyata maruto vṛtrahantamam | yena jyotirajanayannṛtāvṛdho devaṃ devāya jāghṛvi
translation: I MOVE before thee here present in person, and all the Deities follow behind me. When, Indra, thou securest me my portion, with me thou shalt perform heroic actions.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 89
sanskrit: अपाधमदभिशस्तीरशस्तिहाथेन्द्रो दयुम्न्याभवत | देवास्त इन्द्र सख्याय येमिरे बर्हद्भानो मरुद्गण
transliteration: apādhamadabhiśastīraśastihāthendro dyumnyābhavat | devāsta indra sakhyāya yemire bṛhadbhāno marudghaṇa
translation: The food of meath in foremost place I give thee, thy Soma shall be pressed, thy share appointed. Thou on my right shalt be my friend and comrade: then shall we two smite dead full many a foeman.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 89
sanskrit: पर व इन्द्राय बर्हते मरुतो बरह्मार्चत | वर्त्रं हनति वर्त्रहा शतक्रतुर्वज्रेण शतपर्वणा
transliteration: pra va indrāya bṛhate maruto brahmārcata | vṛtraṃ hanati vṛtrahā śatakraturigvedaajreṇa śataparigvedaaṇā
translation: Striving for strength bring forth a laud to Indra, a truthful hymn if he in truth existeth. One and another say, There is no Indra. Who hath beheld him? Whom then shall we honour?

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 89
sanskrit: अभि पर भर धर्षता धर्षन्मनः शरवश्चित ते असद बर्हत | अर्षन्त्वापो जवसा वि मातरो हनो वर्त्रं जया सवः
transliteration: abhi pra bhara dhṛṣatā dhṛṣanmanaḥ śravaścit te asad bṛhat | arṣantvāpo javasā vi mātaro hano vṛtraṃ jayā svaḥ
translation: Here am I, look upon me here, O singer. All that existeth 1 surpass in greatness. The Holy Law's commandments make me mighty. Rending with strength I rend the worlds asunder.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 89
sanskrit: यज्जायथा अपूर्व्य मघवन वर्त्रहत्याय | तत पर्थिवीमप्रथयस्तदस्तभ्ना उत दयाम
transliteration: yajjāyathā apūrigvedaya maghavan vṛtrahatyāya | tat pṛthivīmaprathayastadastabhnā uta dyām
translation: When the Law's lovers mounted and approached me as 1 sate lone upon the dear sky's summit. Then spake my spirit to the heart within me, My friends have cried unto me with their children.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 89
sanskrit: तत ते यज्ञो अजायत तदर्क उत हस्क्र्तिः | तद विश्वमभिभूरसि यज्जातं यच्च जन्त्वम
transliteration: tat te yajño ajāyata tadarka uta haskṛtiḥ | tad viśvamabhibhūrasi yajjātaṃ yacca jantvam
translation: All these thy deeds must be declared at Soma-feasts, wrought, Indra, Bounteous Lord, for him who sheds the juice, When thou didst open wealth heaped up by many, brought from far away to Sarablia, the Rsi's kin.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 90
sanskrit: आ नो विश्वासु हव्य इन्द्रः समत्सु भूषतु | उप बरह्माणि सवनानि वर्त्रहा परमज्या रचीषमः
transliteration: upa brahmāṇi savanāni vṛtrahā paramajyā ṛcīṣamaḥ
translation: YEA, specially that mortal man hath toiled for service of the Gods, Who quickly hath brought near Mitra and Varuna. to share his sacrificial gifts.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 90
sanskrit: तवं दाता परथमो राधसामस्यसि सत्य ईशानक्र्त | तुविद्युम्नस्य युज्या वर्णीमहे पुत्रस्य शवसो महः
transliteration: tvaṃ dātā prathamo rādhasāmasyasi satya īśānakṛt | tuvidyumnasya yujyā vṛṇīmahe putrasya śavaso mahaḥ
translation: Supreme in sovran power, far-sighted, Chiefs and Kings, most swift to hear from far away, Both, wondrously, set them in motion as with arms, in company with Surya's beams.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 90
sanskrit: बरह्मा त इन्द्र गिर्वणः करियन्ते अनतिद्भुता | इमा जुषस्वहर्यश्व योजनेन्द्र या ते अमन्महि
transliteration: brahmā ta indra ghirigvedaaṇaḥ kriyante anatidbhutā | imā juṣasvaharyaśva yojanendra yā te amanmahi
translation: The rapid messenger who runs before you, Mitra-Varuna, with iron head, swift to the draught,

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 90
sanskrit: तवं हि सत्यो मघवन्ननानतो वर्त्रा भूरि नय्र्ञ्जसे | सत्वं शविष्ठ वज्रहस्त दाशुषे.अर्वाञ्चं रयिमा कर्धि
transliteration: tvaṃ hi satyo maghavannanānato vṛtrā bhūri nyṛñjase | satvaṃ śaviṣṭha vajrahasta dāśuṣe.arigvedaāñcaṃ rayimā kṛdhi
translation: He whom no man may question, none may summon back, who stands not still for colloquy,- From hostile clash with him keep ye us safe this day: keep us in safety with your arms.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 90
sanskrit: तवमिन्द्र यशा अस्य रजीषी शवसस पते | तवं वर्त्राणि हंस्यप्रतीन्येक इदनुत्ता चर्षणीध्र्ता
transliteration: tvamindra yaśā asy ṛjīṣī śavasas pate | tvaṃ vṛtrāṇi haṃsyapratīnyeka idanuttā carṣaṇīdhṛtā
translation: To Aryaman and Mitra sing a reverent song, O pious one, A pleasant hymn that shall protect to Varuna: sing forth a laud unto the Kings.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 90
sanskrit: तमु तवा नूनमसुर परचेतसं राधो भागमिवेमहे | महीव कर्त्तिः शरणा त इन्द्र पर ते सुम्ना नो अश्नवन
transliteration: tamu tvā nūnamasura pracetasaṃ rādho bhāghamivemahe | mahīva kṛttiḥ śaraṇā ta indra pra te sumnā no aśnavan
translation: The true, Red Treasure they have sent, one only Son born of the Three. They, the Immortal Ones, never deceived, survey the families of mortal men.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 91
sanskrit: कन्या वारवायती सोममपि सरुताविदत | अस्तं भरन्त्यब्रवीदिन्द्राय सुनवै तवा शक्राय सुनवै तवा
transliteration: kanyā vāravāyatī somamapi srutāvidat | astaṃ bharantyabravīdindrāya sunavai tvā śakrāya sunavai tvā
translation: LORD of the house, Sage, ever young, high power of life, O Agni, God, Thou givest to thy worshipper.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 91
sanskrit: असौ य एषि वीरको गर्हं-गर्हं विचाकशद | इमं जम्भसुतं पिब धानावन्तं करम्भिणमपूपवन्तमुक्थिनम
transliteration: asau ya eṣi vīrako ghṛhaṃ-ghṛhaṃ vicākaśad | imaṃ jambhasutaṃ piba dhānāvantaṃ karambhiṇamapūpavantamukthinam
translation: So with our song that prays and serves, attentive, Lord of spreading light, Agni, bring hitherward the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 92
sanskrit: पान्तमा वो अन्धस इन्द्रमभि पर गायत | विश्वासाहंशतक्रतुं मंहिष्ठं चर्षणीनाम
transliteration: pāntamā vo andhasa indramabhi pra ghāyata | viśvāsāhaṃśatakratuṃ maṃhiṣṭhaṃ carṣaṇīnām
translation: THAT noblest Furtherer hath appeared, to whom men bring their holy works. Our songs of praise have risen aloft to Agni who was barn to give the Arya strength.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 92
sanskrit: पुरुहूतं पुरुष्टुतं गाथान्यं सनश्रुतम | इन्द्र इति बरवीतन
transliteration: puruhūtaṃ puruṣṭutaṃ ghāthānyaṃ sanaśrutam | indra iti bravītana
translation: Agni of Divodasa turned, as 'twere in majesty, to the Gods. Onward he sped along the mother earth, and took his station in the height of heaven.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 92
sanskrit: इन्द्र इन नो महानां दाता वाजानां नर्तुः | महानभिज्ञ्वा यमत
transliteration: indra in no mahānāṃ dātā vājānāṃ nṛtuḥ | mahānabhijñvā yamat
translation: Him before whom the people shrink when he performs his glorious deeds, Him who wins thousands at the worship of the Gods, himself, that Agni, serve with son s.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 92
sanskrit: अपादु शिप्र्यन्धसः सुदक्षस्य परहोषिणः | इन्दोरिन्द्रोयवाशिरः
transliteration: apādu śipryandhasaḥ sudakṣasya prahoṣiṇaḥ | indorindroyavāśiraḥ
translation: The mortal man whom thou wouldst lead to opulence, O Vasu, he who brings thee gifts. He, Agni, wins himself a hero singing lauds, yea, one who feeds a thousand men.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 92
sanskrit: तं वभि परार्चतेन्द्रं सोमस्य पीतये | तदिद धयस्यवर्धनम
transliteration: taṃ vabhi prārcatendraṃ somasya pītaye | tadid dhyasyavardhanam
translation: He with the steed wins spoil even in the fenced fort, and gains imperishable fame. In thee, O Lord of wealth, continually we lay all precious offerings to the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 92
sanskrit: अस्य पीत्वा मदानां देवो देवस्यौजसा | विश्वाभि भुवना भुवत
transliteration: asya pītvā madānāṃ devo devasyaujasā | viśvābhi bhuvanā bhuvat
translation: To him who dealeth out all wealth, who is the cheerful Priest of men, To him, like the first vessels filled with savoury juice, to Agni go the songs of praise.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 92
sanskrit: तयमु वः सत्रासाहं विश्वासु गीर्ष्वायतम | आ चयावयस्यूतये
transliteration: tyamu vaḥ satrāsāhaṃ viśvāsu ghīrṣvāyatam |
translation: Votaries, richly-gifted, deck him with their songs, even as the steed who draws the car. On both, Strong Lord of men! on child and grandson pour the bounties which our nobles give.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 93
sanskrit: उद घेदभि शरुतामघं वर्षभं नर्यापसम | अस्तारमेषि सूर्य
transliteration: ud ghedabhi śrutāmaghaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ naryāpasam | astārameṣi sūrya
translation: TO you will I sing Indra's praise who gives good gifts as well we know; The praise of Maghavan who, rich in treasure, aids his singers with wealth thousand fold.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 93
sanskrit: नव यो नवतिं पुरो बिभेद बाह्वोजसा | अहिं च वर्त्रहावधीत
transliteration: nava yo navatiṃ puro bibheda bāhvojasā | ahiṃ ca vṛtrahāvadhīt
translation: As with a hundred hosts, he rushes boldly on, and for the offerer slays his foes. As from a mountain flow the water-brooks, thus flow his gifts who feedeth many a one.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 93
sanskrit: स न इन्द्रः शिवः सखाश्वावद गोमद यवमत | उरुधारेव दोहते
transliteration: sa na indraḥ śivaḥ sakhāśvāvad ghomad yavamat | urudhāreva dohate
translation: The drops effused, the gladdening draughts, O Indra, Lover of the Son As waters seek the lake where they are wont to rest, fill thee, for bounty, Thunderer.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 93
sanskrit: यदद्य कच्च वर्त्रहन्नुदगा अभि सूर्य | सर्वं तदिन्द्र ते वशे
transliteration: yadadya kacca vṛtrahannudaghā abhi sūrya | sarigvedaaṃ tadindra te vaśe
translation: The matchless draught that strengthens and gives eloquence, the sweetest of the meath drink thou, That in thy joy thou may scatter thy gifts o'er us, plenteously, even as the dust.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 93
sanskrit: यद वा परव्र्द्ध सत्पते न मरा इति मन्यसे | उतो तत सत्यमित तव
transliteration: yad vā pravṛddha satpate na marā iti manyase | uto tat satyamit tava
translation: Come quickly to our laud, urged on by Soma-pressers like a horse- Laud, Godlike Indra, which milch-kine make sweet for thee: with Kanva's sons are gifts for thee.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 93
sanskrit: ये सोमासः परावति ये अर्वावति सुन्विरे | सर्वांस्तानिन्द्र गछसि
transliteration: ye somāsaḥ parāvati ye arigvedaāvati sunvire | sarigvedaāṃstānindra ghachasi
translation: With homage have we sought thee as a Hero, strong, preeminent, with unfailing wealth. O Thunderer, as a plenteous spring pours forth its stream, so, Indra, flow our songs to thee.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 93
sanskrit: तमिन्द्रं वाजयामसि महे वर्त्राय हन्तवे | स वर्षा वर्षभो भुवत
transliteration: tamindraṃ vājayāmasi mahe vṛtrāya hantave | sa vṛṣā vṛṣabho bhuvat
translation: If now thou art at sacrifice, or if thou art upon the earth, Come thence, high-thoughted! to our sacrifice with the Swift, come, Mighty with the Mighty Ones.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 93
sanskrit: इन्द्रः स दामने कर्त ओजिष्ठः स मदे हितः | दयुम्नीश्लोकी स सोम्यः
transliteration: indraḥ sa dāmane kṛta ojiṣṭhaḥ sa made hitaḥ | dyumnīślokī sa somyaḥ
translation: The active, fleet-foot, tawny Coursers that are thine are swift to victory, like the Wind, Wherewith thou goest round to visit Manus' seed, wherewith all heaven is visible.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 93
sanskrit: गिरा वज्रो न सम्भ्र्तः सबलो अनपच्युतः | ववक्ष रष्वोस्त्र्तः
transliteration: ghirā vajro na sambhṛtaḥ sabalo anapacyutaḥ | vavakṣa ṛṣvoastṛtaḥ
translation: Indra, from thee so great we crave prosperity in wealth of kine, As, Maghavan, thou favouredst Medhyatithi, and, in the fight, Nipatithi.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 93
sanskrit: दुर्गे चिन नः सुगं कर्धि गर्णान इन्द्र गिर्वणः | तवं च मघवन वशः
transliteration: durghe cin naḥ sughaṃ kṛdhi ghṛṇāna indra ghirigvedaaṇaḥ | tvaṃ ca maghavan vaśaḥ
translation: As, Maghavan, to Kanva, Trasadasyu, and to Paktha and Dasavraja; As, Indra, to Gosarya and Rjisvan, thou vouchsafedst wealth in kine and gold.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 94
sanskrit: गौर्धयति मरुतां शरवस्युर्माता मघोनाम | युक्ता वह्नी रथानाम
transliteration: ghaurdhayati marutāṃ śravasyurmātā maghonām | yuktā vahnī rathānām
translation: SAKRA I praise, to win his aid, far-famed, exceeding bountiful, Who gives, as 'twere in thousands, precious wealth to him who sheds the juice and worships him.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 94
sanskrit: यस्या देवा उपस्थे वरता विश्वे धारयन्ति | सूर्यामासाद्र्शे कम
transliteration: yasyā devā upasthe vratā viśve dhārayanti | sūryāmāsādṛśe kam
translation: Arrows with hundred points, unconquerable, are this Indra's mighty arms in war. He streams on liberal worshippers like a hill with springs, when juices poured have gladdened him.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 94
sanskrit: तत सु नो विश्वे अर्य आ सदा गर्णन्ति कारवः | मरुतः सोमपीतये
transliteration: tat su no viśve arya ā sadā ghṛṇanti kāravaḥ | marutaḥ somapītaye
translation: What time the flowing Soma-drops have gladdened with their taste the Friend, Like water, gracious Lord! were my libations made, like milch-kine to the worshipper.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 94
sanskrit: अस्ति सोमो अयं सुतः पिबन्त्यस्य मरुतः | उत सवराजो अश्विना
transliteration: asti somo ayaṃ sutaḥ pibantyasya marutaḥ | uta svarājo aśvinā
translation: To him the peerless, who is calling you to give you aid, forth flow the drops of pleasant meath. The Soma-drops which call on thee, O gracious Lord, have brought thee to our hymn of praise.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 94
sanskrit: पिबन्ति मित्रो अर्यमा तना पूतस्य वरुणः | तरिषधस्थस्य जावतः
transliteration: pibanti mitro aryamā tanā pūtasya varuṇaḥ | triṣadhasthasya jāvataḥ
translation: He rushes hurrying like a steed to Soma that adorns our rite, Which hymns make sweet to thee, lover of pleasant food. The call to Paura thou dost love.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 94
sanskrit: उतो नवस्य जोषमानिन्द्रः सुतस्य गोमतः | परातर्होतेव मत्सति
transliteration: uto nvasya joṣamānindraḥ sutasya ghomataḥ | prātarhoteva matsati
translation: Praise the strong, grasping Hero, winner of the spoil, ruling supreme o'er mighty wealth. Like a full spring, O Thunderer, from thy store hast thou poured on the worshipper evermore.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 94
sanskrit: कदत्विषन्त सूरयस्तिर आप इव सरिधः | अर्षन्ति पूतदक्षसः
transliteration: kadatviṣanta sūrayastira āpa iva sridhaḥ | arṣanti pūtadakṣasaḥ
translation: Now whether thou be far away, or in the heavens, or on the earth, O Indra, mighty- thoughted, harnessing thy Bays, come Lofty with the Lofty Ones.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 94
sanskrit: कद वो अद्य महानां देवानामवो वर्णे | तमना च दस्मवर्चसाम
transliteration: kad vo adya mahānāṃ devānāmavo vṛṇe | tmanā ca dasmavarcasām
translation: The Bays who draw thy chariot, Steeds who injure none, surpass the wind's impetuous strength- With whom thou silencest the enemy of man, with whom thou goest round the sky.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 95
sanskrit: आ तवा गिरो रथीरिवास्थुः सुतेषु गिर्वणः | अभि तवा समनूषतेन्द्र वत्सं न मातरः
transliteration: abhi tvā samanūṣatendra vatsaṃ na mātaraḥ
translation: As with Manu Samvarani, Indra, thou drankest Soma juice, And, Maghavan, with Nipatithi, Medbyatithi, with Pustigu and Srustigu,-

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 96
sanskrit: अस्मा उषास आतिरन्त याममिन्द्राय नक्तमूर्म्याः सुवाचः | अस्मा आपो मातरः सप्त तस्थुर्न्र्भ्यस्तराय सिन्धवः सुपाराः
transliteration: asmā uṣāsa ātiranta yāmamindrāya naktamūrmyāḥ suvācaḥ | asmā āpo mātaraḥ sapta tasthurnṛbhyastarāya sindhavaḥ supārāḥ
translation: As, Sakra, thou with Manu called Vivasvan drankest Soma juice, As, Indra, thou didst love the hymn by Trita's side, so dost thou joy with Ayu now.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 96
sanskrit: अतिविद्धा विथुरेणा चिदस्त्रा तरिः सप्त सानु संहिता गिरीणाम | न तद देवो न मर्त्यस्तुतुर्याद यानि परव्र्द्धो वर्षभश्चकार
transliteration: atividdhā vithureṇā cidastrā triḥ sapta sānu saṃhitā ghirīṇām | na tad devo na martyastuturyād yāni pravṛddho vṛṣabhaścakāra
translation: As thou with Matarisvan, Medhya, Prsadhra, hast cheered thee Indra, with pressed juice, Drunk Soma with Rjunas, Syumarasmi, by Dasonya's Dasasipra's side.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 96
sanskrit: इन्द्रस्य वज्र आयसो निमिश्ल इन्द्रस्य बाह्वोर्भूयिष्ठमोजः | शीर्षन्निन्द्रस्य करतवो निरेक आसन्नेषन्त शरुत्या उपाके
transliteration: indrasya vajra āyaso nimiśla indrasya bāhvorbhūyiṣṭhamojaḥ |
translation: 'Tis he who made the lauds his own and boldly drank the Soma juice, He to whom Visnu came striding his three wide steps, as Mitra's statutes ordered it.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 97
sanskrit: या इन्द्र भुज आभरः सवर्वानसुरेभ्यः | सतोतारमिन मघवन्नस्य वर्धय ये च तवे वर्क्तबर्हिषः
transliteration: yā indra bhuja ābharaḥ svarigvedaānasurebhyaḥ | stotāramin maghavannasya vardhaya ye ca tve vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
translation: As highest of the Maghavans, preeminent among the Bulls, Best breaker-down of forts, kine-winner, Lord of wealth, we seek thee, Indra Maghavan.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 97
sanskrit: यमिन्द्र दधिषे तवमश्वं गां भागमव्ययम | यजमाने सुन्वति दक्षिणावति तस्मिन तं धेहि मा पणौ
transliteration: yamindra dadhiṣe tvamaśvaṃ ghāṃ bhāghamavyayam | yajamāne sunvati dakṣiṇāvati tasmin taṃ dhehi mā paṇau
translation: Thou who subduedst Ayu, Kutsa, Atithigva, waxing daily in thy might, As such, rousing thy power, we invocate thee now, thee Satakratu, Lord of Bays.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 97
sanskrit: य इन्द्र सस्त्यव्रतो.अनुष्वापमदेवयुः | सवैः ष एवैर्मुमुरत पोष्यं रयिं सनुतर्धेहि तं ततः
transliteration: ya indra sastyavrato.anuṣvāpamadevayuḥ | svaiḥ ṣa evairmumurat poṣyaṃ rayiṃ sanutardhehi taṃ tataḥ
translation: The pressing-stones shall pour for us the essence of the meath of all, Drops that have been pressed out afar among the folk, and those that have been pressed near us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 97
sanskrit: यच्छक्रासि परावति यदर्वावति वर्त्रहन | अतस्त्वा गीर्भिर्द्युगदिन्द्र केशिभिः सुतावाना विवासति
transliteration: yacchakrāsi parāvati yadarigvedaāvati vṛtrahan | atastvā ghīrbhirdyughadindra keśibhiḥ sutāvānā vivāsati
translation: Repel all enmities and keep them far away: let all win treasure for their own. Even among Sistas are the stalks that make thee glad, where thou with Soma satest thee.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 97
sanskrit: यद वासि रोचने दिवः समुद्रस्याधि विष्टपि | यत पार्थिवे सदने वर्त्रहन्तम यदन्तरिक्ष आ गहि
transliteration: yad vāsi rocane divaḥ samudrasyādhi viṣṭapi | yat pārthive sadane vṛtrahantama yadantarikṣa ā ghahi
translation: Come, Indra, very near to us with aids of firmly-based resolve; Come, most auspicious, with thy most auspicious help, good Kinsman, with good kinsmen, come!

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 97
sanskrit: स नः सोमेषु सोमपाः सुतेषु शवसस पते | मादयस्व रादसा सून्र्तावतेन्द्र राया परीणसा
transliteration: sa naḥ someṣu somapāḥ suteṣu śavasas pate | mādayasva rādasā sūnṛtāvatendra rāyā parīṇasā
translation: Bless thou with progeny the chief of men, the lord of heroes, victor in the fray. Aid with thy powers the men who sing thee lauds and keep their spirits ever pure and bright.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 97
sanskrit: मा न इन्द्र परा वर्णग भवा नः सधमाद्यः | तवं न ऊती तवमिन न आप्यं मा न इन्द्र परा वर्णक
transliteration: mā na indra parā vṛṇagh bhavā naḥ sadhamādyaḥ | tvaṃ na ūtī tvamin na āpyaṃ mā na indra parā vṛṇak
translation: May we be such in battle as are surest to obtain thy grace: With holy offerings and invocations of the Gods, we mean, that we may win the spoil.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 97
sanskrit: अस्मे इन्द्र सचा सुते नि षदा पीतये मधु | कर्धी जरित्रेमघवन्नवो महदस्मे इन्द्र सचा सुते
transliteration: asme indra sacā sute ni ṣadā pītaye madhu | kṛdhī jaritremaghavannavo mahadasme indra sacā sute
translation: Thine, Lord of Bays, am I. Prayer longeth for the spoil. Still with thy help I seek the fight. So, at the raiders' head, I, craving steeds and kine, unite myself with thee alone.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 98
sanskrit: इन्द्राय साम गायत विप्राय बर्हते बर्हत | धर्मक्र्ते विपश्चिते पनस्यवे
transliteration: indrāya sāma ghāyata viprāya bṛhate bṛhat | dharmakṛte vipaścite panasyave
translation: INDRA, the poets with their hymns extol this hero might of thine: They strengthened, loud in song, thy power that droppeth oil. With hymns the Pauras came to thee.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 98
sanskrit: तवमिन्द्राभिभूरसि तवं सूर्यमरोचयः | विश्वकर्मा विश्वदेवो महानसि
transliteration: tvamindrābhibhūrasi tvaṃ sūryamarocayaḥ | viśvakarmā viśvadevo mahānasi
translation: Through piety they came to Indra for his aid, they whose libations give thee joy. As thou with, Krsa and Samvarta hast rejoiced, so, Indra, be thou glad with us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 98
sanskrit: विभ्राजञ जयोतिषा सवरगछो रोचनं दिवः | देवास्त इन्द्र सख्याय येमिरे
transliteration: vibhrājañ jyotiṣā svaraghacho rocanaṃ divaḥ | devāsta indra sakhyāya yemire
translation: Agreeing in your spirit, all ye Deities, come nigh to us. Vasus and Rudras shall come near to give us aid, and Maruts listen to our call.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 98
sanskrit: एन्द्र नो गधि परियः सत्राजिदगोह्यः | गिरिर्न विश्वतस्प्र्थुः पतिर्दिवः
transliteration: endra no ghadhi priyaḥ satrājidaghohyaḥ | ghirirna viśvataspṛthuḥ patirdivaḥ
translation: May Pusan, Visnu, and Sarasvati befriend, and the Seven Streams, this call of mine: May Waters, Wind, the Mountains, and the Forest-Lord, and Earth give ear unto my cry.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 98
sanskrit: अभि हि सत्य सोमपा उभे बभूथ रोदसी | इन्द्रासि सुन्वतो वर्धः पतिर्दिवः
transliteration: abhi hi satya somapā ubhe babhūtha rodasī | indrāsi sunvato vṛdhaḥ patirdivaḥ
translation: Indra, with thine own bounteous gift, most liberal of the Mighty Ones, Be our boon benefactor, Vrtra-slayer, be our feast-companion for our weal.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 98
sanskrit: तवं हि शश्वतीनामिन्द्र दर्ता पुरामसि | हन्ता दस्योर्मनोर्व्र्धः पतिर्दिवः
transliteration: tvaṃ hi śaśvatīnāmindra dartā purāmasi | hantā dasyormanorigvedaṛdhaḥ patirdivaḥ
translation: Leader of heroes, Lord of battle, lead thou us to combat, thou Most Sapient One. High fame is theirs who win by invocations, feasts and entertainment of the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 98
sanskrit: अधा हिन्द्र गिर्वण उप तवा कामान महः सस्र्ज्महे | उदेवयन्त उदभिः
transliteration: adhā hindra ghirigvedaaṇa upa tvā kāmān mahaḥ sasṛjmahe | udevayanta udabhiḥ
translation: Our hopes rest on the Faithful One: in Indra is the people's life. O Maghavan, come nigh that thou mayst give us aid: make plenteous food stream forth for us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 98
sanskrit: वार्ण तवा यव्याभिर्वर्धन्ति शूर बरह्माणि | वाव्र्ध्वांसं चिदद्रिवो दिवे-दिवे
transliteration: vārṇa tvā yavyābhirigvedaardhanti śūra brahmāṇi | vāvṛdhvāṃsaṃ cidadrivo dive-dive
translation: Thee would we worship, Indra, with our songs of praise: O Satakratu, be thou ours. Pour down upon Praskanva bounty vast and firm, exuberant, that shall never fail.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 99
sanskrit: तवामिदा हयो नरो.अपीप्यन वज्रिन भूर्णयः | स इन्द्र सतोमवाहसामिह शरुध्युप सवसरमा गहि
transliteration: tvāmidā hyo naro.apīpyan vajrin bhūrṇayaḥ | sa indra stomavāhasāmiha śrudhyupa svasaramā ghahi
translation: GREAT, verily, is Indra's might. I have beheld, and hither comes Thy bounty, Dasyave-vrka!

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 99
sanskrit: मत्स्वा सुशिप्र हरिवस्तदीमहे तवे आ भूषन्ति वेधसः | तव शरवांस्युपमान्युक्थ्या सुतेष्विन्द्र गिर्वणः
transliteration: matsvā suśipra harivastadīmahe tve ā bhūṣanti vedhasaḥ | tava śravāṃsyupamānyukthyā suteṣvindra ghirigvedaaṇaḥ
translation: A hundred oxen white of hue are shining like the stars in heaven, So tall, they seem to prop the sky.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 100
sanskrit: अयं त एमि तन्वा पुरस्ताद विश्वे देवा अभि मा यन्ति पश्चात | यदा मह्यं दीधरो भागमिन्द्रादिन मया कर्णवो वीर्याणि
transliteration: ayaṃ ta emi tanvā purastād viśve devā abhi mā yanti paścāt | yadā mahyaṃ dīdharo bhāghamindrādin mayā kṛṇavo vīryāṇi
translation: THY bounty, Dasyave-vrka, exhaustless hath displayed itself: Its fulness is as broad as heaven.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 100
sanskrit: दधामि ते मधुनो भक्षमग्रे हितस्ते भागः सुतो अस्तु सोमः | असश्च तवं दक्षिणतः सखा मे.अधा वर्त्राणिजङघनाव भूरि
transliteration: dadhāmi te madhuno bhakṣamaghre hitaste bhāghaḥ suto astu somaḥ | asaśca tvaṃ dakṣiṇataḥ sakhā me.adhā vṛtrāṇijaṅghanāva bhūri
translation: Ten thousand Dasyave-vrka, the son of Putakrata, hath From his own wealth bestowed on me.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 100
sanskrit: पर सु सतोमं भरत वाजयन्त इन्द्राय सत्यं यदि सत्यमस्ति | नेन्द्रो अस्तीति नेम उ तव आह क ईं ददर्श कमभिष्टवाम
transliteration: pra su stomaṃ bharata vājayanta indrāya satyaṃ yadi satyamasti | nendro astīti nema u tva āha ka īṃ dadarśa kamabhiṣṭavāma
translation: A hundred asses hath he given, a hundred head of fleecy sheep, A hundred slaves, and wreaths besides.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 100
sanskrit: अयमस्मि जरितः पश्य मेह विश्वा जातान्यभ्यस्मि मह्ना | रतस्य मा परदिशो वर्धयन्त्यादर्दिरो भुवना दर्दरीमि
transliteration: ayamasmi jaritaḥ paśya meha viśvā jātānyabhyasmi mahnā |
translation: There also was a mare led forth, picked out for Putakrata's sake, Not of the horses of the herd.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 101
sanskrit: रधगित्था स मर्त्यः शशमे देवतातये | यो नूनं मित्रावरुणावभिष्टय आचक्रे हव्यदातये
transliteration: yo nūnaṃ mitrāvaruṇāvabhiṣṭaya ācakre havyadātaye
translation: ENDOWED, O Gods, with your primeval wisdom, come quickly with your chariot, O ye Holy. Come with your mighty powers, O ye Nasatyas; come hither, drink ye this the third libation.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 101
sanskrit: वर्षिष्ठक्षत्रा उरुचक्षसा नरा राजाना दीर्घश्रुत्तमा | ता बाहुता न दंसना रथर्यतः साकं सूर्यस्य रश्मिभिः
transliteration: varṣiṣṭhakṣatrā urucakṣasā narā rājānā dīrghaśruttamā | tā bāhutā na daṃsanā ratharyataḥ sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ
translation: The truthful Deities, the Three-and-Thirty, saw you approach before the Ever-Truthful. Accepting this our worship and libation, O Asvins bright with fire, drink ye the Soma.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 101
sanskrit: पर यो वां मित्रावरुणाजिरो दूतो अद्रवत | अयःशीर्षा मदेरघुः
transliteration: pra yo vāṃ mitrāvaruṇājiro dūto adravat | ayaḥśīrṣā maderaghuḥ
translation: Asvins, that work of yours deserves our wonder,-the Bull of heaven and earth and air's mid region; Yea, and your thousand promises in battle, -to all of these come near and drink beside us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 101
sanskrit: न यः सम्प्र्छे न पुनर्हवीतवे नसंवादाय रमते | तस्मान नो अद्य सम्र्तेरुरुष्यतं बाहुभ्यां न उरुष्यतम
transliteration: na yaḥ sampṛche na punarhavītave nasaṃvādāya ramate | tasmān no adya samṛteruruṣyataṃ bāhubhyāṃ na uruṣyatam
translation: Here is your portion laid for you, ye Holy: come to these songs of ours, O ye Nasatyas. Drink among us the Soma full of sweetness, and with your powers assist the man who worships.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 102
sanskrit: तवमग्ने बर्हद वयो दधासि देव दाशुषे | कविर्ग्र्हपतिर्युवा
transliteration: tvamaghne bṛhad vayo dadhāsi deva dāśuṣe | kavirghṛhapatiryuvā
translation: HE whom the priests in sundry ways arranging the sacrifice, of one accord, bring hither, Who was appointed as a learned Brahman, what is the sacrificer's knowledge of him?

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 102
sanskrit: स न ईळानया सह देवानग्ने दुवस्युवा | चिकिद विभानवा वह
transliteration: sa na īḷānayā saha devānaghne duvasyuvā | cikid vibhānavā vaha
translation: Kindled in many a spot, still One is Agni; Silrya is One though high o'er all he shineth. Illumining this All, still One is Usas. That which is One hath into All developed.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 102
sanskrit: तवया ह सविद युजा वयं चोदिष्ठेन यविष्ठ्य | अभि षमोवाजसातये
transliteration: tvayā ha svid yujā vayaṃ codiṣṭhena yaviṣṭhya | abhi ṣmovājasātaye
translation: The chariot bright and radiant, treasure-laden, three-wheeled, with easy seat, and lightly rolling, Which She of Wondrous Wealth was born to harness,-this car of yours I call. Drink what remaineth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 103
sanskrit: अदर्शि गातुवित्तमो यस्मिन वरतान्यादधुः | उपो षु जातमार्यस्य वर्धनमग्निं नक्षन्त नो गिरः
transliteration: adarśi ghātuvittamo yasmin vratānyādadhuḥ | upo ṣu jātamāryasya vardhanamaghniṃ nakṣanta no ghiraḥ
translation: IN offerings poured to you, O Indra-Varuna, these shares of yours stream forth to glorify your state. Ye haste to the libations at each sacrifice when ye assist the worshipper who sheds the juice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 103
sanskrit: पर दैवोदासो अग्निर्देवानछा न मज्मना | अनु मातरम्प्र्थिवीं वि वाव्र्ते तस्थौ नाकस्य सानवि
transliteration: pra daivodāso aghnirdevānachā na majmanā | anu mātarampṛthivīṃ vi vāvṛte tasthau nākasya sānavi
translation: The waters and the plants, O Indra-Varuna, had efficacious vigour, and attained to might: Ye who have gone beyond the path of middle air,-no godless man is worthy to be called your foe.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 103
sanskrit: यस्माद रेजन्त कर्ष्टयश्चर्क्र्त्यानि कर्ण्वतः | सहस्रसाम्मेधसाताविव तमनाग्निं धीभिः सपर्यत
transliteration: yasmād rejanta kṛṣṭayaścarkṛtyāni kṛṇvataḥ | sahasrasāmmedhasātāviva tmanāghniṃ dhībhiḥ saparyata
translation: True is your Krsa's word, Indra and Varuna: The seven holy voices pour a wave of meath. For their sake, Lords of splendour! aid the pious man who, unbewildered, keeps you ever in his thoughts.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 103
sanskrit: पर यं राये निनीषसि मर्तो यस्ते वसो दाशत | स वीरं धत्ते अग्न उक्थशंसिनं तमना सहस्रपोषिणम
transliteration: pra yaṃ rāye ninīṣasi marto yaste vaso dāśat | sa vīraṃ dhatte aghna ukthaśaṃsinaṃ tmanā sahasrapoṣiṇam
translation: Dropping oil, sweet with Soma, pouring forth their stream, are the Seven Sisters in the seat of sacrifice. These, dropping oil, are yours, O Indra-Varuna: with these enrich with gifts and help the worshipper.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 103
sanskrit: स दर्ळ्हे चिदभि तर्णत्ति वाजमर्वता स धत्ते अक्षिति शरवः | तवे देवत्रा सदा पुरूवसो विश्वा वामानि धीमहि
transliteration: sa dṛḷhe cidabhi tṛṇatti vājamarigvedaatā sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ | tve devatrā sadā purūvaso viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi
translation: To our great happiness have we ascribed to these Two Bright Ones truthfulness, great strength, and majesty. O Lords of splendour, aid us through the Three-times-Seven, as we pour holy oil, O Indra-Varuna.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 103
sanskrit: यो विश्वा दयते वसु होता मन्द्रो जनानाम | मधोर्न पात्रा परथमान्यस्मै पर सतोमा यन्त्यग्नये
transliteration: yo viśvā dayate vasu hotā mandro janānām | madhorna pātrā prathamānyasmai pra stomā yantyaghnaye
translation: What ye in time of old Indra and Varuna, gave Rsis revelation, thought, and power of song, And places which the wise made, weaving sacrifice,-these through my spirit's fervid glow have I beheld.,

title: Rig Veda Mandala 8 Hymn 103
sanskrit: अश्वं न गीर्भी रथ्यं सुदानवो मर्म्र्ज्यन्ते देवयवः | उभे तोके तनये दस्म विश्पते पर्षि राधो मघोनाम
transliteration: aśvaṃ na ghīrbhī rathyaṃ sudānavo marmṛjyante devayavaḥ | ubhe toke tanaye dasma viśpate parṣi rādho maghonām
translation: O Indra-Varuna, grant to the worshippers cheerfulness void of pride, and wealth to nourish them.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 1
sanskrit: सवादिष्ठया मदिष्ठया पवस्व सोम धारया | इन्द्राय पातवे सुतः
transliteration: svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayā pavasva soma dhārayā | indrāya pātave sutaḥ
translation: In sweetest and most gladdening stream flow pure, O Soma, on thy way, Pressed out for Indra, for his drink.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 1
sanskrit: रक्षोहा विश्वचर्षनिरभि योनिमयोहतम | दरुणा सधस्थमासदत
transliteration: rakṣohā viśvacarṣanirabhi yonimayohatam | druṇā sadhasthamāsadat
translation: Fiend-queller, Friend of all men, he hath with the wood attained unto His place, his iron-fashioned home.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 1
sanskrit: वरिवोधातमो भव मंहिष्ठो वर्त्रहन्तमः | पर्षि राधोमघोनाम
transliteration: varivodhātamo bhava maṃhiṣṭho vṛtrahantamaḥ | parṣi rādhomaghonām
translation: Be thou best Vrtra-slayer, best granter of bliss, most liberal: Promote our wealthy princes' gifts.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 1
sanskrit: अभ्यर्ष महानां देवानां वीतिमन्धसा | अभि वाजमुत शरवः
transliteration: abhyarṣa mahānāṃ devānāṃ vītimandhasā | abhi vājamuta śravaḥ
translation: Flow onward with thy juice unto the banquet of the Mighty Gods: Flow hither for our strength and fame.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 1
sanskrit: तवामछा चरामसि तदिदर्थं दिवे-दिवे | इन्दो तवे न आशसः
transliteration: tvāmachā carāmasi tadidarthaṃ dive-dive | indo tve na āśasaḥ
translation: O Indu, we draw nigh to thee, with this one object day by day: To thee alone our prayers are said

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 1
sanskrit: पुनाति ते परिस्रुतं सोमं सूर्यस्य दुहिता | वारेण शश्वता तना
transliteration: punāti te parisrutaṃ somaṃ sūryasya duhitā | vāreṇa śaśvatā tanā
translation: By means of this eternal fleece may Surya's Daughter purify Thy Soma that is foaming forth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 1
sanskrit: तमीमण्वीः समर्य आ गर्भ्णन्ति योषणो दश | सवसारः पार्ये दिवि
transliteration: tamīmaṇvīḥ samarya ā ghṛbhṇanti yoṣaṇo daśa | svasāraḥ pārye divi
translation: Ten sister maids of slender form seize him within the press and hold Him firmly on the final day.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 1
sanskrit: तमीं हिन्वन्त्यग्रुवो धमन्ति बाकुरं दर्तिम | तरिधातु वारणं मधु
transliteration: tamīṃ hinvantyaghruvo dhamanti bākuraṃ dṛtim | tridhātu vāraṇaṃ madhu
translation: The virgins send him forth: they blow the the skin musician-like and fuse The triple foe-repelling meath.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 1
sanskrit: अभीममघ्न्या उत शरीणन्ति धेनवः शिशुम | सोममिन्द्राय पातवे
transliteration: abhīmamaghnyā uta śrīṇanti dhenavaḥ śiśum | somamindrāya pātave
translation: Inviolable milch-kine round about him blend for Indra's drink, The fresh young Soma with their milk.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 1
sanskrit: अस्येदिन्द्रो मदेष्वा विश्वा वर्त्राणि जिघ्नते | शूरो मघा च मंहते
transliteration: asyedindro madeṣvā viśvā vṛtrāṇi jighnate |
translation: In the wild raptures of this draught, Indra slays all the Vrtras: he, The Hero, pours his wealth on us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 2
sanskrit: पवस्व देववीरति पवित्रं सोम रंह्या | इन्द्रमिन्दो वर्षा विश
transliteration: pavasva devavīrati pavitraṃ soma raṃhyā | indramindo vṛṣā viśa
translation: Soma, flow on, inviting Gods, speed to the purifying cloth: Pass into Indra, as a Bull.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 3
sanskrit: एष देवो अमर्त्यः पर्णवीरिव दीयति | अभि दरोणान्यासदम
transliteration: eṣa devo amartyaḥ parṇavīriva dīyati | abhi droṇānyāsadam
translation: HERE present this Immortal God flies, like a bird upon her wings, To settle in the vats of wood.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 3
sanskrit: एष देवो विपा कर्तो.अति हवरांसि धावति | पवमानो अदाभ्यः
transliteration: eṣa devo vipā kṛto.ati hvarāṃsi dhāvati | pavamāno adābhyaḥ
translation: This God, made ready with the hymn, runs swiftly through the winding ways, Inviolable as he flows.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 3
sanskrit: एष देवो विपन्युभिः पवमान रतायुभिः | हरिर्वाजाय मर्ज्यते
transliteration: eṣa devo vipanyubhiḥ pavamāna ṛtāyubhiḥ | haririgvedaājāya mṛjyate
translation: This God while flowing is adorned, like a bay steed for war, by men Devout and skilled in holy songs.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 3
sanskrit: एष विश्वानि वार्या शूरो यन्निव सत्वभिः | पवमानःसिषासति
transliteration: eṣa viśvāni vāryā śūro yanniva satvabhiḥ | pavamānaḥsiṣāsati
translation: He, like a warrior going forth with heroes, as he flows along Is fain to win all precious boons.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 3
sanskrit: एष देवो रथर्यति पवमानो दशस्यति | आविष कर्णोति वग्वनुम
transliteration: eṣa devo ratharyati pavamāno daśasyati |
translation: This God, as he is flowing on, speeds like a car and gives his gifts: He lets his voice be heard of all

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 4
sanskrit: सना च सोम जेषि च पवमान महि शरवः | अथा नो वस्यसस कर्धि
transliteration: sanā ca soma jeṣi ca pavamāna mahi śravaḥ | athā no vasyasas kṛdhi
translation: O Soma flowing on thy way, win thou and conquer high renown; And make us better than we are.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 4
sanskrit: सना जयोतिः सना सवर्विश्वा च सोम सौभगा | अथा ...
transliteration: sanā jyotiḥ sanā svarigvedaśvā ca soma saubhaghā | athā ...
translation: Win thou the light, win heavenly light, and, Soma, all felicities; And make us better than we are.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 4
sanskrit: सना दक्षमुत करतुमप सोम मर्धो जहि | अथा ...
transliteration: sanā dakṣamuta kratumapa soma mṛdho jahi | athā ...
translation: Win skillful strength and mental power. O Soma, drive away our foes; And make us better than we are.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 4
sanskrit: पवीतारः पुनीतन सोममिन्द्राय पातवे | अथा ...
transliteration: pavītāraḥ punītana somamindrāya pātave | athā ...
translation: Ye purifiers, purify Soma for Indra, for his drink: Make thou us better than we are.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 4
sanskrit: तवं सूर्ये न आ भज तव करत्वा तवोतिभिः | अथा ...
transliteration: tvaṃ sūrye na ā bhaja tava kratvā tavotibhiḥ | athā ...
translation: Give us our portion in the Sun through thine own mental power and aids; And make us better than we are.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 4
sanskrit: तव करत्वा तवोतिभिर्ज्योक पश्येम सूर्यम | अथा ...
transliteration: tava kratvā tavotibhirjyok paśyema sūryam | athā ...
translation: Through thine own mental power and aid long may we look upon the Sun; Make thou us better than we are.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 4
sanskrit: अभ्यर्ष सवायुध सोम दविबर्हसं रयिम | अथा ...
transliteration: abhyarṣa svāyudha soma dvibarhasaṃ rayim | athā ...
translation: Well-weaponed Soma, pour to us a stream of riches doubly great; And make us better than we are.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 4
sanskrit: अभ्यर्षानपच्युतो रयिं समत्सु सासहिः | अथा ...
transliteration: abhyarṣānapacyuto rayiṃ samatsu sāsahiḥ | athā ...
translation: As one victorious unsubdued in battle pour forth wealth to us; And make us better than we are.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 4
sanskrit: तवां यज्ञैरवीव्र्धन पवमान विधर्मणि | अथा ...
transliteration: tvāṃ yajñairavīvṛdhan pavamāna vidharmaṇi | athā ...
translation: By worship, Pavamana! men have strengthened thee to prop the Law: Make thou us better than we are.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 4
sanskrit: रयिं नश्चित्रमश्विनमिन्दो विश्वायमा भर | अथा .. .
transliteration: rayiṃ naścitramaśvinamindo viśvāyamā bhara | athā .. .
translation: O Indu, bring us wealth in steeds, manifold. quickening all life; And mate us better than we are.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 5
sanskrit: समिद्धो विश्वतस पतिः पवमानो वि राजति | परीणन वर्षा कनिक्रदत
transliteration: samiddho viśvatas patiḥ pavamāno vi rājati | prīṇan vṛṣā kanikradat
translation: ENKINDLED, Pavamana, Lord, sends forth his light on, every side In friendly show, the bellowing Bull.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 5
sanskrit: तनूनपात पवमानः शर्ङगे शिशानो अर्षति | अन्तरिक्षेण रारजत
transliteration: tanūnapāt pavamānaḥ śṛṅghe śiśāno arṣati | antarikṣeṇa rārajat
translation: He, Pavamana, Self-produced, speeds onward sharpening his horns: He glitters through the firmament.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 6
sanskrit: मन्द्रया सोम धारया वर्षा पवस्व देवयुः | अव्यो वारेष्वस्मयुः
transliteration: mandrayā soma dhārayā vṛṣā pavasva devayuḥ | avyo vāreṣvasmayuḥ
translation: SOMA, flow on with pleasant stream, a Bull devoted to the Gods, Our Friend, unto the woolen sieve.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 6
sanskrit: अभि तयं मद्यं मदमिन्दविन्द्र इति कषर | अभि वाजिनोर्वतः
transliteration: abhi tyaṃ madyaṃ madamindavindra iti kṣara | abhi vājinoarigvedaataḥ
translation: Pour hitherward, as Indra's Self, Indu, that gladdening stream of thine, And send us coursers full of strength.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 6
sanskrit: अभि तयं पूर्व्यं मदं सुवानो अर्ष पवित्र आ | अभि वाजमुत शरवः
transliteration: abhi tyaṃ pūrigvedayaṃ madaṃ suvāno arṣa pavitra ā | abhi vājamuta śravaḥ
translation: Flow to the filter hitherward, pouring that ancient gladdening juice, Streaming forth power and high renown.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 6
sanskrit: अनु दरप्सास इन्दव आपो न परवतासरन | पुनाना इन्द्रमाशत
transliteration: anu drapsāsa indava āpo na pravatāsaran | punānā indramāśata
translation: Hither the sparkling drops have flowed, like waters down a steep descent They have reached Indra purified.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 6
sanskrit: यमत्यमिव वाजिनं मर्जन्ति योषणो दश | वने करीळन्तमत्यविम
transliteration: yamatyamiva vājinaṃ mṛjanti yoṣaṇo daśa | vane krīḷantamatyavim
translation: Whom, having passed the filter, ten dames cleanse, as 'twere a vigorous steed, While he disports him in the wood,-

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 6
sanskrit: तं गोभिर्व्र्षणं रसं मदाय देववीतये | सुतं भराय सं सर्ज
transliteration: taṃ ghobhirigvedaṛṣaṇaṃ rasaṃ madāya devavītaye | sutaṃ bharāya saṃ sṛja
translation: The steer-strong juice with milk pour forth, for feast and service of the Gods, To him who bears away the draught.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 6
sanskrit: देवो देवाय धारयेन्द्राय पवते सुतः | पयो यदस्य पीपयत
transliteration: devo devāya dhārayendrāya pavate sutaḥ | payo yadasya pīpayat
translation: Effused, the God flows onward with his stream to Indra, to the God, So that his milk may strengthen him.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 7
sanskrit: अस्र्ग्रम इन्दवः पथा धर्मन्न रतस्य सुश्रियः | विदाना अस्य योजनम
transliteration: asṛghram indavaḥ pathā dharmann ṛtasya suśriyaḥ | vidānā asya yojanam
translation: FORTH on their way the glorious drops have flowed for maintenance of Law, Knowing this sacrifice's course.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 7
sanskrit: पर धारा मध्वो अग्रियो महीर अपो वि गाहते | हविर हविष्षु वन्द्यः
transliteration: pra dhārā madhvo aghriyo mahīr apo vi ghāhate | havir haviṣṣu vandyaḥ
translation: Down in the mighty waters sinks the stream of meath, most excellent, Oblation best of all in worth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 7
sanskrit: पर युजो वाचो अग्रियो वर्षाव चक्रदद वने | सद्माभि सत्यो अध्वरः
transliteration: pra yujo vāco aghriyo vṛṣāva cakradad vane | sadmābhi satyo adhvaraḥ
translation: About the holy place, the Steer true, guileless, noblest, hath sent forth Continuous voices in the wood.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 7
sanskrit: परि यत काव्या कविर नर्म्णा वसानो अर्षति | सवर वाजी सिषासति
transliteration: pari yat kāvyā kavir nṛmṇā vasāno arṣati | svar vājī siṣāsati
translation: When, clothed in manly strength, the Sage flows in celestial wisdom round, The Strong would win the light of heaven.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 7
sanskrit: पवमानो अभि सप्र्धो विशो राजेव सीदति | यद ईम रण्वन्ति वेधसः
transliteration: pavamāno abhi spṛdho viśo rājeva sīdati | yad īm ṛṇvanti vedhasaḥ
translation: When purified, he sits as King above the hosts, among his folk, What time the sages bring him nigh.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 7
sanskrit: अव्यो वारे परि परियो हरिर वनेषु सीदति | रेभो वनुष्यते मती
transliteration: avyo vāre pari priyo harir vaneṣu sīdati | rebho vanuṣyate matī
translation: Dear, golden-coloured, in the fleece he sinks and settles in the wood: The Singer shows his zeal in hymns.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 7
sanskrit: स वायुम इन्द्रम अश्विना साकम मदेन गछति | रणा यो अस्य धर्मभिः
transliteration: sa vāyum indram aśvinā sākam madena ghachati | raṇā yo asya dharmabhiḥ
translation: He goes to Indra, Vayu, to the Asvins, as his custom is, With gladdening juice which gives them joy.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 8
sanskrit: एते सोमा अभि परियम इन्द्रस्य कामम अक्षरन | वर्धन्तो अस्य वीर्यम
transliteration: ete somā abhi priyam indrasya kāmam akṣaran | vardhanto asya vīryam
translation: OBEYING Indra's dear desire these Soma juices have flowed forth, Increasing his heroic might.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 8
sanskrit: पुनानासश चमूषदो गछन्तो वायुम अश्विना | ते नो धान्तु सुवीर्यम
transliteration: punānāsaś camūṣado ghachanto vāyum aśvinā | te no dhāntu suvīryam
translation: Laid in the bowl, pure-flowing on to Vayu and the Asvins, may These give us great heroic strength.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 8
sanskrit: इन्द्रस्य सोम राधसे पुनानो हार्दि चोदय | रतस्य योनिम आसदम
transliteration: indrasya soma rādhase punāno hārdi codaya |
translation: Soma, as thou art purified, incite to bounty Indra's heart, To sit in place of sacrifice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 9
sanskrit: परि परिया दिवः कविर वयांसि नप्त्य्र हितः | सुवानो याति कविक्रतुः
transliteration: pari priyā divaḥ kavir vayāṃsi naptyr hitaḥ | suvāno yāti kavikratuḥ
translation: THE Sage of Heaven whose heart is wise, when laid between both hands and pressed, Sends us delightful powers of life.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 9
sanskrit: पर-पर कषयाय पन्यसे जनाय जुष्टो अद्रुहे | वीत्य अर्ष चनिष्ठया
transliteration: pra-pra kṣayāya panyase janāya juṣṭo adruhe | vīty arṣa caniṣṭhayā
translation: On, onward to a glorious home; dear to the people void of guile, With excellent enjoyment, flow.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 9
sanskrit: स सूनुर मातरा शुचिर जातो जाते अरोचयत | महान मही रताव्र्धा
transliteration: sa sūnur mātarā śucir jāto jāte arocayat | mahān mahī ṛtāvṛdhā
translation: He, the bright Son, when born illumed his Parents who had sprung to life, Great Son great Strengtheners of Law.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 9
sanskrit: स सप्त धीतिभिर हितो नद्य अजिन्वद अद्रुहः | या एकम अक्षि वाव्र्धुः
transliteration: sa sapta dhītibhir hito nady ajinvad adruhaḥ | yā ekam akṣi vāvṛdhuḥ
translation: Urged by the seven devotions he hath stirred the guileless rivers which Have magnified the Single Eye.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 9
sanskrit: ता अभि सन्तम अस्त्र्तम महे युवानम आ दधुः | इन्दुम इन्द्र तव वरते
transliteration: tā abhi santam astṛtam mahe yuvānam ā dadhuḥ | indum indra tava vrate
translation: These helped to might the Youthful One, high over all, invincible, Even Indu, Indra! in thy law.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 9
sanskrit: अभि वह्निर अमर्त्यः सप्त पश्यति वावहिः | करिविर देवीर अतर्पयत
transliteration: abhi vahnir amartyaḥ sapta paśyati vāvahiḥ | krivir devīr atarpayat
translation: The immortal Courser, good to draw, looks down upon the Seven: the fount Hath satisfied the Goddesses

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 9
sanskrit: अवा कल्पेषु नः पुमस तमांसि सोम योध्या | तानि पुनान जघनः
transliteration: avā kalpeṣu naḥ pumas tamāṃsi soma yodhyā | tāni punāna jaghanaḥ
translation: Aid us in holy rites, O Man: O Pavamana, drive away Dark shades that must be met in fight.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 9
sanskrit: नू नव्यसे नवीयसे सूक्ताय साधया पथः | परत्नवद रोचया रुचः
transliteration: nū navyase navīyase sūktāya sādhayā pathaḥ | pratnavad rocayā rucaḥ
translation: Make the paths ready for a hymn newer and newer evermore: Make the lights shine as erst they shone.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 9
sanskrit: पवमान महि शरवो गाम अश्वं रासि वीरवत | सना मेधां सना सवः |
transliteration: pavamāna mahi śravo ghām aśvaṃ rāsi vīravat | sanā medhāṃ sanā svaḥ | rigveda09009.shtml by HTTrack Website Copier/3.x [XR&CO'2008], Sat, 22 Nov 2008 14:12:08 GMT
translation: Give, Pavamana, high renown, give kine and steeds and hero sons: Win for us wisdom, win the light.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 10
sanskrit: पर सवानासो रथा इवार्वन्तो न शरवस्यवः | सोमासो राये अक्रमुः
