transliteration: pra svānāso rathā ivārigvedaanto na śravasyavaḥ | somāso rāye akramuḥ
translation: LIKE cars that thunder on their way, like coursers eager for renown, Have Soma-drops flowed forth for wealth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 10
sanskrit: हिन्वानासो रथा इव दधन्विरे गभस्त्योः | भरासः कारिणाम इव
transliteration: hinvānāso rathā iva dadhanvire ghabhastyoḥ | bharāsaḥ kāriṇām iva
translation: Forth have they rushed from holding hands, like chariots that are urged to speed, Like joyful songs of singing-men.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 10
sanskrit: राजानो न परशस्तिभिः सोमासो गोभिर अञ्जते | यज्ञो न सप्त धात्र्भिः
transliteration: rājāno na praśastibhiḥ somāso ghobhir añjate | yajño na sapta dhātṛbhiḥ
translation: The Somas deck themselves with milk, as Kings are graced with eulogies, And, with seven priests, the sacrifice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 10
sanskrit: परि सुवानास इन्दवो मदाय बर्हणा गिरा | सुता अर्षन्ति धारया
transliteration: pari suvānāsa indavo madāya barhaṇā ghirā | sutā arṣanti dhārayā
translation: Pressed for the gladdening draught, the drops flow forth abundantly with song, The Soma juices in a stream.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 11
sanskrit: उपास्मै गायता नरः पवमानायेन्दवे | अभि देवां इयक्षते
transliteration: upāsmai ghāyatā naraḥ pavamānāyendave | abhi devāṃ iyakṣate
translation: SING forth to Indu, O ye men, to him who is purified, Fain to pay worship to the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 11
sanskrit: अभि ते मधुना पयो ऽथर्वाणो अशिश्रयुः | देवं देवाय देवयु
transliteration: abhi te madhunā payo 'tharigvedaāṇo aśiśrayuḥ | devaṃ devāya devayu
translation: Together with thy pleasant juice the Atharvans have commingled milk, Divine, devoted to the God.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 11
sanskrit: स नः पवस्व शं गवे शं जनाय शम अर्वते | शं राजन्न ओषधीभ्यः
transliteration: sa naḥ pavasva śaṃ ghave śaṃ janāya śam arigvedaate |
translation: Bring, by thy flowing, weal to kine, weal to the people, weal to steeds. Weal, O thou King, to growing plants

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 12
sanskrit: सोमा अस्र्ग्रमिन्दवः सुता रतस्य सादने | इन्द्राय मधुमत्तमाः
transliteration: somā asṛghramindavaḥ sutā ṛtasya sādane | indrāya madhumattamāḥ
translation: To Indra have the Soma drops, exceeding rich in sweets, been poured, Shed in the seat of sacrifice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 12
sanskrit: अभि विप्रा अनूषत गावो वत्सं न मातरः | इन्द्रं सोमस्य पीतये
transliteration: abhi viprā anūṣata ghāvo vatsaṃ na mātaraḥ | indraṃ somasya pītaye
translation: As mother kine low to their calves, to Indra have the sages called, Called him to drink the Soma juice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 12
sanskrit: मदच्युत कषेति सादने सिन्धोरूर्मा विपश्चित | सोमो गौरीधि शरितः
transliteration: madacyut kṣeti sādane sindhorūrmā vipaścit | somo ghaurīadhi śritaḥ
translation: In the stream's wave wise Soma dwells, distilling rapture, in his seat, Resting upon a wiId-cow's hide.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 12
sanskrit: दिवो नाभा विचक्षणो.अव्यो वारे महीयते | सोमो यः सुक्रतुः कविः
transliteration: divo nābhā vicakṣaṇo.avyo vāre mahīyate | somo yaḥ sukratuḥ kaviḥ
translation: Far-sighted Soma, Sage and Seer, is worshipped in the central point Of heaven, the straining-cloth of wool.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 12
sanskrit: यः सोमः कलशेष्वा अन्तः पवित्र आहितः | तमिन्दुः परि षस्वजे
transliteration: yaḥ somaḥ kalaśeṣvā antaḥ pavitra āhitaḥ | taminduḥ pari ṣasvaje
translation: In close embraces Indu holds Soma when poured within the jars. And on the. purifying sieve.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 12
sanskrit: पर वाचमिन्दुरिष्यति समुद्रस्याधि विष्टपि | जिन्वन कोशं मधुश्चुतम
transliteration: pra vācaminduriṣyati samudrasyādhi viṣṭapi | jinvan kośaṃ madhuścutam
translation: Indu sends forth a voice on high to regions of the sea of air, Shaking the vase that drops with meath.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 12
sanskrit: नित्यस्तोत्रो वनस्पतिर्धीनामन्तः सबर्दुघः | हिन्वानोमानुषा युगा
transliteration: nityastotro vanaspatirdhīnāmantaḥ sabardughaḥ | hinvānomānuṣā yughā
translation: The Tree whose praises never fail yields heavenly milk among our hymns, Urging men's generations on.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 12
sanskrit: अभि परिया दिवस पदा सोमो हिन्वानो अर्षति | विप्रस्य धारया कविः
transliteration: abhi priyā divas padā somo hinvāno arṣati | viprasya dhārayā kaviḥ
translation: The Wise One, with the Sage's stream, the Soma urged to speed, flows on To the dear places of the sky.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 13
sanskrit: सोमः पुनानो अर्षति सहस्रधारो अत्यविः | वायोरिन्द्रस्यनिष्क्र्तम
transliteration: somaḥ punāno arṣati sahasradhāro atyaviḥ | vāyorindrasyaniṣkṛtam
translation: PASSED through, the fleece in thousand streams the Soma, purified, flows on To Indra's, Viyu's special place.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 13
sanskrit: पवमानमवस्यवो विप्रमभि पर गायत | सुष्वाणं देववीतये
transliteration: pavamānamavasyavo vipramabhi pra ghāyata | suṣvāṇaṃ devavītaye
translation: Sing forth, ye men who long for help, to Pavamana, to the Sage, Effused to entertain the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 13
sanskrit: पवन्ते वाजसातये सोमाः सहस्रपाजसः | गर्णाना देववीतये
transliteration: pavante vājasātaye somāḥ sahasrapājasaḥ | ghṛṇānā devavītaye
translation: The Soma-drops with thousand powers are purified for victory, Hymned to become the feast of Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 13
sanskrit: उत नो वाजसातये पवस्व बर्हतीरिषः | दयुमदिन्दो सुवीर्यम
transliteration: uta no vājasātaye pavasva bṛhatīriṣaḥ | dyumadindo suvīryam
translation: Yea, as thou flowest bring great store of food that we may win the spoil Indu, bring splendid manly might.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 13
sanskrit: ते नः सहस्रिणं रयिं पवन्तामा सुवीर्यम | सुवाना देवास इन्दवः
transliteration: te naḥ sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ pavantāmā suvīryam | suvānā devāsa indavaḥ
translation: May they in flowing give us wealth in thousands, and heroic power,- These Godlike Soma-drops effused.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 13
sanskrit: अत्या हियाना न हेत्र्भिरस्र्ग्रं वाजसातये | वि वारमव्यमाशवः
transliteration: atyā hiyānā na hetṛbhirasṛghraṃ vājasātaye | vi vāramavyamāśavaḥ
translation: Like coursers by their drivers urged, they were poured forth, for victory, Swift through the woollen straining-cloth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 13
sanskrit: वाश्रा अर्षन्तीन्दवो.अभि वत्सं न धेनवः | दधन्विरेगभस्त्योः
transliteration: vāśrā arṣantīndavo.abhi vatsaṃ na dhenavaḥ | dadhanvireghabhastyoḥ
translation: Noisily flow the Soma-drops, like milch-kine lowing to their calves: They have run forth from both the hands.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 13
sanskrit: जुष्ट इन्द्राय मत्सरः पवमान कनिक्रदत | विश्वा अप दविषो जहि
transliteration: juṣṭa indrāya matsaraḥ pavamāna kanikradat | viśvā apa dviṣo jahi
translation: As Gladdener whom Indra loves, O Pavamana, with a roar Drive all our enemies away.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 13
sanskrit: अपघ्नन्तो अराव्णः पवमानाः सवर्द्र्शः | योनाव रतस्य सीदत
transliteration: apaghnanto arāvṇaḥ pavamānāḥ svardṛśaḥ | yonāv ṛtasya sīdata
translation: O Pavamamas, driving off the godless, looking on the light, Sit in the place of sacrifice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 14
sanskrit: परि परासिष्यदत कविः सिन्धोरूर्मावधि शरितः | कारं बिभ्रत पुरुस्प्र्हम
transliteration: pari prāsiṣyadat kaviḥ sindhorūrmāvadhi śritaḥ | kāraṃ bibhrat puruspṛham
translation: REPOSING on the river's wave the Sage hath widely flowed around, Bearing the hymn which many love.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 14
sanskrit: गिरा यदी सबन्धवः पञ्च वराता अपस्यवः | परिष्क्र्ण्वन्ति धर्णसिम
transliteration: ghirā yadī sabandhavaḥ pañca vrātā apasyavaḥ | pariṣkṛṇvanti dharṇasim
translation: When the Five kindred Companies, active in duty, with the song Establish him, the Powerful,

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 15
sanskrit: एष धिया यात्यण्व्य शूरो रथेभिराशुभिः | गछन्निन्द्रस्य निष्क्र्तम
transliteration: eṣa dhiyā yātyaṇvya śūro rathebhirāśubhiḥ | ghachannindrasya niṣkṛtam
translation: THROUGH the fine fingers, with the song, this Hero comes with rapid ears, Going to Indra's special place.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 15
sanskrit: एष पुरू धियायते बर्हते देवतातये | यत्राम्र्तास आसते
transliteration: eṣa purū dhiyāyate bṛhate devatātaye | yatrāmṛtāsa āsate
translation: In holy thought he ponders much for the great worship of the Gods. Where the Immortals have their seat.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 15
sanskrit: एष हितो वि नीयते.अन्तः शुभ्रावता पथा | यदी तुञ्जन्ति भूर्णयः
transliteration: eṣa hito vi nīyate.antaḥ śubhrāvatā pathā | yadī tuñjanti bhūrṇayaḥ
translation: Like a good horse is he led out, when on the path that shines with light The mettled steeds exert their strength.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 15
sanskrit: एष शर्ङगाणि दोधुवच्छिशीते यूथ्यो वर्षा | नर्म्णा दधान ओजसा
transliteration: eṣa śṛṅghāṇi dodhuvacchiśīte yūthyo vṛṣā | nṛmṇā dadhāna ojasā
translation: He brandishes his horns on high, and whets them Bull who leads the herd, Doing with might heroic deeds.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 15
sanskrit: एष रुक्मिभिरीयते वाजि शुभ्रेभिरंशुभिः | पतिः सिन्धूनां भवन
transliteration: eṣa rukmibhirīyate vāji śubhrebhiraṃśubhiḥ | patiḥ sindhūnāṃ bhavan
translation: He moves, a vigorous Steed, adorned with beauteous rays of shining gold, Becoming Sovran of the streams.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 15
sanskrit: एष वसूनि पिब्दना परुषा ययिवानति | अव शादेषु गछति
transliteration: eṣa vasūni pibdanā paruṣā yayivānati | ava śādeṣu ghachati
translation: He, over places rough to pass, bringing rich treasures closely packed. Descends into the reservoirs.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 15
sanskrit: एतं मर्जन्ति मर्ज्यमुप दरोणेष्वायवः | परचक्राणं महीरिषः
transliteration: etaṃ mṛjanti marjyamupa droṇeṣvāyavaḥ | pracakrāṇaṃ mahīriṣaḥ
translation: Men beautify him in the vats, him worthy to be beautified, Him who brings forth abundant food.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 15
sanskrit: एतमु तयं दश कषिपो मर्जन्ति सप्त धीतयः | सवायुधं मदिन्तमम
transliteration: etamu tyaṃ daśa kṣipo mṛjanti sapta dhītayaḥ | svāyudhaṃ madintamam
translation: Him, even him, the fingers ten and the seven songs make beautiful, Well-weaponed, best of gladdeners.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 16
sanskrit: पर ते सोतार ओण्यो रसं मदाय घर्ष्वय | सर्गो न तक्त्येतशः
transliteration: pra te sotāra oṇyo rasaṃ madāya ghṛṣvaya | sargho na taktyetaśaḥ
translation: THE pressers from the Soma-press send forth thy juice for rapturous joy The speckled sap runs like a flood.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 16
sanskrit: करत्वा दक्षस्य रथ्यमपो वसानमन्धसा | गोषामण्वेषु सश्चिम
transliteration: kratvā dakṣasya rathyamapo vasānamandhasā | ghoṣāmaṇveṣu saścima
translation: With strength we follow through the sieve him who brings might and wins the kine, Enrobed in water with his juice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 16
sanskrit: अनप्तमप्सु दुष्टरं सोमं पवित्र आ सर्ज | पुनीहीन्द्राय पातवे
transliteration: anaptamapsu duṣṭaraṃ somaṃ pavitra ā sṛja | punīhīndrāya pātave
translation: Pour on the sieve the Soma, ne'er subdued in waters, waterless, And make it pure for Indra's drink.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 16
sanskrit: पर पुनानस्य चेतसा सोमः पवित्रे अर्षति | करत्वा सधस्थमासदत
transliteration: pra punānasya cetasā somaḥ pavitre arṣati | kratvā sadhasthamāsadat
translation: Moved by the purifier's thought, the Soma flows into the sieve: By wisdom it hath gained its home.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 16
sanskrit: पर तवा नमोभिरिन्दव इन्द्र सोमा अस्र्क्षत | महे भरायकारिणः
transliteration: pra tvā namobhirindava indra somā asṛkṣata | mahe bharāyakāriṇaḥ
translation: With humble homage, Indra, have the Soma-drops flowed forth to thee, Contending for the glorious prize.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 16
sanskrit: पुनानो रूपे अव्यये विश्वा अर्षन्नभि शरियः | शूरो न गोषु तिष्ठति
transliteration: punāno rūpe avyaye viśvā arṣannabhi śriyaḥ |
translation: Purified in his fleecy garb, attaining every beauty, he Stands, hero-like, amid the kine.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 17
sanskrit: पर निम्नेनेव सिन्धवो घनन्तो वर्त्राणि भूर्णयः | सोमा अस्र्ग्रमाशवः
transliteration: pra nimneneva sindhavo ghnanto vṛtrāṇi bhūrṇayaḥ | somā asṛghramāśavaḥ
translation: LIKE rivers down a steep descent, slaying the Vrtras, full of zeal, The rapid Soma-streams have flowed.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 17
sanskrit: अभि सुवानास इन्दवो वर्ष्टयः पर्थिवीमिव | इन्द्रं सोमासो अक्षरन
transliteration: abhi suvānāsa indavo vṛṣṭayaḥ pṛthivīmiva | indraṃ somāso akṣaran
translation: The drops of Soma juice effused fall like the rain upon the earth: To Indra flow the Soma-streams.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 17
sanskrit: अत्यूर्मिर्मत्सरो मदः सोमः पवित्रे अर्षति | विघ्नन रक्षांसि देवयुः
transliteration: atyūrmirmatsaro madaḥ somaḥ pavitre arṣati | vighnan rakṣāṃsi devayuḥ
translation: With swelling wave the gladdening drink, the Soma, flows into the sieve, Loving the Gods and slaying fiends.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 18
sanskrit: परि सुवानो गिरिष्ठाः पवित्रे सोमो अक्षाः | मदेषु सर्वधा असि
transliteration: pari suvāno ghiriṣṭhāḥ pavitre somo akṣāḥ | madeṣu sarigvedaadhā asi
translation: THOU, Soma, dweller on the hills, effused, hast flowed into the sieve,: All-bounteous art thou in carouse.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 18
sanskrit: तवं विप्रस्त्वं कविर्मधु पर जातमन्धसः | मदेषु...
transliteration: tvaṃ viprastvaṃ kavirmadhu pra jātamandhasaḥ | madeṣu...
translation: Thou art a sacred Bard, a Sage; the meath is offspring of thy sap: All-bounteous art thou in carouse.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 18
sanskrit: तव विश्वे सजोषसो देवासः पीतिमाशत | मदेषु ...
transliteration: tava viśve sajoṣaso devāsaḥ pītimāśata | madeṣu ...
translation: All Deities of one accord have come that they may drink of thee: All-bounteous art thou in carouse.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 19
sanskrit: यत सोम चित्रमुक्थ्यं दिव्यं पार्थिवं वसु | तन नः पुनान आ भर
transliteration: yat soma citramukthyaṃ divyaṃ pārthivaṃ vasu | tan naḥ punāna ā bhara
translation: O SOMA, being purified bring us the wondrous treasure, meet For lauds, that is in earth and heaven.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 19
sanskrit: युवं हि सथः सवर्पती इन्द्रश्च सोम गोपती | ईशानापिप्यतं धियः
transliteration: yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ svarpatī indraśca soma ghopatī |
translation: For ye Twain, Indra, Soma, are Lords of the light, Lords of the kine: Great Rulers, prosper ye our songs.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 20
sanskrit: पर कविर्देववीतये.अव्यो वारेभिरर्षति | साह्वान विश्वाभि सप्र्धः
transliteration: pra kavirdevavītaye.avyo vārebhirarṣati | sāhvān viśvāabhi spṛdhaḥ
translation: FORTH through the straining-cloth the Sage flows to the banquet of the Gods, Subduing all our enemies.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 20
sanskrit: स हि षमा जरित्र्भ्य आ वाजं गोमन्तमिन्वति | पवमानः सहस्रिणम
transliteration: sa hi ṣmā jaritṛbhya ā vājaṃ ghomantaminvati | pavamānaḥ sahasriṇam
translation: For he, as Pavamana, sends thousand fold treasure in the shape Of cattle to the singing-men.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 20
sanskrit: परि विश्वानि चेतसा मर्शसे पवसे मती | स नः सोम शरवो विदः
transliteration: pari viśvāni cetasā mṛśase pavase matī | sa naḥ soma śravo vidaḥ
translation: Thou graspest all things with thy mind, and purifiest thee with thoughts As such, O Soma, find us fame.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 20
sanskrit: अभ्यर्ष बर्हद यशो मघवद्भ्यो धरुवं रयिम | इषं सतोत्र्भ्य आ भर
transliteration: abhyarṣa bṛhad yaśo maghavadbhyo dhruvaṃ rayim | iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara
translation: Pour lofty glory on us, send sure riches to our liberal lords, Bring food to those who sing thy praise.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 20
sanskrit: तवं राजेव सुव्रतो गिरः सोमा विवेशिथ | पुनानो वह्ने अद्भुत
transliteration: tvaṃ rājeva suvrato ghiraḥ somā viveśitha | punāno vahne adbhuta
translation: As thou art cleansed, O Wondrous Steed, O Soma, thou hast entered, like A pious King, into the songs.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 20
sanskrit: स वह्निरप्सु दुष्टरो मर्ज्यमानो गभस्त्योः | सोमश्चमूषु सीदति
transliteration: sa vahnirapsu duṣṭaro mṛjyamāno ghabhastyoḥ | somaścamūṣu sīdati
translation: He, Soma, like a courser in the floods invincible, made clean With hands, is resting in the jars.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 20
sanskrit: करीळुर्मखो न मंहयुः पवित्रं सोम गछसि | दधत सतोत्रे सुवीर्यम
transliteration: krīḷurmakho na maṃhayuḥ pavitraṃ soma ghachasi | dadhat stotre suvīryam
translation: Disporting, like a liberal chief, thou goest, Soma, to the sieve, Lending the laud a Hero's strength.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 21
sanskrit: एते धावन्तीन्दवः सोमा इन्द्राय घर्ष्वयः | मत्सरासःस्वर्विदः
transliteration: ete dhāvantīndavaḥ somā indrāya ghṛṣvayaḥ | matsarāsaḥsvarigvedadaḥ
translation: To Indra flow these running drops, these Somas frolicsome in mood. Exhilarating, finding light;

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 21
sanskrit: परव्र्ण्वन्तो अभियुजः सुष्वये वरिवोविदः | सवयं सतोत्रे वयस्क्र्तः
transliteration: pravṛṇvanto abhiyujaḥ suṣvaye varivovidaḥ | svayaṃ stotre vayaskṛtaḥ
translation: Driving off foes, bestowing room upon the presser, willingly Bringing their praiser vital force.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 21
sanskrit: वर्था करीळन्त इन्दवः सधस्थमभ्येकमित | सिन्धोरूर्मा वयक्षरन
transliteration: vṛthā krīḷanta indavaḥ sadhasthamabhyekamit | sindhorūrmā vyakṣaran
translation: Lightly disporting them, the drops flow to one common reservoir, And fall into the river's wave.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 21
sanskrit: एते विश्वानि वार्या पवमानास आशत | हिता न सप्तयो रथे
transliteration: ete viśvāni vāryā pavamānāsa āśata | hitā na saptayo rathe
translation: These Pavamanas have obtained all blessings much to be desired, Like coursers harnessed to a car.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 22
sanskrit: एते सोमास आशवो रथा इव पर वाजिनः | सर्गाः सर्ष्टा अहेषत
transliteration: ete somāsa āśavo rathā iva pra vājinaḥ | sarghāḥ sṛṣṭā aheṣata
translation: THESE rapid Soma-streams have stirred themselves to motion like strong steeds, Like cars, like armies hurried forth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 22
sanskrit: एते वाता इवोरवः पर्जन्यस्येव वर्ष्टयः | अग्नेरिव भरमा वर्था
transliteration: ete vātā ivoravaḥ parjanyasyeva vṛṣṭayaḥ | aghneriva bhramā vṛthā
translation: Swift as wide winds they lightly move, like rain-storms of Parjanya, like The flickering flames of burning fire.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 22
sanskrit: एते पूता विपश्चितः सोमासो दध्याशिरः | विपा वयानशुर्धियः
transliteration: ete pūtā vipaścitaḥ somāso dadhyāśiraḥ | vipā vyānaśurdhiyaḥ
translation: These Soma juices, blent with curds, purified, skilled in sacred hymns, Have gained by song their hearts' desire.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 22
sanskrit: एते मर्ष्टा अमर्त्याः सस्र्वांसो न शश्रमुः | इयक्षन्तः पथो रजः
transliteration: ete mṛṣṭā amartyāḥ sasṛvāṃso na śaśramuḥ | iyakṣantaḥ patho rajaḥ
translation: Immortal, cleansed, these drops, since first they flowed, have never wearied, fain To reach the regions and their paths.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 22
sanskrit: एते पर्ष्ठानि रोदसोर्विप्रयन्तो वयानशुः | उतेदमुत्तमं रजः
transliteration: ete pṛṣṭhāni rodasorigvedaprayanto vyānaśuḥ | utedamuttamaṃ rajaḥ
translation: Advancing they have travelled o'er the ridges of the earth and heaven, And this the highest realm of all.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 22
sanskrit: तन्तुं तन्वानमुत्तममनु परवत आशत | उतेदमुत्तमाय्यम
transliteration: tantuṃ tanvānamuttamamanu pravata āśata | utedamuttamāyyam
translation: Over the heights have they attained the highest thread that is spun out, And this which must be deemed most high.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 22
sanskrit: तवं सोम पणिभ्य आ वसु गव्यानि धारयः | ततं तन्तुमचिक्रदः
transliteration: tvaṃ soma paṇibhya ā vasu ghavyāni dhārayaḥ | tataṃ tantumacikradaḥ
translation: Thou, Soma, boldest wealth in kine which thou hast seized from niggard churls: Thou calledst forth the out spun thread.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 23
sanskrit: सोमा अस्र्ग्रमाशवो मधोर्मदस्य धारया | अभि विश्वानिकाव्या
transliteration: somā asṛghramāśavo madhormadasya dhārayā | abhi viśvānikāvyā
translation: SWIFT Soma drops have been effused in streams of meath, the gladdening drink, For sacred lore of every kind.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 23
sanskrit: अनु परत्नास आयवः पदं नवीयो अक्रमुः | रुचे जनन्त सूर्यम
transliteration: anu pratnāsa āyavaḥ padaṃ navīyo akramuḥ | ruce jananta sūryam
translation: Hither to newer. resting-place the ancient Living Ones are come. They made the Sun that he might shine.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 24
sanskrit: पर सोमासो अधन्विषुः पवमानास इन्दवः | शरीणाना अप्सु मर्ञ्जत
transliteration: pra somāso adhanviṣuḥ pavamānāsa indavaḥ |
translation: HITHERWARD have the Soma streamed, the drops while they are purified: When blent, in waters they are rinsed.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 25
sanskrit: पवस्व दक्षसाधनो देवेभ्यः पीतये हरे | मरुद्भ्यो वायवे मदः
transliteration: pavasva dakṣasādhano devebhyaḥ pītaye hare | marudbhyo vāyave madaḥ
translation: GREEN-HUED! as one who giveth strength flow on for Gods to drink, a draught For Vayu and the Marut host.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 25
sanskrit: पवमान धिया हितो.अभि योनिं कनिक्रदत | धर्मणा वायुमा विश
transliteration: pavamāna dhiyā hito.abhi yoniṃ kanikradat | dharmaṇā vāyumā viśa
translation: O Pavamana, sent by song, roaring about thy dwelling-place, Pass into Vayu as Law bids.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 25
sanskrit: सं देवैः शोभते वर्षा कविर्योनावधि परियः | वर्त्रहा देववीतमः
transliteration: saṃ devaiḥ śobhate vṛṣā kaviryonāvadhi priyaḥ | vṛtrahā devavītamaḥ
translation: The Steer shines with the Deities, dear Sage in his appointed home, Foe-Slayer, most beloved by Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 25
sanskrit: विश्वा रूपाण्याविशन पुनानो याति हर्यतः | यत्राम्र्तास आसते
transliteration: viśvā rūpāṇyāviśan punāno yāti haryataḥ | yatrāmṛtāsa āsate
translation: Taking each beauteous form, he goes, desirable, while purified, Thither where the Immortals sit.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 25
sanskrit: अरुषो जनयन गिरः सोमः पवत आयुषक | इन्द्रं गछन कविक्रतुः
transliteration: aruṣo janayan ghiraḥ somaḥ pavata āyuṣak | indraṃ ghachan kavikratuḥ
translation: To Indra Soma flows, the Red, engendering song, exceeding wise, The visitor of living men.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 26
sanskrit: तमम्र्क्षन्त वाजिनमुपस्थे अदितेरधि | विप्रासो अण्व्याधिया
transliteration: tamamṛkṣanta vājinamupasthe aditeradhi | viprāso aṇvyādhiyā
translation: THE sages with the fingers' art have dressed and decked that vigorous Steed Upon the lap of Aditi,

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 26
sanskrit: तं गावो अभ्यनूषत सहस्रधारमक्षितम | इन्दुं धर्तारमा दिवः
transliteration: taṃ ghāvo abhyanūṣata sahasradhāramakṣitam | induṃ dhartāramā divaḥ
translation: The kine have called aloud to him exhaustless with a thousand streams, To Indu who supporteth heaven.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 26
sanskrit: तं वेधां मेधयाह्यन पवमानमधि दयवि | धर्णसिं भूरिधायसम
transliteration: taṃ vedhāṃ medhayāhyan pavamānamadhi dyavi | dharṇasiṃ bhūridhāyasam
translation: Him, nourisher of many, Sage, creative Pavamana, they Have sent, by wisdom, to the sky.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 26
sanskrit: तमह्यन भुरिजोर्धिया संवसानं विवस्वतः | पतिं वाचो अदाभ्यम
transliteration: tamahyan bhurijordhiyā saṃvasānaṃ vivasvataḥ | patiṃ vāco adābhyam
translation: Him, dweller with Vivasvan, they with use of both arms have sent forth, The Lord of Speech infallible.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 26
sanskrit: तं सानावधि जामयो हरिं हिन्वन्त्यद्रिभिः | हर्यतम्भूरिचक्षसम
transliteration: taṃ sānāvadhi jāmayo hariṃ hinvantyadribhiḥ | haryatambhūricakṣasam
translation: Him, green, beloved, many eyed, the Sisters with prosing stones Send down to ridges of the sieve.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 26
sanskrit: तं तवा हिन्वन्ति वेधसः पवमान गिराव्र्धम | इन्दविन्द्राय मत्सरम
transliteration: taṃ tvā hinvanti vedhasaḥ pavamāna ghirāvṛdham | indavindrāya matsaram
translation: O Pavamana, Indu, priests hurry thee on to Indra, thee Who aidest song and cheerest him.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 27
sanskrit: एष कविरभिष्टुतः पवित्रे अधि तोशते | पुनानो घनन्नप सरिधः
transliteration: eṣa kavirabhiṣṭutaḥ pavitre adhi tośate | punāno ghnannapa sridhaḥ
translation: THIS Sage, exalted by our lauds, flows to the purifying cloth, Scattering foes as he is cleansed.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 27
sanskrit: एष इन्द्राय वायवे सवर्जित परि षिच्यते | पवित्रे दक्षसाधनः
transliteration: eṣa indrāya vāyave svarjit pari ṣicyate | pavitre dakṣasādhanaḥ
translation: As giving power and winning light, for Indra and for Vayu he Is poured upon the filtering-cloth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 27
sanskrit: एष नर्भिर्वि नीयते दिवो मूर्धा वर्षा सुतः | सोमो वनेषु विश्ववित
transliteration: eṣa nṛbhirigveda nīyate divo mūrdhā vṛṣā sutaḥ | somo vaneṣu viśvavit
translation: The men conduct him, Soma, Steer, Omniscient, and the Head of Heaven, Effused into the vats of wood.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 27
sanskrit: एष गव्युरचिक्रदत पवमानो हिरण्ययुः | इन्दुः सत्राजिदस्त्र्तः
transliteration: eṣa ghavyuracikradat pavamāno hiraṇyayuḥ | induḥ satrājidastṛtaḥ
translation: Longing for kine, longing for gold hath Indu Pavamana lowed, Still Conqueror, never overcome.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 27
sanskrit: एष सूर्येण हासते पवमानो अधि दयवि | पवित्रे मत्सरो मदः
transliteration: eṣa sūryeṇa hāsate pavamāno adhi dyavi | pavitre matsaro madaḥ
translation: This Pavamana, gladdening draught, drops on the filtering cloth, and then Mounts up with Surya to the sky.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 27
sanskrit: एष शुष्म्यसिष्यददन्तरिक्षे वर्षा हरिः | पुनान इन्दुरिन्द्रमा
transliteration: eṣa śuṣmyasiṣyadadantarikṣe vṛṣā hariḥ | punāna indurindramā
translation: To Indra in the firmament this mighty tawny Steer hath flowed, This Indu, being purified.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 28
sanskrit: एष वाजी हितो नर्भिर्विश्वविन मनसस पतिः | अव्यो वारं वि धावति
transliteration: eṣa vājī hito nṛbhirigvedaśvavin manasas patiḥ | avyo vāraṃ vi dhāvati
translation: URGED by the men, this vigorous Steed, Lord of the mind, Omniscient, Runs to the woolen straining-cloth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 28
sanskrit: एष पवित्रे अक्षरत सोमो देवेभ्यः सुतः | विश्वा धामान्याविशन
transliteration: eṣa pavitre akṣarat somo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ | viśvā dhāmānyāviśan
translation: Within the filter hath he flowed, this Soma for the Gods effused, Entering all their essences.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 28
sanskrit: एष देवः शुभायते.अधि योनावमर्त्यः | वर्त्रहा देववीतमः
transliteration: eṣa devaḥ śubhāyate.adhi yonāvamartyaḥ | vṛtrahā devavītamaḥ
translation: He shines in beauty there, this God Immortal in his dwelling-place, Foe-slayer, dearest to the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 28
sanskrit: एष वर्षा कनिक्रदद दशभिर्जामिभिर्यतः | अभि दरोणानि धावति
transliteration: eṣa vṛṣā kanikradad daśabhirjāmibhiryataḥ | abhi droṇāni dhāvati
translation: Directed by the Sisters ten, bellowing on his way this Steer Runs onward to the wooden vats.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 28
sanskrit: एष सूर्यमरोचयत पवमानो विचर्षणिः | विश्वा धामानि विश्ववित
transliteration: eṣa sūryamarocayat pavamāno vicarṣaṇiḥ | viśvā dhāmāni viśvavit
translation: This Pavamana, swift and strong, Omniscient, gave splendour to The Sun and all his forms of light.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 28
sanskrit: एष शुष्म्यदाभ्यः सोमः पुनानो अर्षति | देवावीरघशंसहा
transliteration: eṣa śuṣmyadābhyaḥ somaḥ punāno arṣati | devāvīraghaśaṃsahā
translation: This Soma being purified, flows mighty and infallible, Slayer of sinners, dear to Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 29
sanskrit: परास्य धारा अक्षरन वर्ष्णः सुतस्यौजसा | देवाननु परभूषतः
transliteration: prāsya dhārā akṣaran vṛṣṇaḥ sutasyaujasā | devānanu prabhūṣataḥ
translation: FORWARD with mighty force have flowed the currents of this Steer effused, Of him who sets him by the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 29
sanskrit: सप्तिं मर्जन्ति वेधसो गर्णन्तः कारवो गिरा | जयोतिर्जज्ञानमुक्थ्यम
transliteration: saptiṃ mṛjanti vedhaso ghṛṇantaḥ kāravo ghirā | jyotirjajñānamukthyam
translation: The singers praise him with their song, and learned priests adorn the Steed, Brought forth as light that merits laud.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 29
sanskrit: सुषहा सोम तानि ते पुनानाय परभूवसो | वर्धा समुद्रमुक्थ्यम
transliteration: suṣahā soma tāni te punānāya prabhūvaso | vardhā samudramukthyam
translation: These things thou winnest lightly while purified, Soma, Lord of wealth: Fill full the sea that claims our praise.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 29
sanskrit: विश्वा वसूनि संजयन पवस्व सोम धारया | इनु दवेषांसि सध्र्यक
transliteration: viśvā vasūni saṃjayan pavasva soma dhārayā | inu dveṣāṃsi sadhryak
translation: Winning all precious things at once, flow on, O Soma, with thy stream Drive to one place our enemies.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 29
sanskrit: रक्षा सु नो अररुषः सवनात समस्य कस्य चित | निदो यत्रमुमुच्महे
transliteration: rakṣā su no araruṣaḥ svanāt samasya kasya cit | nido yatramumucmahe
translation: Preserve us from the godless, from ill-omened voice of one and all, That so we may be freed from blame.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 29
sanskrit: एन्दो पार्थिवं रयिं दिव्यं पवस्व धारया | दयुमन्तं शुष्ममा भर
transliteration: endo pārthivaṃ rayiṃ divyaṃ pavasva dhārayā | dyumantaṃ śuṣmamā bhara
translation: O Indu, as thou flowest on bring us the wealth of earth and heaven, And splendid vigour, in thy stream.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 30
sanskrit: पर धारा अस्य शुष्मिणो वर्था पवित्रे अक्षरन | पुनानो वाचमिष्यति
transliteration: pra dhārā asya śuṣmiṇo vṛthā pavitre akṣaran | punāno vācamiṣyati
translation: STREAMS of this Potent One have flowed easily to the straining-cloth: While he is cleansed he lifts his voice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 30
sanskrit: इन्दुर्हियानः सोत्र्भिर्म्र्ज्यमानः कनिक्रदत | इयर्ति वग्नुमिन्द्रियम
transliteration: indurhiyānaḥ sotṛbhirmṛjyamānaḥ kanikradat | iyarti vaghnumindriyam
translation: Indu, by pressers urged to speed, bellowing out while beautified. Sends forth a very mighty sound.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 31
sanskrit: पर सोमासः सवाध्यः पवमानासो अक्रमुः | रयिं कर्ण्वन्तिचेतनम
transliteration: pra somāsaḥ svādhyaḥ pavamānāso akramuḥ | rayiṃ kṛṇvanticetanam
translation: THE, Soma-drops, benevolent, come forth as they are purified, Bestowing wealth which all may see.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 31
sanskrit: दिवस पर्थिव्या अधि भवेन्दो दयुम्नवर्धनः | भवा वाजानां पतिः
transliteration: divas pṛthivyā adhi bhavendo dyumnavardhanaḥ | bhavā vājānāṃ patiḥ
translation: O Indu, high o'er heaven and earth be thou, increaser of our might: The Master of all strength be thou.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 31
sanskrit: तुभ्यं वाता अभिप्रियस्तुभ्यमर्षन्ति सिन्धवः | सोम वर्धन्ति ते महः
transliteration: tubhyaṃ vātā abhipriyastubhyamarṣanti sindhavaḥ | soma vardhanti te mahaḥ
translation: The winds are gracious in their love to thee, the rivers flow to thee Soma, they multiply thy power.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 32
sanskrit: पर सोमासो मदच्युतः शरवसे नो मघोनः | सुता विदथे अक्रमुः
transliteration: pra somāso madacyutaḥ śravase no maghonaḥ | sutā vidathe akramuḥ
translation: THE rapture-shedding Soma-drops, effused in our assembly, have Flowed forth to glorify our prince.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 33
sanskrit: पर सोमासो विपश्चितो.अपां न यन्त्यूर्मयः | वनानि महिषा इव
transliteration: pra somāso vipaścito.apāṃ na yantyūrmayaḥ | vanāni mahiṣā iva
translation: LIKE waves of waters, skilled in song the juices of the Soma speed Onward, as buffaloes to woods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 33
sanskrit: अभि दरोणानि बभ्रवः शुक्रा रतस्य धारया | वाजं गोमन्तमक्षरन
transliteration: abhi droṇāni babhravaḥ śukrā ṛtasya dhārayā | vājaṃ ghomantamakṣaran
translation: With stream of sacrifice the brown bright drops have flowed with strength in store Of kine into the wooden vats.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 33
sanskrit: सुता इन्द्राय वायवे वरुणाय मरुद्भ्यः | सोमा अर्षन्ति विष्णवे
transliteration: sutā indrāya vāyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ | somā arṣanti viṣṇave
translation: To Indra, Vayu, Varuna, to Visnu, and the Maruts, flow The drops of Soma juice effused.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 33
sanskrit: तिस्रो वाच उदीरते गावो मिमन्ति धेनवः | हरिरेति कनिक्रदत
transliteration: tisro vāca udīrate ghāvo mimanti dhenavaḥ | harireti kanikradat
translation: Three several words are uttered: kine are ]owing, cows who give their milk: The Tawny-hued goes bellowing on.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 33
sanskrit: अभि बरह्मीरनूषत यह्वीरतस्य मातरः | मर्म्र्ज्यन्ते दिवः शिशुम
transliteration: abhi brahmīranūṣata yahvīrtasya mātaraḥ | marmṛjyante divaḥ śiśum
translation: The young and sacred mothers of the holy rite have uttered praise: They decorate the Child of Heaven.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 33
sanskrit: रायः समुद्रांश्चतुरो.अस्मभ्यं सोम विश्वतः | आ पवस्व सहस्रिणः
transliteration: rāyaḥ samudrāṃścaturo.asmabhyaṃ soma viśvataḥ |
translation: From every side, O Soma, for our profit, pour thou forth four seas Filled full of riches thousand fold.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 34
sanskrit: पर सुवानो धारया तनेन्दुर्हिन्वानो अर्षति | रुजद दर्ळ्हा वयोजसा
transliteration: pra suvāno dhārayā tanendurhinvāno arṣati | rujad dṛḷhā vyojasā
translation: THE drop of Soma juice effused flows onward with this stream impelled. Rending strong places with its might.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 34
sanskrit: सुत इन्द्राय वायवे वरुणाय मरुद्भ्यः | सोमो अर्षति विष्णवे
transliteration: suta indrāya vāyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ | somo arṣati viṣṇave
translation: Poured forth to Indra, Varuna, to Vayu and the Marut hosts, To Visnu, flows the Soma juice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 34
sanskrit: वर्षाणं वर्षभिर्यतं सुन्वन्ति सोममद्रिभिः | दुहन्तिशक्मना पयः
transliteration: vṛṣāṇaṃ vṛṣabhiryataṃ sunvanti somamadribhiḥ | duhantiśakmanā payaḥ
translation: With stones they press the Soma forth, the Strong conducted by the strong: They milk the liquor out with skill.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 34
sanskrit: भुवत तरितस्य मर्ज्यो भुवदिन्द्राय मत्सरः | सं रूपैरज्यते हरिः
transliteration: bhuvat tritasya marjyo bhuvadindrāya matsaraḥ | saṃ rūpairajyate hariḥ
translation: 'Tis he whom Trita must refine, 'tis he who shall make Indra glad: The Tawny One is decked with tints.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 34
sanskrit: अभीं रतस्य विष्टपं दुहते पर्श्निमातरः | चारु परियतमं हविः
transliteration: abhīṃ ṛtasya viṣṭapaṃ duhate pṛśnimātaraḥ | cāru priyatamaṃ haviḥ
translation: Him do the Sons of Prsni milk, the dwelling-place of sacrifice, Oblation lovely and most dear.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 34
sanskrit: समेनमह्रुता इमा गिरो अर्षन्ति सस्रुतः | धेनूर्वाश्रोवीवशत
transliteration: samenamahrutā imā ghiro arṣanti sasrutaḥ | dhenūrigvedaāśroavīvaśat
translation: To him in one united stream these songs flow on straight forward. he, Loud voiced, hath made the milch-kine low.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 35
sanskrit: आ नः पवस्व धारया पवमान रयिं पर्थुम | यया जयोतिर्विदासि नः
transliteration: yayā jyotirigvedadāsi naḥ
translation: Pour forth on us abundant wealth, O Pavamana, with thy stream. Wherewith thou mayest find us light

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 35
sanskrit: इन्दो समुद्रमीङखय पवस्व विश्वमेजय | रायो धर्ता न ओजसा
transliteration: indo samudramīṅkhaya pavasva viśvamejaya | rāyo dhartā na ojasā
translation: O Indu, swayer of the sea, shaker of all things, flow thou on, Bearer of wealth to us with might.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 35
sanskrit: तवया वीरेण वीरवो.अभि षयाम पर्तन्यतः | कषरा णो अभि वार्यम
transliteration: tvayā vīreṇa vīravo.abhi ṣyāma pṛtanyataḥ | kṣarā ṇo abhi vāryam
translation: With thee for Hero, Valiant One! may we subdue our enemies: Let what is precious flow to us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 35
sanskrit: पर वाजमिन्दुरिष्यति सिषासन वाजसा रषिः | वरता विदान आयुधा
transliteration: pra vājaminduriṣyati siṣāsan vājasā ṛṣiḥ | vratā vidāna āyudhā
translation: Indu arouses strength the Sage who strives for victory, winning power, Discovering holy works and means.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 35
sanskrit: तं गीर्भिर्वाचमीङखयं पुनानं वासयामसि | सोमं जनस्य गोपतिम
transliteration: taṃ ghīrbhirigvedaācamīṅkhayaṃ punānaṃ vāsayāmasi | somaṃ janasya ghopatim
translation: Mover of speech, we robe him with our songs as he is purified Soma, the Guardian of the folk;

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 35
sanskrit: विश्वो यस्य वरते जनो दाधार धर्मणस पतेः | पुनानस्य परभूवसोः
transliteration: viśvo yasya vrate jano dādhāra dharmaṇas pateḥ | punānasya prabhūvasoḥ
translation: On whose way, Lord of Holy Law, most rich as he is purified. The people all have set their hearts.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 36
sanskrit: असर्जि रथ्यो यथा पवित्रे चम्वोः सुतः | कार्ष्मन वाजीन्यक्रमीत
transliteration: asarji rathyo yathā pavitre camvoḥ sutaḥ | kārṣman vājīnyakramīt
translation: FORTH from the mortar is the juice sent, like a car-horse, to the sieve: The Steed steps forward to the goal.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 36
sanskrit: स वह्निः सोम जाग्र्विः पवस्व देववीरति | अभि कोशं मधुश्चुतम
transliteration: sa vahniḥ soma jāghṛviḥ pavasva devavīrati | abhi kośaṃ madhuścutam
translation: Thus, Soma, watchful, bearing well, cheering the Gods, flow past the sieve, Turned to the vat that drops with meath.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 36
sanskrit: स नो जयोतींषि पूर्व्य पवमान वि रोचय | करत्वे दक्षायनो हिनु
transliteration: sa no jyotīṃṣi pūrigvedaya pavamāna vi rocaya | kratve dakṣāyano hinu
translation: Excellent Pavamana, make the lights shine brightly out for us. Speed us to mental power and skill.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 37
sanskrit: स सुतः पीतये वर्षा सोमः पवित्रे अर्षति | विघ्नन रक्षांसि देवयुः
transliteration: sa sutaḥ pītaye vṛṣā somaḥ pavitre arṣati | vighnan rakṣāṃsi devayuḥ
translation: SOMA, the Steer, effused for draught, flows to the purifying sieve, Slaying the fiends, loving the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 37
sanskrit: स पवित्रे विचक्षणो हरिरर्षति धर्णसिः | अभि योनिंकनिक्रदत
transliteration: sa pavitre vicakṣaṇo harirarṣati dharṇasiḥ | abhi yoniṃkanikradat
translation: Far-sighted, tawny-coloured, he flows to the sieve, intelligent, Bellowing, to his place of rest.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 37
sanskrit: स वाजी रोचना दिवः पवमानो वि धावति | रक्षोहा वारमव्ययम
transliteration: sa vājī rocanā divaḥ pavamāno vi dhāvati | rakṣohā vāramavyayam
translation: This vigorous Pavamana runs forth to the luminous realm of heaven, Fiend-slayer, through the fleecy sieve.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 37
sanskrit: स तरितस्याधि सानवि पवमानो अरोचयत | जामिभिः सूर्यं सह
transliteration: sa tritasyādhi sānavi pavamāno arocayat | jāmibhiḥ sūryaṃ saha
translation: This Payamana up above Trita's high ridge hath made the Sun, Together with the Sisters, shine.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 37
sanskrit: स वर्त्रहा वर्षा सुतो वरिवोविददाभ्यः | सोमो वाजमिवासरत
transliteration: sa vṛtrahā vṛṣā suto varivovidadābhyaḥ | somo vājamivāsarat
translation: This Vrtra-slaying Steer, effused, Soma room-giver, ne'er deceived, Hath gone, as 'twere, to win the spoil.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 37
sanskrit: स देवः कविनेषितो.अभि दरोणानि धावति | इन्दुरिन्द्रायमंहना
transliteration: sa devaḥ kavineṣito.abhi droṇāni dhāvati | indurindrāyamaṃhanā
translation: Urged onward by the sage, the God speeds forward to the casks of wood, Indu to Indra willingly.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 38
sanskrit: एष उ सय वर्षा रथो.अव्यो वारेभिरर्षति | गछन वाजं सहस्रिणम
transliteration: eṣa u sya vṛṣā ratho.avyo vārebhirarṣati | ghachan vājaṃ sahasriṇam
translation: THIS Steer, this Chariot, rushes through the woolen filter, as he goes To war that wins a thousand spoils.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 38
sanskrit: एतं तरितस्य योषणो हरिं हिन्वन्त्यद्रिभिः | इन्दुमिन्द्राय पीतये
transliteration: etaṃ tritasya yoṣaṇo hariṃ hinvantyadribhiḥ | indumindrāya pītaye
translation: The Dames of Trita with the stones onward impel this Tawny One Indu to Indra for his drink.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 38
sanskrit: एतं तयं हरितो दश मर्म्र्ज्यन्ते अपस्युवः | याभिर्मदाय शुम्भते
transliteration: etaṃ tyaṃ harito daśa marmṛjyante apasyuvaḥ | yābhirmadāya śumbhate
translation: Ten active fingers carefully adorn him here; they make him bright And beauteous for the gladdening draught.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 38
sanskrit: एष सय मानुषीष्वा शयेनो न विक्षु सीदति | गछञ जारो न योषितम
transliteration: eṣa sya mānuṣīṣvā śyeno na vikṣu sīdati | ghachañ jāro na yoṣitam
translation: He like a falcon settles down amid the families of men. Speeding like lover to his love.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 38
sanskrit: एष सय मद्यो रसो.अव चष्टे दिवः शिशुः | य इन्दुर्वारमाविशत
transliteration: eṣa sya madyo raso.ava caṣṭe divaḥ śiśuḥ | ya indurigvedaāramāviśat
translation: This young exhilarating juice looks downward from its place in heaven, This Soma-drop that pierced the sieve.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 38
sanskrit: एष सय पीतये सुतो हरिरर्षति धर्णसिः | करन्दन योनिमभि परियम
transliteration: eṣa sya pītaye suto harirarṣati dharṇasiḥ | krandan yonimabhi priyam
translation: Poured for the draught, this tawny juice flows forth, intelligent, crying out, Unto the well-beloved place.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 39
sanskrit: आशुरर्ष बर्हन्मते परि परियेण धाम्ना | यत्र देवा इतिब्रवन
transliteration: yatra devā itibravan
translation: FLOW On, O thou of lofty thought, flow swift in thy beloved form, Saying, I go where dwell the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 39
sanskrit: परिष्क्र्ण्वन्ननिष्क्र्तं जनाय यातयन्निषः | वर्ष्टिन्दिवः परि सरव
transliteration: pariṣkṛṇvannaniṣkṛtaṃ janāya yātayanniṣaḥ | vṛṣṭindivaḥ pari srava
translation: Preparing what is unprepared, and bringing store of food to man, Make thou the rain descend from heaven.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 39
sanskrit: सुत एति पवित्र आ तविषिं दधान ओजसा | विचक्षाणो विरोचयन
transliteration: suta eti pavitra ā tviṣiṃ dadhāna ojasā | vicakṣāṇo virocayan
translation: With might, bestowing power, the juice enters the purifying sieve, Far-seeing, sending forth its light.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 39
sanskrit: अयं स यो दिवस परि रघुयामा पवित्र आ | सिन्धोरूर्मा वयक्षरत
transliteration: ayaṃ sa yo divas pari raghuyāmā pavitra ā | sindhorūrmā vyakṣarat
translation: This is it which in rapid course hath with the river's wave flowed down From heaven upon the straining cloth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 40
sanskrit: पुनानो अक्रमीदभि विश्वा मर्धो विचर्षणिः | शुम्भन्ति विप्रं धीतिभिः
transliteration: punāno akramīdabhi viśvā mṛdho vicarṣaṇiḥ |
translation: THE Very Active hath assailed, while purified, all enemies: They deck the Sage with holy songs.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 41
sanskrit: पर ये गावो न भूर्णयस्त्वेषा अयासो अक्रमुः | घनन्तः कर्ष्णामप तवचम
transliteration: pra ye ghāvo na bhūrṇayastveṣā ayāso akramuḥ | ghnantaḥ kṛṣṇāmapa tvacam
translation: ACTIVE and bright have they come forth, impetuous in speed like bulls, Driving the black skin far away.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 41
sanskrit: सुवितस्य मनामहे.अति सेतुं दुराव्यम | साह्वांसो दस्युमव्रतम
transliteration: suvitasya manāmahe.ati setuṃ durāvyam | sāhvāṃso dasyumavratam
translation: Quelling the riteless Dasyu, may we think upon the bridge of bliss, Leaving the bridge of woe behind.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 42
sanskrit: जनयन रोचना दिवो जनयन्नप्सु सूर्यम | वसानो गा अपोहरिः
transliteration: janayan rocanā divo janayannapsu sūryam | vasāno ghā apohariḥ
translation: ENGENDERING the Sun in floods, engendering heaven's lights, green-hued, Robed in the waters and the milk,

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 42
sanskrit: एष परत्नेन मन्मना देवो देवेभ्यस परि | धारया पवते सुतः
transliteration: eṣa pratnena manmanā devo devebhyas pari | dhārayā pavate sutaḥ
translation: According to primeval plan this Soma, with his stream, effused Flows purely on, a God for Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 42
sanskrit: वाव्र्धानाय तूर्वये पवन्ते वाजसातये | सोमाः सहस्रपाजसः
transliteration: vāvṛdhānāya tūrigvedaaye pavante vājasātaye | somāḥ sahasrapājasaḥ
translation: For him victorious, waxen great, the juices with a thousand powers Are purified for winning spoil.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 42
sanskrit: दुहानः परत्नमित पयः पवित्रे परि षिच्यते | करन्दन देवानजीजनत
transliteration: duhānaḥ pratnamit payaḥ pavitre pari ṣicyate | krandan devānajījanat
translation: Shedding the ancient fluid he is poured into the cleansing sieve: He, thundering, hath produced the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 42
sanskrit: अभि विश्वानि वार्याभि देवान रताव्र्धः | सोमः पुनानोर्षति
transliteration: abhi viśvāni vāryābhi devān ṛtāvṛdhaḥ | somaḥ punānoarṣati
translation: Soma, while purifying, sends hither all things to be desired, He sends the Gods who strengthen Law.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 42
sanskrit: गोमन नः सोम वीरवदश्वावद वाजवत सुतः | पवस्व बर्हतीरिषः
transliteration: ghoman naḥ soma vīravadaśvāvad vājavat sutaḥ | pavasva bṛhatīriṣaḥ
translation: Soma, effused, pour on us wealth in kine, in heroes, steeds, and spoil, Send us abundant store of food.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 43
sanskrit: यो अत्य इव मर्ज्यते गोभिर्मदाय हर्यतः | तं गीर्भिर्वासयामसि
transliteration: yo atya iva mṛjyate ghobhirmadāya haryataḥ | taṃ ghīrbhirigvedaāsayāmasi
translation: WE will enrobe with sacred song the Lovely One who, as a Steed, Is decked with milk for rapturous joy.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 43
sanskrit: तं नो विश्वा अवस्युवो गिरः शुम्भन्ति पूर्वथा | इन्दुमिन्द्राय पीतये
transliteration: taṃ no viśvā avasyuvo ghiraḥ śumbhanti pūrigvedaathā | indumindrāya pītaye
translation: All songs of ours desiring grace adorn him in the ancient way, Indu for Indra, for his drink.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 43
sanskrit: पुनानो याति हर्यतः सोमो गीर्भिः परिष्क्र्तः | विप्रस्य मेध्यातिथेः
transliteration: punāno yāti haryataḥ somo ghīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ | viprasya medhyātitheḥ
translation: Soma flows on when purified, beloved and adorned with songs, Songs of the sage Medhyatithi.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 43
sanskrit: पवमान विदा रयिमस्मभ्यं सोम सुश्रियम | इन्दो सहस्रवर्चसम
transliteration: pavamāna vidā rayimasmabhyaṃ soma suśriyam | indo sahasravarcasam
translation: O Soma Pavamana, find exceeding glorious wealth for us, Wealth, Indu, fraught with boundless might.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 43
sanskrit: इन्दुरत्यो न वाजस्र्त कनिक्रन्ति पवित्र आ | यदक्षारति देवयुः
transliteration: induratyo na vājasṛt kanikranti pavitra ā | yadakṣārati devayuḥ
translation: Like courser racing to the prize Indu, the lover of the Gods, Roars, as he passes, in the sieve.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 43
sanskrit: पवस्व वाजसातये विप्रस्य गर्णतो वर्धे | सोम रास्व सुवीर्यम
transliteration: pavasva vājasātaye viprasya ghṛṇato vṛdhe | soma rāsva suvīryam
translation: Flow on thy way to win us strength, to speed the sage who praises thee: Soma, bestow heroic power.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 44
sanskrit: पर ण इन्दो महे तन ऊर्मिं न बिभ्रदर्षसि | अभि देवानयास्यः
transliteration: pra ṇa indo mahe tana ūrmiṃ na bibhradarṣasi | abhi devānayāsyaḥ
translation: INDU, to us for this great rite, bearing as 'twere thy wave to Gods, Unwearied, thou art flowing forth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 44
sanskrit: मती जुष्टो धिया हितः सोमो हिन्वे परावति | विप्रस्य धारया कविः
transliteration: matī juṣṭo dhiyā hitaḥ somo hinve parāvati | viprasya dhārayā kaviḥ
translation: Pleased with the hymn, impelled by prayer, Soma is hurried far away, The Wise One in the Singer's stream.,

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 44
sanskrit: अयं देवेषु जाग्र्विः सुत एति पवित्र आ | सोमो याति विचर्षणिः
transliteration: ayaṃ deveṣu jāghṛviḥ suta eti pavitra ā | somo yāti vicarṣaṇiḥ
translation: Watchful among the. gods, this juice advances to the cleansing sieve Soma, most active, travels on.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 44
sanskrit: स नः पवस्व वाजयुश्चक्राणश्चारुमध्वरम | बर्हिष्माना विवासति
transliteration: sa naḥ pavasva vājayuścakrāṇaścārumadhvaram | barhiṣmānā vivāsati
translation: Flow onward, seeking strength for us, embellishing the sacrifice: The priest with trimmed grass calleth thee.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 44
sanskrit: स नो भगाय वायवे विप्रवीरः सदाव्र्धः | सोमो देवेष्वा यमत
transliteration: sa no bhaghāya vāyave vipravīraḥ sadāvṛdhaḥ | somo deveṣvā yamat
translation: May Soma, ever bringing power to Bhaga and to Vayu, Sage And Hero, lead us to the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 44
sanskrit: स नो अद्य वसुत्तये करतुविद गातुवित्तमः | वाजं जेषि शरवो बर्हत
transliteration: sa no adya vasuttaye kratuvid ghātuvittamaḥ | vājaṃ jeṣi śravo bṛhat
translation: So, to increase our wealth to-day, Inspirer, best of Furtherers, Win for us strength and high renown.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 45
sanskrit: स पवस्व मदाय कं नर्चक्षा देववीतये | इन्दविन्द्रायपीतये
transliteration: sa pavasva madāya kaṃ nṛcakṣā devavītaye | indavindrāyapītaye
translation: FLOW, thou who viewest men, to give delight, to entertain the Gods, Indu, to Indra for his drink.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 45
sanskrit: स नो अर्षाभि दूत्यं तवमिन्द्राय तोशसे | देवान सखिभ्य आ वरम
transliteration: sa no arṣābhi dūtyaṃ tvamindrāya tośase | devān sakhibhya ā varam
translation: Stream to thine embassy for us: thou hastenest, for Indra, to The Gods, O better than our friends.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 45
sanskrit: उत तवामरुणं वयं गोभिरञ्ज्मो मदाय कम | वि नो राये दुरो वर्धि
transliteration: uta tvāmaruṇaṃ vayaṃ ghobhirañjmo madāya kam | vi no rāye duro vṛdhi
translation: We balm thee, red of hue, with milk to fit thee for the rapturous joy: Unbar for us the doors of wealth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 45
sanskrit: अत्यू पवित्रमक्रमीद वाजी धुरं न यामनि | इन्दुर्देवेषु पत्यते
transliteration: atyū pavitramakramīd vājī dhuraṃ na yāmani | indurdeveṣu patyate
translation: He through the sieve hath passed, as comes a courser to the pole, to run Indu belongs unto the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 45
sanskrit: समी सखायो अस्वरन वने करीळन्तमत्यविम | इन्दुं नावा अनूषत
transliteration: samī sakhāyo asvaran vane krīḷantamatyavim | induṃ nāvā anūṣata
translation: All friends have lauded him as he sports in the wood, beyond the fleece: Singers have chanted Indu's praise.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 45
sanskrit: तया पवस्व धारया यया पीतो विचक्षसे | इन्दो सतोत्रे सुवीर्यम
transliteration: tayā pavasva dhārayā yayā pīto vicakṣase | indo stotre suvīryam
translation: Flow, Indu, with that stream wherein steeped thou announcest to the man Who worships thee heroic strength.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 46
sanskrit: अस्र्ग्रन देववीतये.अत्यासः कर्त्व्या इव | कषरन्तः पर्वताव्र्धः
transliteration: asṛghran devavītaye.atyāsaḥ kṛtvyā iva | kṣarantaḥ parigvedaatāvṛdhaḥ
translation: LIKE able coursers they have been sent forth to be the feast of Gods, joying in mountains, flowing on.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 46
sanskrit: परिष्क्र्तास इन्दवो योषेव पित्र्यावती | वायुं सोमा अस्र्क्षत
transliteration: pariṣkṛtāsa indavo yoṣeva pitryāvatī | vāyuṃ somā asṛkṣata
translation: To Vayu flow the Soma-streams, the drops of juice made beautiful Like a bride dowered by her sire.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 46
sanskrit: एते सोमास इन्दवः परयस्वन्तः चमू सुताः | इन्द्रं वर्धन्ति कर्मभिः
transliteration: ete somāsa indavaḥ prayasvantaḥ camū sutāḥ | indraṃ vardhanti karmabhiḥ
translation: Pressed in the mortar, these, the drops of juice, the Somas rich in food, Give strength to Indra with their work.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 47
sanskrit: अया सोमः सुक्र्त्यया महश्चिदभ्यवर्धत | मन्दान उद्व्र्षायते
transliteration: ayā somaḥ sukṛtyayā mahaścidabhyavardhata | mandāna udvṛṣāyate
translation: GREAT as he was, Soma hath gained strength by this high solemnity: joyous he riseth like a bull.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 47
sanskrit: कर्तानीदस्य कर्त्वा चेतन्ते दस्युतर्हणा | रणा च धर्ष्णुश्चयते
transliteration: kṛtānīdasya kartvā cetante dasyutarhaṇā |
translation: His task is done: his crushings of the Dasyus are made manifest: He sternly reckoneth their debts.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 48
sanskrit: तं तवा नर्म्णानि बिभ्रतं सधस्थेषु महो दिवः | चारुं सुक्र्त्ययेमहे
transliteration: taṃ tvā nṛmṇāni bibhrataṃ sadhastheṣu maho divaḥ | cāruṃ sukṛtyayemahe
translation: WITH sacrifice we seek to thee kind Cherisher of manly might In mansions of the lofty heavens;

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 48
sanskrit: संव्र्क्तध्र्ष्णुमुक्थ्यं महामहिव्रतं मदम | शतं पुरो रुरुक्षणिम
transliteration: saṃvṛktadhṛṣṇumukthyaṃ mahāmahivrataṃ madam |
translation: Gladdening crusher of the bold, ruling with very mighty sway, Destroyer of a hundred forts.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 49
sanskrit: पवस्व वर्ष्टिमा सु नो.अपामूर्मिं दिवस परि | अयक्ष्मा बर्हतीरिषः
transliteration: pavasva vṛṣṭimā su no.apāmūrmiṃ divas pari | ayakṣmā bṛhatīriṣaḥ
translation: Pour down the rain upon us, pour a wave of waters from the sky, And plenteous store of wholesome food.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 49
sanskrit: तया पवस्व धारया यया गाव इहागमन | जन्यास उप नो गर्हम
transliteration: tayā pavasva dhārayā yayā ghāva ihāghaman | janyāsa upa no ghṛham
translation: Flow onward with that stream of thine, whereby the cows have come to us, The kine of strangers to our home.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 49
sanskrit: घर्तं पवस्व धारया यज्ञेषु देववीतमः | अस्मभ्यं वर्ष्टिमा पव
transliteration: ghṛtaṃ pavasva dhārayā yajñeṣu devavītamaḥ | asmabhyaṃ vṛṣṭimā pava
translation: Chief Friend of Gods in sacred rites, pour on us fatness with thy stream, Pour down on us a flood of rain.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 49
sanskrit: स न ऊर्जे वयव्ययं पवित्रं धाव धारया | देवासः शर्णवन हि कम
transliteration: sa na ūrje vyavyayaṃ pavitraṃ dhāva dhārayā | devāsaḥ śṛṇavan hi kam
translation: To give us vigour, with thy stream run through the fleecy straining-cloth For verily the Gods will bear.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 49
sanskrit: पवमानो असिष्यदद रक्षांस्यपजङघनत | परत्नवद रोचयन रुचः
transliteration: pavamāno asiṣyadad rakṣāṃsyapajaṅghanat | pratnavad rocayan rucaḥ
translation: Onward hath Pavamana flowed and beaten off the Raksasas, Flashing out splendour as of old.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 50
sanskrit: उत ते शुष्मास ईरते सिन्धोरूर्मेरिव सवनः | वाणस्य चोदया पविम
transliteration: ut te śuṣmāsa īrate sindhorūrmeriva svanaḥ | vāṇasya codayā pavim
translation: LOUD as a river's roaring wave thy powers have lifted up themselves: Urge on thine arrow's sharpened point.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 50
sanskrit: परसवे त उदीरते तिस्रो वाचो मखस्युवः | यदव्य एषिसानवि
transliteration: prasave ta udīrate tisro vāco makhasyuvaḥ | yadavya eṣisānavi
translation: At thine effusion upward rise three voices full of joy, when thou Flowest upon the fleecy ridge.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 50
sanskrit: अव्यो वारे परि परियं हरिं हिन्वन्त्यद्रिभिः | पवमानम्मधुश्चुतम
transliteration: avyo vāre pari priyaṃ hariṃ hinvantyadribhiḥ | pavamānammadhuścutam
translation: On to the fleece they urge with stone the tawny well-beloved One, Even Pavamana, dropping meath.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 51
sanskrit: अध्वर्यो अद्रिभिः सुतं सोमं पवित्र आ सर्ज | पुनीहीन्द्राय पातवे
transliteration: adhvaryo adribhiḥ sutaṃ somaṃ pavitra ā sṛja | punīhīndrāya pātave
translation: ADHVARYU, on the filter pour the Soma juice expressed with stones, And make it pure for Indra's drink.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 51
sanskrit: दिवः पीयूषमुत्तमं सोममिन्द्राय वज्रिणे | सुनोता मधुमत्तमम
transliteration: divaḥ pīyūṣamuttamaṃ somamindrāya vajriṇe | sunotā madhumattamam
translation: Pour out for Indra, Thunder-armed, the milk of heaven,, the Soma's juice, Most excellent, most rich in sweets.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 51
sanskrit: तव तय इन्दो अन्धसो देवा मधोर्व्यश्नते | पवमानस्य मरुतः
transliteration: tava tya indo andhaso devā madhorigvedayaśnate | pavamānasya marutaḥ
translation: These Gods and all the Marut host, Indu enjoy this juice of thine, This Pavamana's flowing meath.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 51
sanskrit: तवं हि सोम वर्धयन सुतो मदाय भूर्णये | वर्षन सतोतारमूतये
transliteration: tvaṃ hi soma vardhayan suto madāya bhūrṇaye | vṛṣan stotāramūtaye
translation: For, Soma, thou hast been effused, strengthening for the wild carouse, O Steer, the singer, for our help.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 51
sanskrit: अभ्यर्ष विचक्षण पवित्रं धारया सुतः | अभि वाजमुत शरवः
transliteration: abhyarṣa vicakṣaṇa pavitraṃ dhārayā sutaḥ | abhi vājamuta śravaḥ
translation: Flow with thy stream, Far-sighted One, effused, into the cleansing sieve: Flow on to give us strength and fame.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 52
sanskrit: परि दयुक्षः सनद्रयिर्भरद वाजं नो अन्धसा | सुवानोर्ष पवित्र आ
transliteration: pari dyukṣaḥ sanadrayirbharad vājaṃ no andhasā | suvānoarṣa pavitra ā
translation: WEALTH-WINNER, dwelling in the sky, bringing us vigour with the juice, Flow to the filter when effused.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 52
sanskrit: तव परत्नेभिरध्वभिरव्यो वारे परि परियः | सहस्रधारो यात तना
transliteration: tava pratnebhiradhvabhiravyo vāre pari priyaḥ | sahasradhāro yāt tanā
translation: So, in thine ancient ways, may he, beloved, with a thousand streams Run o'er the fleecy straining-cloth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 52
sanskrit: चरुर्न यस्तमीङखयेन्दो न दानमीङखय | वधैर्वधस्नवीङखय
transliteration: carurna yastamīṅkhayendo na dānamīṅkhaya | vadhairigvedaadhasnavīṅkhaya
translation: Him who is like a caldron shake: O Indu, shake thy gift to us Shake it, armed Warrior! with thine arms.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 52
sanskrit: नि शुष्ममिन्दवेषां पुरुहूत जनानाम | यो अस्मानादिदेशति
transliteration: ni śuṣmamindaveṣāṃ puruhūta janānām | yo asmānādideśati
translation: Indu, invoked with many a prayer, bring down the vigour of these men, Of him who threatens us with war.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 53
sanskrit: उत ते शुष्मासो अस्थू रक्षो भिन्दन्तो अद्रिवः | नुदस्व याः परिस्प्र्धः
transliteration: ut te śuṣmāso asthū rakṣo bhindanto adrivaḥ | nudasva yāḥ parispṛdhaḥ
translation: O THOU with stones for arms, thy powers, crushing the fiends, have raised themselves: Chase thou the foes who compass us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 53
sanskrit: अया निजघ्निरोजसा रथसंगे धने हिते | सतवा अबिभ्युषा हर्दा
transliteration: ayā nijaghnirojasā rathasaṃghe dhane hite | stavā abibhyuṣā hṛdā
translation: Thou conquerest thus with might when car meets car, and when the prize is staked: With fearless heart will I sing praise.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 53
sanskrit: अस्य वरतानि नाध्र्षे पवमानस्य दूढ्या | रुज यस्त्वाप्र्तन्यति
transliteration: asya vratāni nādhṛṣe pavamānasya dūḍhyā | ruja yastvāpṛtanyati
translation: No one with evil thought assails this Pavamana's holy laws: Crush him who fain would fight with thee.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 53
sanskrit: तं हिन्वन्ति मदच्युतं हरिं नदीषु वाजिनम | इन्दुमिन्द्राय मत्सरम
transliteration: taṃ hinvanti madacyutaṃ hariṃ nadīṣu vājinam | indumindrāya matsaram
translation: For Indra to the streams they drive the tawny rapture-dropping Steed, Indu the bringer of delight.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 54
sanskrit: अस्य परत्नामनु दयुतं शुक्रं दुदुह्रे अह्रयः | पयः सहस्रसां रषिम
transliteration: asya pratnāmanu dyutaṃ śukraṃ duduhre ahrayaḥ | payaḥ sahasrasāṃ ṛṣim
translation: AFTER his ancient splendour, they, the bold, have drawn the bright milk from The Sage who wins a thousand gifts.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 54
sanskrit: अयं सूर्य इवोपद्र्गयं सरांसि धावति | सप्त परवता दिवम
transliteration: ayaṃ sūrya ivopadṛghayaṃ sarāṃsi dhāvati | sapta pravataā divam
translation: In aspect he is like the Sun; he runneth forward to the lakes, Seven currents flowing through the sky.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 54
sanskrit: अयं विश्वानि तिष्ठति पुनानो भुवनोपरि | सोमो देवो नसूर्यः
transliteration: ayaṃ viśvāni tiṣṭhati punāno bhuvanopari | somo devo nasūryaḥ
translation: He, shining in his splendour, stands high over all things that exist- Soma, a God as Surya is.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 54
sanskrit: परि णो देववीतये वाजानर्षसि गोमतः | पुनान इन्दविन्द्रयुः
transliteration: pari ṇo devavītaye vājānarṣasi ghomataḥ | punāna indavindrayuḥ
translation: Thou, Indu, in thy brilliancy, pourest on us, as Indra's Friend, Wealth from the kine to feast the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 55
sanskrit: यवं-यवं नो अन्धसा पुष्टम-पुष्टं परि सरव | सोम विश्वा च सौभगा
transliteration: yavaṃ-yavaṃ no andhasā puṣṭam-puṣṭaṃ pari srava | soma viśvā ca saubhaghā
translation: POUR on us with thy juice all kinds of corn, each sort of nourishment, And, Soma, all felicities.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 56
sanskrit: परि सोम रतं बर्हदाशुः पवित्रे अर्षति | विघ्नन रक्षांसि देवयुः
transliteration: pari soma ṛtaṃ bṛhadāśuḥ pavitre arṣati | vighnan rakṣāṃsi devayuḥ
translation: SWIFT to the purifying sieve flows Soma as exalted Law, Slaying the fiends, loving the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 56
sanskrit: यत सोमो वाजमर्षति शतं धारा अपस्युवः | इन्द्रस्यसख्यमाविशन
transliteration: yat somo vājamarṣati śataṃ dhārā apasyuvaḥ | indrasyasakhyamāviśan
translation: When Soma pours the strengthening food a hundred ever-active streams To Indra's friendship win their way.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 56
sanskrit: अभि तवा योषणो दश जारं न कन्यानूषत | मर्ज्यसे सोम सातये
transliteration: abhi tvā yoṣaṇo daśa jāraṃ na kanyānūṣata | mṛjyase soma sātaye
translation: Ten Dames have sung to welcome thee, even as a maiden greets her love: O Soma, thou art decked to win.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 56
sanskrit: तवमिन्द्राय विष्णवे सवादुरिन्दो परि सरव | नॄन सतोतॄन्पाह्यंहसः
transliteration: tvamindrāya viṣṇave svādurindo pari srava | nṝn stotṝnpāhyaṃhasaḥ
translation: Flow hitherward, O Indu, sweet to Indra and to Visnu: guard The men, the singers, from distress.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 57
sanskrit: पर ते धारा असश्चतो दिवो न यन्ति वर्ष्टयः | अछा वाजं सहस्रिणम
transliteration: pra te dhārā asaścato divo na yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ | achā vājaṃ sahasriṇam
translation: THY streams that never fail or waste flow forth like showers of rain from heaven, To bring a thousand stores of strength.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 57
sanskrit: अभि परियाणि काव्या विश्वा चक्षाणो अर्षति | हरिस्तुञ्जान आयुधा
transliteration: abhi priyāṇi kāvyā viśvā cakṣāṇo arṣati | haristuñjāna āyudhā
translation: He flows beholding on his way all well beloved sacred lore, Green-tinted, brandishing his, arms.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 57
sanskrit: स मर्म्र्जान आयुभिरिभो राजेव सुव्रतः | शयेनो न वंसु षीदति
transliteration: sa marmṛjāna āyubhiribho rājeva suvrataḥ |
translation: He, when the people deck him like a docile king of elephants. Sits as a falcon in the, wood.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 58
sanskrit: तरत स मन्दी धावति धारा सुतस्यान्धसः | तरत स मन्दी धावति
transliteration: tarat sa mandī dhāvati dhārā sutasyāndhasaḥ | tarat sa mandī dhāvati
translation: SWIFT runs this giver of delight, even the stream of flowing juice: Swift runs this giver of delight.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 58
sanskrit: उस्रा वेद वसूनां मर्तस्य देव्यवसः | तरत स मन्दी धावति
transliteration: usrā veda vasūnāṃ martasya devyavasaḥ | tarat sa mandī dhāvati
translation: The Morning knows all precious things, the Goddess knows her grace to man: Swift runs this giver of delight.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 58
sanskrit: धवस्रयोः पुरुषन्त्योरा सहस्राणि दद्महे | तरत स मन्दी धावति
transliteration: dhvasrayoḥ puruṣantyorā sahasrāṇi dadmahe | tarat sa mandī dhāvati
translation: We have accepted thousands from Dhvasra's and Purusanti's hands: Swift runs this giver of delight.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 59
sanskrit: पवस्व गोजिदश्वजिद विश्वजित सोम रण्यजित | परजावद रत्नमा भर
transliteration: pavasva ghojidaśvajid viśvajit soma raṇyajit | prajāvad ratnamā bhara
translation: FLOW onward, Soma, winning kine, and steeds, and all that gives delight: Bring hither wealth with progeny.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 59
sanskrit: पवस्वाद्भ्यो अदाभ्यः पवस्वौषधीभ्यः | पवस्व धिषणाभ्यः
transliteration: pavasvādbhyo adābhyaḥ pavasvauṣadhībhyaḥ | pavasva dhiṣaṇābhyaḥ
translation: Flow onward from the waters, flow, inviolable, from the plants: Flow onward from the pressing-boards.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 59
sanskrit: तवं सोम पवमानो विश्वानि दुरिता तर | कविः सीद नि बर्हिषि
transliteration: tvaṃ soma pavamāno viśvāni duritā tara | kaviḥ sīda ni barhiṣi
translation: Soma, as Pavamana, pass over all trouble and distress: Sit on the sacred grass, a Sage.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 59
sanskrit: पवमान सवर्विदो जायमानो.अभवो महान | इन्दो विश्वानभीदसि
transliteration: pavamāna svarigvedado jāyamāno.abhavo mahān | indo viśvānabhīdasi
translation: Thou, Pavamana, foundest light; thou at thy birth becamest great: O Indu, thou art over all.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 60
sanskrit: पर गायत्रेण गायत पवमानं विचर्षणिम | इन्दुं सहस्रचक्षसम
transliteration: pra ghāyatreṇa ghāyata pavamānaṃ vicarṣaṇim | induṃ sahasracakṣasam
translation: SING forth and laud with sacred song most active Pavamana, laud Indu who sees with thousand eyes.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 60
sanskrit: तं तवा सहस्रचक्षसमथो सहस्रभर्णसम | अति वारमपाविषुः
transliteration: taṃ tvā sahasracakṣasamatho sahasrabharṇasam | ati vāramapāviṣuḥ
translation: Thee who hast thousand eyes to see, bearer of thousand burthens, they Have filtered through the fleecy cloth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 60
sanskrit: अति वारान पवमानो असिष्यदत कलशानभि धावति | इन्द्रस्य हार्द्याविशन
transliteration: ati vārān pavamāno asiṣyadat kalaśānabhi dhāvati | indrasya hārdyāviśan
translation: He, Pavamana, hath streamed through the fleece then: he runs into the jars, Finding his way to Indra's heart.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 60
sanskrit: इन्द्रस्य सोम राधसे शं पवस्व विचर्षणे | परजावद रेता भर
transliteration: indrasya soma rādhase śaṃ pavasva vicarṣaṇe | prajāvad retaā bhara
translation: That Indra may be bounteous, flow, most active Soma, for our weal: Bring genial seed with progeny.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 61
sanskrit: अया वीती परि सरव यस्त इन्दो मदेष्वा | अवाहन नवतीर्नव
transliteration: ayā vītī pari srava yasta indo madeṣvā | avāhan navatīrnava
translation: FLOW onward, Indu, with this food for him who in thy wild delight Battered the nine-and-ninety down,

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 61
sanskrit: पुरः सद्य इत्थाधिये दिवोदासाय शम्बरम | अध तयं तुर्वशं यदुम
transliteration: puraḥ sadya itthādhiye divodāsāya śambaram | adha tyaṃ turigvedaaśaṃ yadum
translation: Smote swiftly forts, and Sambara, then Yadu and that Turvaga, For pious Divodasa's sake.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 61
sanskrit: परि णो अश्वमश्वविद गोमदिन्दो हिरण्यवत | कषरा सहस्रिणीरिषः
transliteration: pari ṇo aśvamaśvavid ghomadindo hiraṇyavat | kṣarā sahasriṇīriṣaḥ
translation: Finder of horses, pour on us horses and wealth in kine and gold, And, Indu, food in boundless store.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 61
sanskrit: पवमानस्य ते वयं पवित्रमभ्युन्दतः | सखित्वमा वर्णीमहे
transliteration: pavamānasya te vayaṃ pavitramabhyundataḥ | sakhitvamā vṛṇīmahe
translation: We seek to win thy friendly love, even Pavamana's flowing o'er The limit of the cleansing sieve.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 61
sanskrit: ये ते पवित्रमूर्मयो.अभिक्षरन्ति धारया | तेभिर्नः सोम मर्ळय
transliteration: ye te pavitramūrmayo.abhikṣaranti dhārayā | tebhirnaḥ soma mṛḷaya
translation: With those same waves which in their stream oyerflow the purifying sieve, Soma; be gracious unto us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 61
sanskrit: स नः पुनान आ भर रयिं वीरवतीमिषम | ईशानःसोम विश्वतः
transliteration: sa naḥ punāna ā bhara rayiṃ vīravatīmiṣam |
translation: O Soma, being purified, bring us from all sides, for thou canst, Riches and food with hero sons.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 62
sanskrit: एते अस्र्ग्रमिन्दवस्तिरः पवित्रमाशवः | विश्वान्यभिसौभगा
transliteration: ete asṛghramindavastiraḥ pavitramāśavaḥ | viśvānyabhisaubhaghā
translation: THESE rapid Soma-drops have been poured through the purifying sieve To bring us all felicities.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 62
sanskrit: विघ्नन्तो दुरिता पुरु सुगा तोकाय वाजिनः | तना कर्ण्वन्तो अर्वते
transliteration: vighnanto duritā puru sughā tokāya vājinaḥ | tanā kṛṇvanto arigvedaate
translation: Dispelling manifold mishap, giving the courser's progeny, Yea, and the warrior steed, success.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 62
sanskrit: कर्ण्वन्तो वरिवो गवे.अभ्यर्षन्ति सुष्टुतिम | इळामस्मभ्यं संयतम
transliteration: kṛṇvanto varivo ghave.abhyarṣanti suṣṭutim | iḷāmasmabhyaṃ saṃyatam
translation: Bringing prosperity to kine, they make perpetual Ila flow To us for noble eulogy.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 62
sanskrit: असाव्यंशुर्मदायाप्सु दक्षो गिरिष्ठाः | शयेनो न योनिमासदत
transliteration: asāvyaṃśurmadāyāpsu dakṣo ghiriṣṭhāḥ |
translation: Strong, mountain-born, the stalk hath been pressed in the streams for rapturous joy: Hawk-like he settles in his home.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: आ पवस्व सहस्रिणं रयिं सोम सुवीर्यम | अस्मे शरवांसिधारय
transliteration: asme śravāṃsidhāraya
translation: POUR hitherward, O Soma, wealth in thousands and heroic strength, And keep renown secure for us.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: इषमूर्जं च पिन्वस इन्द्राय मत्सरिन्तमः | चमूष्वा नि षीदसि
transliteration: iṣamūrjaṃ ca pinvasa indrāya matsarintamaḥ | camūṣvā ni ṣīdasi
translation: Thou makest food and vigour swell for Indra, best of gladdeners! Within the cups thou seatest thee.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: सुत इन्द्राय विष्णवे सोमः कलशे अक्षरत | मधुमानस्तुवायवे
transliteration: suta indrāya viṣṇave somaḥ kalaśe akṣarat | madhumānastuvāyave
translation: For Indra and for Visnu poured, Soma hath flowed into the jar: May Vayu find it rich in sweets.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: एते अस्र्ग्रमाशवो.अति हवरांसि बभ्रवः | सोमा रतस्य धारया
transliteration: ete asṛghramāśavo.ati hvarāṃsi babhravaḥ | somā ṛtasya dhārayā
translation: These Somas swift and brown of hue, in stream of solemn sacrifice Have flowed through twisted obstacles,

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: इन्द्रं वर्धन्तो अप्तुरः कर्ण्वन्तो विश्वमार्यम | अपघ्नन्तो अराव्णः
transliteration: indraṃ vardhanto apturaḥ kṛṇvanto viśvamāryam | apaghnanto arāvṇaḥ
translation: Performing every noble work, active, augmenting Indra's strength, Driving away the godless ones.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: सुता अनु सवमा रजो.अभ्यर्षन्ति बभ्रवः | इन्द्रं गछन्त इन्दवः
transliteration: sutā anu svamā rajo.abhyarṣanti babhravaḥ | indraṃ ghachanta indavaḥ
translation: Brown Soma-drops, effused that seek Indra, to their appropriate place Flow through the region hitherward.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: अया पवस्व धारया यया सूर्यमरोचयः | हिन्वानो मानुषीरपः
transliteration: ayā pavasva dhārayā yayā sūryamarocayaḥ | hinvāno mānuṣīrapaḥ
translation: Flow onward with that stream of thine wherewith thou gavest Surya light, Urging on waters good to men.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: अयुक्त सूर एतशं पवमानो मनावधि | अन्तरिक्षेण यातवे
transliteration: ayukta sūra etaśaṃ pavamāno manāvadhi | antarikṣeṇa yātave
translation: He, Pavamana, high o'er man yoked the Sun's courser Etasa To travel through the realm of air.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: उत तया हरितो दश सूरो अयुक्त यातवे | इन्दुरिन्द्र इतिब्रुवन
transliteration: uta tyā harito daśa sūro ayukta yātave | indurindra itibruvan
translation: And those ten Coursers, tawny-hued, he harnessed that the Sun might come Indu, he said, is Indra's self.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: परीतो वायवे सुतं गिर इन्द्राय मत्सरम | अव्यो वारेषुसिञ्चत
transliteration: parīto vāyave sutaṃ ghira indrāya matsaram | avyo vāreṣusiñcata
translation: Hence, singers, pour the gladdening juice to Vayu and to Indra, pour The drops upon the fleecy cloth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: पवमान विदा रयिमस्मभ्यं सोम दुष्टरम | यो दूणाशो वनुष्यता
transliteration: pavamāna vidā rayimasmabhyaṃ soma duṣṭaram | yo dūṇāśo vanuṣyatā
translation: O Soma Pavamana, find wealth for us not to be assailed, Wealth which the foeman may not win.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: अभ्यर्ष सहस्रिणं रयिं गोमन्तमश्विनम | अभि वाजमुत शरवः
transliteration: abhyarṣa sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ ghomantamaśvinam | abhi vājamuta śravaḥ
translation: Send riches hither with thy stream in thousands, both of steeds and kine, Send spoil of war and high renown.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: सोमो देवो न सूर्यो.अद्रिभिः पवते सुतः | दधानः कलशे रसम
transliteration: somo devo na sūryo.adribhiḥ pavate sutaḥ | dadhānaḥ kalaśe rasam
translation: Soma the God, expressed with stones, like Surya, floweth on his way, Pouring the juice within the jar.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: एते धामान्यार्या शुक्रा रतस्य धारया | वाजं गोमन्तमक्षरन
transliteration: ete dhāmānyāryā śukrā ṛtasya dhārayā | vājaṃ ghomantamakṣaran
translation: These brilliant drops have poured for us, in stream of solemn sacrifice, Worshipful laws and strength in kine.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: सुता इन्द्राय वज्रिणे सोमासो दध्याशिरः | पवित्रमत्यक्षरन
transliteration: sutā indrāya vajriṇe somāso dadhyāśiraḥ | pavitramatyakṣaran
translation: Over the cleansing sieve have flowed the Somas, blent with curdled milk, Effused for Indra Thunder-armed.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: पर सोम मधुमत्तमो राये अर्ष पवित्र आ | मदो यो देववीतमः
transliteration: pra soma madhumattamo rāye arṣa pavitra ā | mado yo devavītamaḥ
translation: Soma, do thou most rich in sweets, a gladdening drink most dear to Gods, Flow to the sieve to bring us wealth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 63
sanskrit: तमी मर्जन्त्यायवो हरिं नदीषु वाजिनम | इन्दुमिन्द्रायमत्सरम
transliteration: tamī mṛjantyāyavo hariṃ nadīṣu vājinam | indumindrāyamatsaram
translation: For Indra, living men adorn the Tawny Courser in the streams, Indu, the giver of delight.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 64
sanskrit: वर्षा सोम दयुमानसि वर्षा देव वर्षव्रतः | वर्षा धर्माणि दधिषे
transliteration: vṛṣā soma dyumānasi vṛṣā deva vṛṣavrataḥ | vṛṣā dharmāṇi dadhiṣe
translation: Soma, thou art a splendid Steer, a Steer, O God, with steer like sway: Thou as a Steer ordainest laws.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 64
sanskrit: वर्ष्णस्ते वर्ष्ण्यं शवो वर्षा वनं वर्षा मदः | सत्यं वर्षन वर्षेदसि
transliteration: vṛṣṇaste vṛṣṇyaṃ śavo vṛṣā vanaṃ vṛṣā madaḥ | satyaṃ vṛṣan vṛṣedasi
translation: Steer-strong thy might is as a steer's, steer strong thy wood, steer-like thy drink A Steer indeed, O Steer, art thou.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 64
sanskrit: अश्वो न चक्रदो वर्षा सं गा इन्दो समर्वतः | वि नो राये दुरो वर्धि
transliteration: aśvo na cakrado vṛṣā saṃ ghā indo samarigvedaataḥ | vi no rāye duro vṛdhi
translation: Thou, Indu, as a vigorous horse, hast neighed together steeds and kine: Unbar for us the doors to wealth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 64
sanskrit: अस्र्क्षत पर वाजिनो गव्या सोमासो अश्वया | शुक्रासो वीरयाशवः
transliteration: asṛkṣata pra vājino ghavyā somāso aśvayā |
translation: Out of desire of cows and steeds and horses. potent Soma-drops, Brilliant and swift, have been effused.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 65
sanskrit: हिन्वन्ति सूरमुस्रयः सवसारो जामयस पतिम | महामिन्दुं महीयुवः
transliteration: hinvanti sūramusrayaḥ svasāro jāmayas patim | mahāminduṃ mahīyuvaḥ
translation: THE, glittering maids send Sura forth, the glorious sisters, close-allied, Send Indu forth, their mighty Lord.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 65
sanskrit: पवमान रुचा-रुचा देवो देवेभ्यस परि | विश्वा वसून्याविश
transliteration: pavamāna rucā-rucā devo devebhyas pari | viśvā vasūnyāviśa
translation: Pervade, O Pavamana, all our treasures with repeated light, God, coming hither from the Gods.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 66
sanskrit: पवस्व विश्वचर्षणे.अभि विश्वानि काव्या | सखा सखिभ्य ईड्यः
transliteration: pavasva viśvacarṣaṇe.abhi viśvāni kāvyā | sakhā sakhibhya īḍyaḥ
translation: FOR holy lore of every sort, flow onward thou whom all men love. A Friend to be besought by friends.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 66
sanskrit: ताभ्यां विश्वस्य राजसि ये पवमान धामनी | परतीची सोम तस्थतुः
transliteration: tābhyāṃ viśvasya rājasi ye pavamāna dhāmanī | pratīcī soma tasthatuḥ
translation: O'er all thou rulest with these Two which, Soma Pavamana, stand, Turned, as thy stations, hitherward.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 66
sanskrit: परि धामानि यानि ते तवं सोमासि विश्वतः पवमान रतुभिः कवे
transliteration: pari dhāmāni yāni te tvaṃ somāsi viśvataḥ pavamāna ṛtubhiḥ kave
translation: Wise Soma Pavamana, thou encompassest on every side Thy stations as the seasons come.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 66
sanskrit: पवस्व जनयन्निषो.अभि विश्वानि वार्या | सखा सखिभ्य ऊतये
transliteration: pavasva janayanniṣo.abhi viśvāni vāryā | sakhā sakhibhya ūtaye
translation: Flow onward, generating food, for precious boons of every kind, A Friend for friends, to be our help.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 66
sanskrit: तव शुक्रासो अर्चयो दिवस पर्ष्ठे वि तन्वते | पवित्रं सोम धामभिः
transliteration: tava śukrāso arcayo divas pṛṣṭhe vi tanvate | pavitraṃ soma dhāmabhiḥ
translation: Upon the lofty ridge of heaven thy bright rays with their essences, Soma, spread purifying power.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 66
sanskrit: तवेमे सप्त सिन्धवः परशिषं सोम सिस्रते | तुभ्यं धावन्ति धेनवः
transliteration: taveme sapta sindhavaḥ praśiṣaṃ soma sisrate | tubhyaṃ dhāvanti dhenavaḥ
translation: O Soma, these Seven Rivers flow, as being thine, to give command: The Streams of milk run forth to thee.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 66
sanskrit: पर सोम याहि धारया सुत इन्द्राय मत्सरः | दधानो अक्षिति शरवः
transliteration: pra soma yāhi dhārayā suta indrāya matsaraḥ | dadhāno akṣiti śravaḥ
translation: Flow onward, Soma in a stream, effused to gladden Indra's heart, Bringing imperishable fame.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 66
sanskrit: समु तवा धीभिरस्वरन हिन्वतीः सप्त जामयः | विप्रमाजा विवस्वतः
transliteration: samu tvā dhībhirasvaran hinvatīḥ sapta jāmayaḥ | vipramājā vivasvataḥ
translation: Driving thee in Vivasvan's course, the Seven Sisters with their hymns Made melody round thee the Sage.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 66
sanskrit: मर्जन्ति तवा समग्रुवो.अव्ये जीरावधि षवनि | रेभो यदज्यसे वने
transliteration: mṛjanti tvā samaghruvo.avye jīrāvadhi ṣvani | rebho yadajyase vane
translation: The virgins deck thee o'er fresh streams to drive thee to the sieve when thou, A singer, bathest in the wood.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 66
sanskrit: पवमानस्य ते कवे वाजिन सर्गा अस्र्क्षत | अर्वन्तो न शरवस्यवः
transliteration: pavamānasya te kave vājin sarghā asṛkṣata | arigvedaanto na śravasyavaḥ
translation: The streams of Pavamana, thine, Sage, Mighty One, have pouredthem forth. Like coursers eager for renown.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 66
sanskrit: अछा कोशं मधुश्चुतमस्र्ग्रं वारे अव्यये | अवावशन्तधीतयः
transliteration: achā kośaṃ madhuścutamasṛghraṃ vāre avyaye | avāvaśantadhītayaḥ
translation: They have been poured upon the fleece towards the meath-distilling vat: The holy songs have sounded forth.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 66
sanskrit: अछा समुद्रमिन्दवो.अस्तं गावो न धेनवः | अग्मन्न्र्तस्य योनिमा
transliteration: achā samudramindavo.astaṃ ghāvo na dhenavaḥ | aghmannṛtasya yonimā
translation: Like milch-kine coming home, the drops of Soma juice have reached the lake, Have reached the place of sacrifice.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 66
sanskrit: पर ण इन्दो महे रण आपो अर्षन्ति सिन्धवः | यद गोभिर्वासयिष्यसे
transliteration: pra ṇa indo mahe raṇa āpo arṣanti sindhavaḥ | yad ghobhirigvedaāsayiṣyase
translation: O Indu, to our great delight the running waters flow to us, When thou wilt robe thyself in milk.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 66
sanskrit: अस्य ते सख्ये वयमियक्षन्तस्त्वोतयः | इन्दो सखित्वमुश्मसि
transliteration: asya te sakhye vayamiyakṣantastvotayaḥ | indo sakhitvamuśmasi
translation: In this thy friendship, and with thee to help us, fain to sacrifice, Indu, we crave thy friendly love.

title: Rig Veda Mandala 9 Hymn 67
sanskrit: तवं सोमासि धारयुर्मन्द्र ओजिष्ठो अध्वरे | पवस्व मंहयद्रयिः
transliteration: tvaṃ somāsi dhārayurmandra ojiṣṭho adhvare | pavasva maṃhayadrayiḥ
